chunks.original_text: 急降急急降，急速现真形。 急急如律令。 杀鬼降魔咒 天元太一，精司主兵。 卫护世土，保合生精。 华衣绣裙，正冠青巾。 青龙左列，白虎右宾。 佩服龙剑，五福之章。 统领神官，三五将军。 有邪必斩，有怪必摧。 敷佑福祥，启悟希夷。 邪怪消灭，五帝降威。 护世万年，帝德日熙。 黄龙降天，帝寿所期。 景霄洞章，消魔却非。 急急如律令。 保制劫运咒 五劫既周，后劫推迁。 爰命景霄，保制劫年。 九天运否，阴阳数穷。 五行乖逆，六天肆凶。 天道既变，人道将终。 咨示列缺，部制丰隆。 五老化身，五雷大君。 飞神变景，扫荡魔群。 挥戈秉钺，驾起黑云。 九地巡游，烈火炎焚。 涤除凶秽，扫荡妖氛。 骈邾潞洄，何历光仁。 露堪显生，履兆机垂。 秘呈策极，存智昭基。 是灾皆弭，祸乱悉平。 五雷奋威，雷令必行。 急急如律令。 灭瘟疫咒 始青符命，洞渊正刑。 金钺前导，雷鼓后轰。 兵仗亿千，变化真灵。 景霄所部，中有威神。 华游谒用，邈处述规。 测禁洞回，希渊奏明。 礼罡大抃，陀漠子持。 凝阴合阳，理禁邪原。 妖魔厉鬼，束送穷泉。 敢有干试，摄赴洞渊。 风刀考身，万死不原。 急急如律令。 治病保生咒 太虚玄妙神，空洞幽元君。 生於眇莽中，运化标玄根。 淡漠居正性，返照灭邪氛。 消魔却害除，冲融和至真。 昭昭智慧锋，威化比妖群。 五浊安能扰，明辉华景形。 佩服景霄文，云光焕尔身。 玉符镇内景，龙虎缠胎婴。 水火金木交，混一宗皇灵。 百脉息宣畅，帝真卫尔生。 大梵倒海咒 条冥衍崖，耿彻敷澄。 监萌腆宣，撰慈涟波。 仙宛碧洙，洋略浮滨。 滨筑咸恭，番振阜屏。 拂俾就元，扁飞御停。 忱昭亨欸，角奋波微。 召五雷祝 玉清始青，真符告盟。 推迁二炁，混一成真。 五雷五雷，急会黄宁。 氤氲变化，吼雷迅霆。 闻呼即至，速发阳声。 狼洺冱滨，渎蚓唯卢，椿抑煞摄。 急急如律令。 天雷神咒 三天育元，景霄正刑。 发生号令，上应列星。 救尔雷神，运动风霆。 太一帝君，召汝真灵。 一召即至，来降帝庭。 地雷神咒 玄炁徘徊，丹天令行。 震吼太空，火令申明。 烟都禀命，斩邪保生。 严驾火车，统制雷兵。 景霄救下，震动天声。 水雷神咒 始青天中，敕下景霄。 啸命风雷，馘邪斩妖。 霹雳震吼，阴阳炁交。 电光围绕，火发炎烧。 雷车速起，来降空遥。 神雷神咒 九天玄音，急召众神。 齐会景霄，驱雷奔云。 金钺前驱，雷鼓发奔。 太一行刑，役使雷兵。 来应符命，扫荡邪精。 社雷神祝 高上景霄，节制雷霆。 召命三界，禀令行刑。 九州社令，血食之神。 佐理阴阳，震吼天声。 来应符命，斩邪保生。 敕雷符咒 炎灵震神，火丽辉神。 赤明焕赫，奔云流铃。 仙都敕下，星斗隐明。 黑云密布，电火奔星，金钺四张，收斩邪精。 天令一下，速震速轰，急急如律令。 召雷咒 唵天皇伽耶霹雳摄咤□咭吽，四目九丑，雷音电火摄。 唵阿暮伽毗卢左曩摩贺母。 捺态摩利，□啰摩什。 伐罗密多耶吽，唵哩吽唵哩吽，哩吽唵唵哩，唵唵哩吽吽。 烓炩，炎烨鐄。 锬银，雵。
chunks.translated_text:
Swiftly descend, swiftly, swiftly descend,
Hasten to reveal your true form.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the decree commands.

**Slaying Ghosts and Subduing Demons Incantation**
Primordial Heaven’s Supreme Unity,
Essence commands the hosts of war.
Guarding the world’s lands,
Preserving and uniting life’s essence.
Adorned in embroidered robes,
Crowned with azure headscarves.
Azure Dragon arrays to the left,
White Tiger attends to the right.
Girded with the Dragon Sword,
Bearing the talisman of Five Blessings.
Commanding divine officers,
And the generals of Three and Five.
Where evil exists, sever it;
Where monstrosities arise, crush them.
Bestowing protection and fortune,
Awakening to the subtle and profound.
Evil and aberrations vanish,
As the Five Emperors descend in majesty.
Safeguarding the world for ten thousand years,
The Emperor’s virtue shines ever brighter.
Yellow Dragon descends from heaven,
The Emperor’s longevity is thus ordained.
The *Luminous Empyrean Scripture* dispels demons and averts calamity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the decree commands.

**Preserving and Controlling the Kalpic Turn Incantation**
Five kalpas having run their course,
The next kalpa unfolds in succession.
Thus the *Luminous Empyrean* is commanded,
To preserve and govern the kalpic years.
The nine heavens’ fate turns ill,
Yin and yang’s cycles reach their end.
The Five Phases fall into discord,
The Six Heavens unleash their fury.
The Dao of Heaven shifts,
The Dao of Man nears its close.
Summoning *Lieque* and dispatching *Fenglong*,
The Five Elders manifest their forms,
The Great Lords of the Five Thunders.
Flying spirits transform their radiance,
Sweeping away demonic hordes.
Brandishing halberds and wielding axes,
They mount the black clouds.
Patrolling the nine earths,
Fiery flames scorch and burn.
Purging all malevolence and filth,
Sweeping away inauspicious vapors.
*Piān*, *Zhū*, *Lù*, and *Huí*—what era has not known benevolence?
The dew suffices to sustain life,
Treading where omens foretell.
Secretly revealing the ultimate strategy,
Preserving wisdom’s luminous foundation.
All disasters are quelled,
All misfortunes and chaos pacified.
The Five Thunders exert their might,
Their commands are inexorably executed.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the decree commands.

**Eradicating Pestilence Incantation**
The *Verdant Prime Mandate*,
The *Abyssal Cavern’s* just punishment.
Golden axes lead the vanguard,
Thunder drums resound from behind.
Countless weapons and soldiers,
Transforming into true numina.
The *Luminous Empyrean’s* hosts,
Within them dwell mighty spirits.
Their ethereal journey serves its purpose,
Their distant abode follows its rules.
Probing prohibitions and abyssal depths,
The *Subtle Abyss* presents its report.
Ritual steps and great exultation,
*Tuomozi* holds fast.
Congealing yin and uniting yang,
Governing and restraining the roots of evil.
Demons, malevolent ghosts,
Bound and sent to the nethermost springs.
Dare any defy or test,
They shall be seized and taken to the *Abyssal Cavern*.
Wind blades shall carve their bodies,
Ten thousand deaths without reprieve.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the decree commands.

**Healing Illness and Preserving Life Incantation**
The wondrous spirit of the Great Void,
The *Mysterious Origin Lord* of the profound and obscure.
Born within the vast and boundless,
Its transformations mark the root of mystery.
Dwelling in serene detachment, abiding in true nature,
Reflecting back to extinguish evil vapors.
Dispelling demons, averting harm, and removing afflictions,
Pervading and harmonizing with the utmost truth.
Luminous, the blade of wisdom,
Its majestic transformations surpass demonic hordes.
How can the Five Turbidities disturb?
Radiant, your form shines with resplendent light.
Adorning yourself with the *Luminous Empyrean’s* scripture,
Cloudy radiance illumines your body.
Jade talismans guard your inner landscape,
Dragon and Tiger entwine your embryonic spirit.
Water and Fire, Metal and Wood intermingle,
Merging into the primal numen of the *August Sovereign*.
A hundred meridians flow unimpeded,
The *Imperial Perfected* safeguards your life.

**Great Brahma’s Ocean-Inverting Incantation**
*Tiaoming* extends from the cliffs,
*Gengche* spreads its clarity.
Overseeing the sprouting, fostering its flourishing,
Composing compassion’s rippling waves.
The immortal’s abode by the azure stream,
Vast and boundless, floating along the shores.
Shores built with reverence,
Peaks and screens tremble and rise.
Brushing them to return to the origin,
The soaring *Bian* halts its flight.
Sincerity shines, prosperity resounds,
The horn’s might stirs the subtle waves.

**Summoning the Five Thunders Incantation**
From *Jade Clarity’s* verdant inception,
True talismans proclaim the covenant.
The two *qi* advance and recede,
Merging into oneness to achieve truth.
Five Thunders, Five Thunders,
Hasten to assemble at *Huangning*.
Transforming through *yinyun*,
Roaring thunder and swift lightning.
At the call, instantly arrive,
Swiftly unleash the yang’s voice.
*Langming*, *Hubin*, *Duyin*, *Weilu*, *Chunyi*, *Shashe*.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the decree commands.

**Heavenly Thunder Spirit Incantation**
The Three Heavens nurture the origin,
The *Luminous Empyrean* executes justice.
Issuing commands to give life,
Responding above to the arrayed stars.
Rescuing you, Thunder Spirits,
Mobilizing wind and thunder.
The *Supreme Unity Emperor Lord*,
Summons your true numina.
At the first call, instantly arrive,
Descend to the Emperor’s court.

**Earthly Thunder Spirit Incantation**
Mysterious *qi* lingers and wanders,
The *Cinnabar Heaven’s* command is executed.
Roaring through the great void,
The Fire Decree is proclaimed.
*Yandu* receives the mandate,
Severing evil and preserving life.
Sternly driving the fire chariot,
Commanding the thunder soldiers.
The *Luminous Empyrean* descends to save,
Shaking the heavens with thunderous sound.

**Water Thunder Spirit Incantation**
From the *Verdant Prime Heaven*,
The decree descends to the *Luminous Empyrean*.
Whistling commands to wind and thunder,
Beheading evil and slaying demons.
Thunderclaps roar,
Yin and yang *qi* intermingle.
Lightning encircles,
Fire erupts in blazing flames.
The thunder chariot swiftly rises,
Descending from the distant skies.

**Divine Thunder Spirit Incantation**
The *Mysterious Sound of the Nine Heavens*,
Urgent summons to all spirits.
Assembling at the *Luminous Empyrean*,
Driving thunder and racing clouds.
Golden axes lead the vanguard,
Thunder drums hasten the charge.
The *Supreme Unity* executes justice,
Deploying the thunder soldiers.
Answering the talismanic command,
Sweeping away demonic essences.

**Earth God’s Thunder Invocation**
Exalted *Luminous Empyrean*,
Commanding and restraining thunder.
Summoning the Three Realms,
Receiving the decree to execute justice.
The Earth Gods of the Nine Provinces,
Spirits who partake of blood offerings.
Assisting in the governance of yin and yang,
Roaring with the voice of heaven.
Answering the talismanic command,
Severing evil and preserving life.

**Thunder Talisman Incantation**
Fiery numen of thunder,
Fire’s radiance shines brilliantly.
Crimson clarity blazes,
Racing clouds and flowing bells.
The *Immortal Capital’s* decree descends,
Stars and constellations dim and brighten.
Black clouds densely gather,
Lightning and fire streak like meteors.
Golden axes spread in four directions,
Seizing and severing demonic essences.
At the first issuance of the heavenly decree,
Swiftly thunder, swiftly roar.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the decree commands.

**Summoning Thunder Incantation**
Oṃ, *Tianhuang Jiaye Pili Shezha* [syllables] *Hūṃ*,
Four-eyed, nine-hideous ones,
Thunder’s sound, lightning’s fire seize.
Oṃ, *Amojia Piluzuonang Mahamu*.
*Natai Moli*, [syllables] *Luomoshi*.
*Falamiduoye Hūṃ*, Oṃ Lī Hūṃ Oṃ Lī Hūṃ,
Lī Hūṃ Oṃ Oṃ Lī, Oṃ Oṃ Lī Hūṃ Hūṃ.
[Syllables] *Yāngyāng Wēi*, *Yán Yè Huǒ*.
*Tán Yín* [syllables] *Yōng*, *Yǎng Yāng*.

chunks.original_text: 玞璹唵，天黑呵哩。 啰摩耶地，白杰陀耶伽梵。 运雷咒 唵天皇伽耶霹雳摄。 唵霹雳伽耶天皇，唵唵哩吽，唵哩吽哩吽，唵唵哩唵唵吽，唵吽吽昨吽，唵唵哩唵吽吽，皇天伽耶霹雳，唵唵霹雳伽耶天皇，吽天耶历伽霹雳敕，天霹雳梵耶。 伽哩吽吽哩，唵唵吽吽哩吽。 皇天救煞摄。 起雷咒 唵吽吽波咤波伽马展吉利顺帝音菩提野伽末伽火支火鉥火轮盘盘嘉律台台审审诛诛白灵和护帝叱咤婆推诃金头宾罗郭吉刀真如帝微砂三昧乌精火尼帝蘗帝诃俱尼俱尼婆苏咤诃。 雷经上篇咒 太上太清，皇老帝君。 唵风火雷兵，赫咤大神。 唵都胪呢□，唵黑煞哪□。 皇天生我，皇地载我。 日月照我，星辰荣我。 诸仙举我，司命与我。 太乙任我，玉宸召我。 三官保我，五帝卫我。 □□随我，天官辅我。 受法灵童，地官有敕。 雷部侍我，水官有令。 火炁合凝，诸龙听我。 上彻玉清，都天五将。 啖雷发声，玉帝有救。 南辰佐我，北斗辅我。 金童侍我，玉女从我。 六甲直我，六丁进我。 天门开我，地户通我。 山泽容我，江河渡我。 风雨送我，神乐助我。 四圣辅我，雷电随我。 八卦遵我，九宫遁我。 阴阳宗我，五行扶我。 四时成我，唵吽咭咤。 披头散发，各变真形。 天蓬元帅，宝印牒我。 天猷元帅，仗剑卫我。 翊圣真君，持戟守我。 玄天真武，水火助我。 四渎护我，九龙绕我。 甘雨送我，当火随我。 闪电照我，二十四炁轮将直我。 吾身神光，虚梵日月，与天为誓。 □□□□唵□明神唵咇咣敕煞摄。 雷经中篇咒 唵嚤咤□，唵□□辅星，唵咭□ 咤，唵摄馘咤，唵咽炁和。 中养三魂，内育七魄。 雷公电母，随鼓而击。 唵飞羽毛咤，摄铜牙铁爪。 唵充南北，摄至东西。 临色仄，馘逐飞空。 黄中理炁，黑暗荡荡。 震起斗牛，鬼哭神愁。 三令闭塞，六甲徘徊。 金神腾驾，木郎大神。 水充玄户，火降离明。 土安五宫，日月朗明。 龙虎交横，风雨应生。 江海倒逆，山岳摧倾。 冲天破地，万丈兴行。 所求者得，所向者亨。 所为者合，所谋者成。 天罡大圣，河魁尊神。 种种变化，与道合真。 何神不使，何令不行。 左有青龙，右有白虎。 前有朱雀，后有玄武。 上顶华盖，下蹑魁罡。 神通光严，威镇十方。 爱我者生，恶我者殃。 谋我者死，憎我者亡。 灵童神女，破邪金刚。 三千六百，常在我傍。 执节捧符，与我同游。 太上摄京，天大吉昌，二十四符，与星历俱。 驱龙跨虎，收斩妖精。 稍有违令，牒送雷霆。 急急速速摄。 雷经下篇咒 太上太清，皇老帝君。 唵嗔咤命，啰□阿修陀啰嚤嗔呤□。 北帝黑煞，严赫威神。 轰天霹雳，救乾元敕晶摄。 负风猛吏，追风使者，风伯道彰，赶龙奔雾，风神速兴。 引雷使者，电光发兴。 风起巽户，罡布箕星。 三台辅我，飞雷震惊。 风伯雨师，急降黑云。 雷公电母，掣电光明。 五雷众将，鼓舞乾坤。 搜罗天地，五岳皆惊。 所往无虞，入海天门开，入河地户出。 九天敕令，都天元帅。 唵欻火奉命五帝雷公，霹雳雷公，阴阳雷公，四令雷公，六甲雷公，发水雷公，八风雷公，十两雷公，六道雷公，闪电雷公，兴风雨公，行雨雷公，五岳雷公，四渎雷公，八节雷公，六候雷公，大川雷公，溪谷雷公，江河雷公，四海雷公，鸣鼓雷公，轰雷雷公，火车雷公，大轮雷公，移山雷公，走石雷公，兴云雷公，洒雨雷公，行雪雷公，布霜雷公，打瘟雷公，驱邪雷公，光明雷公，黑暗雷公，火印雷公，破阵雷公。

Oṃ *Pilī Jiaye Tianhuang*, Oṃ Oṃ Lī Hūṃ, Oṃ Lī Hūṃ Lī Hūṃ,

*Tian Pili Fanye*.
*Jiālī Hūṃ Hūṃ Lī*, Oṃ Oṃ Hūṃ Hūṃ Lī Hūṃ.
*Huangtian Jiushā She*.

**Raising Thunder Incantation**
Oṃ Hūṃ Hūṃ *Bozha Bojia Mazhan Jili Shundi Yin Putiye Qiemo Jia Huozhi Huoshu Huolun Panpan Jialü Taitai Shenshen Zhuzhu Bailing Hehu Dichizha Potui He Jintou Binluo Guoji Dao Zhenru Diwei Sha Sanmei Wujing Huoni Dibo Ke Dihe Juni Juni Posuzha He*.

**Thunder Scripture: Upper Scroll Incantation**
Supreme Highest Clarity,
August Elder Emperor Lord.
Oṃ, Wind-Fire-Thunder Soldiers,
Fierce *Hezha* Great Spirits.
Oṃ *Dulu Ni* [syllables], Oṃ *Heisha Na* [syllables].
August Heaven births me,
August Earth bears me.
Sun and Moon illuminate me,
Stars and constellations honor me.
All immortals lift me,
Life Controller accompanies me.
Great Unity empowers me,
Jade Palace summons me.
Three Officials protect me,
Five Emperors guard me.
[Syllables] follow me,
Heavenly Officials assist me.
Dharma-receiving spirit youths,
Earth Officials hold decrees.
Thunder Division attends me,
Water Officials issue commands.
Fire *qi* congeals,
All dragons heed me.
Ascend to Jade Clarity,
All-Heaven Five Generals.
Thunder’s roar resounds,
Jade Emperor grants salvation.
Southern Stars aid me,
Northern Dipper assists me.
Golden Youths serve me,
Jade Maidens follow me.
Six Jia guide me,
Six Ding advance me.
Heaven’s gates open for me,
Earth’s portals clear for me.
Mountains and marshes shelter me,
Rivers and streams ferry me.
Wind and rain escort me,
Divine music aids me.
Four Sages assist me,
Thunder and lightning follow me.
Eight Trigrams obey me,
Nine Palaces conceal me.
Yin-Yang venerates me,
Five Phases support me.
Four Seasons perfect me,
Oṃ Hūṃ *Jizha*.
Disheveled and unbound,
Each transforms to true form.
Heavenly Peng Marshal,
Treasure seal decrees me.
Heavenly You Marshal,
Sword in hand defends me.
Assisting Sage Lord,
Halberd in guard protects me.
Mysterious Heavenly Zhenwu,
Water and fire assist me.
Four Waterways guard me,
Nine Dragons encircle me.
Sweet rain escorts me,
Scorching fire follows me.
Lightning flashes for me,
Twenty-Four *Qi* Wheel Generals guide me.
My body’s divine radiance,
Void’s Brahman sun and moon,
Swear oath with Heaven.
[Syllables] Oṃ [syllables] *Mingshen* Oṃ *Bigung Chi Sha She*.

**Thunder Scripture: Middle Scroll Incantation**
Oṃ *Mozha* [syllables], Oṃ [syllables] *Fuxing*,
Oṃ *Ji* [syllables] *Zha*, Oṃ *Sheguo Zha*, Oṃ *Yanqi He*.
Within nourish three *hun*,
Internally cultivate seven *po*.
Thunder Duke and Lightning Mother,
Strike with the drum’s beat.
Oṃ *Feiyu Maozha*,
Seize copper fangs and iron claws.
Oṃ fill south and north,
Seize to east and west.
Confronting the perilous path,
Seize and pursue through flying skies.
Yellow Center governs *qi*,
Black darkness surges.
Thunder rises in Dipper and Ox,
Ghosts wail and spirits grieve.
Three Commands seal,
Six Jia wander.
Metal Spirit soars,
Wood Youth Great Spirit.
Water fills Mysterious Portal,
Fire descends from Radiant Clarity.
Earth stabilizes Five Palaces,
Sun and Moon shine bright.
Dragon and Tiger intertwine,
Wind and rain respond and arise.
Rivers and seas invert,
Mountains and peaks topple.
Piercing Heaven and breaking Earth,
Ten-thousand fathoms advance.
What is sought is attained,
What is faced prospers.
What is done aligns,
What is plotted succeeds.
Heavenly Stem Great Sage,
River Stalwart Venerable Spirit.
Myriad transformations,
Merge with the Dao in truth.
What spirit does not serve?
What command does not proceed?
Left, Azure Dragon;
Right, White Tiger.
Before, Vermilion Bird;
Behind, Dark Warrior.
Above, canopy of blossoms;
Below, tread upon *Kuigang*.
Divine power radiant and stern,
Majesty reigns in ten directions.
Those who love me live,
Those who hate me suffer calamity.
Those who plot against me die,
Those who resent me perish.
Spirit youths and divine maidens,
Diamond warriors shatter evil.
Three thousand six hundred,
Ever at my side.
Holding tablets and bearing talismans,
Roam with me in company.
Supreme seizes the capital,
Heaven greatly auspicious,
Twenty-Four Talismans,
Accord with stellar reckoning.
Drive dragons and ride tigers,
Seize and sever demonic essences.
Should any disobey the command,
Decree sent to thunder’s might.
Swiftly, swiftly seize.

**Thunder Scripture: Lower Scroll Incantation**
Supreme Highest Clarity,
August Elder Emperor Lord.
Oṃ *Chenzha Ming*, *Luo* [syllables] *Axiu Tuoluo Mozhen Ling* [syllables].
Northern Emperor Black Slayer,
Stern and majestic mighty spirit.
Thunderous *Pili* shakes Heaven,
Rescue *Qianyuan Chi* decree’s crystal seize.
Bearing-wind fierce officers,
Wind-chasing messengers,
Wind Earl’s Dao proclaimed,
Chasing dragons and racing mists,
Wind spirits swiftly arise.
Thunder-drawing messengers,
Lightning’s radiance bursts forth.
Wind rises in *Xun*’s portal,
*Gang* spreads in *Ji*’s stars.
Three Terraces assist me,
Flying thunder startles.
Wind Earl and Rain Master,
Swiftly descend black clouds.
Thunder Duke and Lightning Mother,
Wield lightning’s brilliance.
Five Thunder hosts,
Drum and dance Heaven and Earth.
Search and net the cosmos,
Five Peaks all tremble.
Wherever I go, no peril,
Entering seas, Heaven’s gates open;
Entering rivers, Earth’s portals emerge.
Nine Heavens’ decree,
All-Heaven Primordial Marshal.
Oṃ *Xuhuo* obeys Five Emperors’ Thunder Duke,
*Pili* Thunder Duke,
Yin-Yang Thunder Duke,
Four Commands Thunder Duke,
Six Jia Thunder Duke,
Water-Releasing Thunder Duke,
Eight Winds Thunder Duke,
Ten Liang Thunder Duke,
Six Paths Thunder Duke,
Lightning Flash Thunder Duke,
Wind-Raising Rain Duke,
Rain-Bringing Thunder Duke,
Five Peaks Thunder Duke,
Four Waterways Thunder Duke,
Eight Nodes Thunder Duke,
Six Seasons Thunder Duke,
Great Rivers Thunder Duke,
Valleys and Ravines Thunder Duke,
Rivers and Streams Thunder Duke,
Four Seas Thunder Duke,
Drum-Beating Thunder Duke,
Thunderous Thunder Duke,
Fire Chariot Thunder Duke,
Great Wheel Thunder Duke,
Mountain-Moving Thunder Duke,
Stone-Rolling Thunder Duke,
Cloud-Raising Thunder Duke,
Rain-Sprinkling Thunder Duke,
Snow-Bringing Thunder Duke,
Frost-Spreading Thunder Duke,
Plague-Striking Thunder Duke,
Evil-Driving Thunder Duke,
Radiant Thunder Duke,

chunks.original_text: 福禄如川，金玉丰隆，所求皆至。 世间之宝，由吾所需。 天下鬼神，受吾所驱。 有一不从，雷斧速诛。 明离大神，有功之日，名书上清。 身中之神，自然清净。 太玄保举，玉班有名。 前排力士，后拥天丁。 驱雷霹雳，飞走火铃。 城隍社令，不得留停。 啼啰萨咤，驱役天丁。 五方使者，霹雳大神，敕告奉行。 急急如太上太清皇老帝君律令。 乾天霹雳咒 魁天霹雳，驱列九州。 令合乾坤，飞渎天而可赦。 九州社令，禀令於玉清之道。 飞雷光电吏之神，火光连天万丈。 雷公大将军，随吾令，变霹雳横飞。 勾天列神使者严广，飞震直乾坤。 烈面使者狡天，霹雳横交。 西方律令欻火伯温直符，猛吏赵公明，走吏奔星下听命。 使者田文清，驱火霹雳使者田文广，折木使者冯夷，雷公大将军阎世冲，九州社令，十反太一灵官，地反五岳催神，霹雳走天，立地驱剑，而霹雳轰轰，天蓬黑煞。 急急。 驱雷咒 雷光猛电，欻火流星。 付臣诸将，烈面南行。 勾面使者，立荡乾坤。 烈面使者，敷散乾灵。 掷目使者，撼动雷神。 争目使者，烈阵布营。 八杀威猛，追到翼星。 神兵队队，九天敕命。 敢不从命，破灭汝形。 追雷咒 天雷荡荡，敷烈九州。 上撼玉清，下彻北酆。 七十二将，五部列神。 前有金庭，玉辂后摆。 紫府元君，直雷元明使者，急奉元君，驱雷浩荡，霹雳轰轰。 速召谢道、伯温李仲清、黄天佑、追翼星关伯正行，驱列乾坤，火急奉行。 立报咒 天昏地列，飞镇乾坤。 雷公翼星，天佑正行。 我今使汝，速速作声。 急急。 誓雷神咒 汝等雷神，各有职名。 雷火天佑，各守其职。 吾守九天玄命，霹雳横精，驱雷大发，威镇乾坤，八煞遵命。 欻火伯温烈面使者，敕号仲清。 九天使者，田朴尊神，莫错使者，统我令行，召九天直符使者谢佑，霹雳荡荡，威镇乾坤。 我今召汝，不得有违。 敕符咒 天帝符命，令下雷霆。 伐恶馘毒，破庙除形。 邪神妖怪，敢当敢临。 霹雳大将，辅吾道法，速赐通灵。 又 天威地威，神威灵威。 元始上真，五老高尊。 太平皓范，洞朗八门。 五帝告命，无幽不闻。 上御帝君，中制酆山。 下领河海，十二水源。 八威神咒，灵简玉篇。 召龙负水，收炁聚云。 斩魔遣鬼，扫荡妖氛。 万精堕落，所请速临。 急急如律令。 翼星血杀咒 天影神祇，血杀星君，血刃星君，血毒星君，血检星君，四星皓大，日月长明。 天有五星，天心合我，地心合我。 某今统令，霹雳乾坤。 速召东方甲乙木青玄倒生雷帝，福生无检，翼星长行，血公动天，霹雳常行，常起雷火，驱震乾坤。 翼星将军阎某，变都天律令，欻火遣乾坤，起太阳真火邓化，火光万丈，烧遍乾坤。 火精宋无忌，火光万丈，分别乾坤。 吾有三千六百长随我行统，七十二将，三十六令。 刑有天狱，正有霹雳。 天雷诸将，我不负汝，汝莫负吾。 世民乾旱，雨泽不行。 人民失业，苗稼可忧。 地皮枯裂，蝗虫大作，化为微尘。 天令地令，人令雷令，统五方真令。 五岳摧形，诸天将佐，血印神君，雷声一发，雷公将军，撒风致雨。 木郎正行，散花瑶池，飞出乾坤。 木郎一至，霹雳轰飞。 我今有敕，不得久停。 九天驱龙使者严广，摧山侧目，呼天地鬼神不行，叫天地雷震雷神，霹雳正飞，天地日月，昏暗乾坤。
chunks.translated_text:
May fortune and emolument flow like rivers,
gold and jade abound in profusion—
all that is sought shall come to pass.
The treasures of the world
are mine to command.
All spirits under heaven
obey my summons.
Should any refuse,
the thunder-axe shall swiftly strike.

When the Radiant Li Great Spirit achieves merit,
his name shall be inscribed in the Upper Clarity.
The gods within the body
shall naturally be pure and serene.
Recommended by the Great Mystery,
his name shall be recorded among the Jade Court.
Before him stand the Mighty Warriors,
behind him press the Heavenly Soldiers.
He commands thunder and lightning,
wields flying fire-bells.
City gods and earth spirits
dare not linger.
*Tilo satha*, dispatch the Heavenly Soldiers!
Messengers of the Five Directions,
Great Lightning Spirits of the Thunderclap—
proclaim and execute this decree!
Hasten, hasten, in accordance with the Law of the Supreme Lord of the Great Clarity, the August Emperor of the Primordial!

---

**Prayer of the Qian-Heaven Thunderclap**
Mighty Heaven’s Thunderclap,
driving across the Nine Provinces!
Let your command unite heaven and earth,
fly through the celestial rivers and grant absolution.
The earth spirits of the Nine Provinces
receive their charge from the Dao of Jade Clarity.
Spirits of flying thunder, lightning, and radiance—
firelight blazes ten thousand leagues across the sky.
Great General of the Thunder Lords,
follow my command and unleash flying thunderbolts!
Divine Envoys Gou Tian and Lie Shen,
Yan Guang—fly and shake heaven and earth!
Fierce-faced Envoy Jiao Tian,
thunderbolts crisscross the sky.
From the West, the Law’s Fire Earl Wen Zhi,
Marshal Zhao Gongming,
and the swift Envoy Ben Xing—descend and heed my call!
Envoy Tian Wenqing,
Fire-Thunder Envoy Tian Wenguang,
Wood-Splitting Envoy Feng Yi,
Great General of the Thunder Lords Yan Shichong,
earth spirits of the Nine Provinces,
Tenfold Reversed Grand Unity Divine Officers,
Five Peaks’ Earth-Reversed Urgent Spirits—
thunderbolts race across the heavens,
instantly driving swords into the earth,
while thunder roars and rolls,
and the Heavenly Dark Marshal Tianpeng looms.
Hasten, hasten!

---

**Prayer for Commanding Thunder**
Fierce lightning and swift meteors,
I entrust you, my generals!
Fierce-faced, march to the south.
Hook-faced Envoys,
uproot heaven and earth!
Fierce-faced Envoys,
scatter the numinous powers of Qian.
Glaring-eyed Envoys,
shake the Thunder Gods!
Contending-eyed Envoys,
array your battle formations.
Eightfold Slayers, fierce and mighty,
pursue to the Wing Star!
Divine soldiers in ranks,
under the Nine Heavens’ decree—
dare you disobey?
Your forms shall be shattered!

---

**Prayer for Pursuing Thunder**
Heavenly thunder surges,
scattering its might across the Nine Provinces!
Above, it ascends to Jade Clarity;
below, it pierces through Northern Feng.
Seventy-two Generals,
the gods of the Five Divisions arrayed—
ahead, the Golden Court;
behind, the Jade Chariot trails.
The Purple Palace’s Primordial Lady,
Direct Thunder’s Primordial Brightness Envoys—
hasten to obey the Primordial Lady!
Drive the surging thunder,
roaring thunderbolts!
Swiftly summon Xie Dao,
Bo Wen Li Zhongqing,
Huang Tianyou,
and Wing Star Marshal Guan Bozheng—
command the array of heaven and earth,
execute with utmost urgency!

---

**Prayer for Immediate Response**
Heaven darkens, earth splits,
flying to stabilize heaven and earth!
Thunder Lord of the Wing Star,
Heavenly Blessing’s Righteous March—
I now dispatch you:
make haste, make haste!

---

**Oath of the Thunder Gods**
You, Thunder Gods,
each with your appointed names—
Thunderfire and Heavenly Blessing,
each guard your post!
I uphold the Mysterious Mandate of the Nine Heavens,
thunderbolts flashing with essence,
thunder roaring forth,
mightily subduing heaven and earth—
the Eight Slayers obey my command!
Fire Earl Wen, Fierce-faced Envoy,
styled Zhongqing by decree.
Nine Heavens’ Envoys,
Tian Pu, Venerable Spirit,
Mo Cuo Envoys—
unify my commands!
Summon the Nine Heavens’ Direct Talisman Envoys Xie You—
thunder surges,
mightily subduing heaven and earth!
I now summon you—
dare not disobey!

---

**Talisman Prayer**
By the Heavenly Emperor’s talismanic command,
thunder descends!
Strike down evil, sever poison,
shatter temples, obliterate forms.
Dare any demonic spirits or malevolent specters
oppose or approach?
Great Generals of Thunder,
aid my Daoist arts—
swiftly grant spiritual efficacy!

---

**Again:**
Heaven’s might, earth’s might,
divine might, numinous might!
Primordial Supreme Perfected,
Five Elders of Lofty Honor—
Great Peace’s luminous model,
illuminating the Eight Gates!
The Five Emperors proclaim the mandate—
no darkness remains unheard.
Above, the August Lord governs;
at the center, Feng Mountain is controlled;
below, rivers and seas are commanded,
the twelve water sources ruled.
Eightfold Might’s Divine Prayer,
Spirit Tablet and Jade Scripture—
summon dragons to bear water,
gather qi and amass clouds!
Slay demons, dispatch ghosts,
sweep away malevolent vapors!
Let all myriad spirits fall—
hasten to arrive as summoned!
Hasten, hasten, in accordance with the Law!

---

**Wing Star’s Blood-Slaying Prayer**
Heaven’s Shadow Divine Spirits,
Blood-Slaying Star Lords,
Blood-Blade Star Lords,
Blood-Poison Star Lords,
Blood-Inspecting Star Lords—
four stars vast and bright,
sun and moon eternally radiant!
Heaven’s Five Stars,
heaven’s heart aligns with mine,
earth’s heart aligns with mine.
I now command—
thunderbolts shake heaven and earth!
Swiftly summon the Eastern Wood’s Azure Mystery Reversed-Birth Thunder Emperor,
Fortune-Generating Unbounded,
Wing Star’s Eternal March—
Blood Lords stir the heavens,
thunderbolts ever active,
thunderfire ever rising,
driving and shaking heaven and earth!
Wing Star General Yan,
transform the Capital Heaven’s Law—
fire dispatches heaven and earth!
Rise, True Fire of the Great Yang, Deng Hua—
firelight ten thousand leagues,
scorching all under heaven!
Fire Spirit Song Wuji,
firelight ten thousand leagues,
distinguishing heaven and earth!
I have three thousand six hundred followers,
seventy-two generals,
thirty-six decrees!
Punishment has its heavenly prison,
justice has its thunderbolts!
Heavenly Thunder Generals—
I shall not fail you;
do not fail me!

---

**For Drought in the World:**
The world suffers drought,
rain does not fall.
People lose their livelihoods,
crops wither in sorrow.
The earth cracks,
locusts swarm,
transforming into fine dust.
Heaven’s decree, earth’s decree,
human decree, thunder’s decree—
command the Five Directions’ true decrees!
The Five Peaks collapse,
all heavenly generals and aides,
Blood Seal Divine Lords—
at the first roll of thunder,
Thunder Lord Generals,
scatter wind and bring rain!
Wood Lord’s Righteous March,
scatter flowers in Jasper Pool,
soar through heaven and earth!
When the Wood Lord arrives,
thunderbolts roar and fly!
I now issue this decree—
do not delay!

Nine Heavens’ Dragon-Driving Envoy Yan Guang,
overturn mountains, glare fiercely—
call upon heaven and earth’s ghosts and spirits to desist!
Summon heaven and earth’s thunder-shaking Thunder Gods—
thunderbolts fly true,
heaven and earth, sun and moon,
darken the world!

chunks.original_text: 急速报应。 五方咒 东方青玄道法雷帝，南方火光震门雷帝，西方白煞吊星雷帝，北方被发震雷雷帝，中央戊己雷帝。 五帝之君，五帝之名。 吾统五令，火急奉行。 九天动雷咒 唵啴哔叱□咤嗫，天皇、地皇、人皇，天人皇、地人皇、人人皇，唵皇帝君，叱哩嗫天阳雷、地阴雷，鬼神无处藏。 闻吾呼召，疾速降，飞火流星合帝君，咤吽吽，唵呜唵哒哆吁□咒，吃啰□哱嗫皇释加牟乎，叱天咤可奴吸啰魁罡噗咒，万鬼灭亡疾。 絣天烈雷咒 魁罡神力，霹雳轰轰。 五岳四渎，震定乾坤。 今日召汝，速来现形。 指挥烈雷，不得暂停。 急急如律令。 九天奔雷咒 九天阳阳，飞剑神王。 破禄三台，威摄四方。 黄神勾天，翼德亡神。 天摧倒地，裂海随文。 召汝雷神，奔雷奉行。 五雷敕咒 天雷天中起，地雷地中行。 神雷动五岳，水雷四海腾。 今年雷速起，密行五阙号，霹雳借神威。 神符所到处，万邪不敢生。 急急如律令。 又 西方律令，镇定乾坤。 奔天霹雳，火光速行。 伯温速降，镇定乾坤。 乾罗答那，威摄万灵。 吾左有天丁，右有六甲。 前有朱雀，后有玄武。 五方使者，捧拥吾行。 三十万兵，围吾九层。 碎尸千里，速扫不祥。 天门荡荡，队队天丁。 威镇十方，威摄九荒。 敢有邪鬼，化作微尘。 神将西方欻火邓伯温，跨火龙金睛猛电，捧烧火光万里。 敢有不正之邪鬼，速为吾烧着，化作微尘。 急急如敕命。 霹雳咒 霹雳乘龙驾黑云，六丁驱涌出帝轩。 万马奔雷震天地，火蛇吐焰魔鬼潜。 左玄日阳散玉历，右玄月阴飞金篇。 五湖连枻如裂帛，大震三声涌水泉。 霹雳雷公听我召，召命正出雷轰权。 天雷十二化为霹雳，唵黑黑□□摄。 地雷十二化为霹雳，唵飞飞骨骨摄。 水雷十二化为霹雳，唵坤坤摄。 九天击伐都烈咒 雷光威猛，风雨之精。 乾天雷电，摄之立至。 救九天元命，飞雷镇定乾坤。 东方箕星尊，南方火轮壁，西方白吊星，北方黑镇星，驱轮日月摄将兵。 律令敕行。 召太乙十神咒 神炁灵灵，威镇万星。 天门通我，五岳通人。 左有青龙，右有白虎。 速召太乙十神，各听姓名。 急疾。 书符咒 天笔灵灵，神笔合神。 写神神至，写鬼灭形。 上清有敕，化鬼微尘。 土宿真煞，速降威灵。 急急如律令。 摄邪咒 五雷使者，五丁都司。 悬空大圣，霹雳轰轰。 朝天五岳，镇定乾坤。 敢有不从，令斩汝魂。 急急如律令。 缚邪符咒 黑面雷公，黑杀天兵。 四直驱斗，阳神步罡。 北斗将军，卫我身形。 布炁长存，闪电驱兵。 三千六百，五行尊神。 头分日月，照破星营。 诸天神祇，为吾摄来附身。 急急如律令。 太阳咒 太阳星帅，威震扶桑。 奉轰天敕，运用雷霆。 承飞符摄，急速奉行。 木星咒 岁华木德，威震轰霆。 发生万物，鼓动潜灵。 将兵飞摄，用以灵文。 火星咒 荧惑立法，总司火权。 威光万丈，烧灭精灵。 随符下应，摄附人身。 金星咒 太白星帅，权震西方。 主司兵柄，白芒耀光。 奉承轰命，摄除祸殃。 水星咒 水德伺晨，禀命雷轰。 洞阴水府，九江九溟。 遵承符告，诛减祸精。 土星咒 中央土宿，总摄四方。 黄中理炁，奉命帝房。 从天下降，飞摄祸殃。 神首咒 交初神首，列耀中天。 威光所到，山裂石穿。 神通广大，速赴坛前。 神尾咒

Swift retribution be!

**Five Directions’ Incantation**
East: Azure Mystery Daoist Thunder Thearch,
South: Fiery Radiance Shock-Gate Thunder Thearch,
West: White Execution Hanging-Star Thunder Thearch,
North: Disheveled Thunderclap Thunder Thearch,
Center: Wu-Ji Thunder Thearch.
Lords of the Five Thearchs,
Names of the Five Thearchs.
I command the Five Decrees—
execute with utmost haste!

**Nine Heavens’ Thunder-Moving Incantation**
Oṃ dhāṃ bhiḥ cchaḥ □ caṇaḥ,
Heavenly August, Earthly August, Human August,
Heaven-Human August, Earth-Human August, Human-Human August,
Oṃ August Emperor Lord,
Chi li nie—Heaven’s Yang Thunder, Earth’s Yin Thunder,
no ghost or spirit may hide.
Hear my summons—
descend swiftly!
Flying fire and shooting stars, unite with the Thearch Lord,
Cha hūṃ hūṃ, Oṃ ūṃ oṃ da do xū □ incantation,
Chi luo □ bo nie August Śakra Kāmadeva,
Chi tian cha ke nu xi luo Kuí Gāng pu incantation—
ten thousand ghosts perish instantly!

**Heaven-Shaking Mighty Thunder Incantation**
Mighty power of Kuí Gāng,
thunderbolts roar and crash!
Five Peaks and Four Waterways,
stabilize heaven and earth.
I summon you today—
appear without delay!
Command the fierce thunder,
halt not for even a moment.
Hasten as the law decrees!

**Nine Heavens’ Galloping Thunder Incantation**
Nine Heavens’ Yang and Yang,
Flying Sword Divine King.
Shatter the Three Terraces,
overawe the Four Directions.
Yellow Spirit hooks heaven,
Winged Virtue annihilates spirits.
Heaven collapses to earth,
seas split asunder—follow the scripture!
I summon you, Thunder Gods—
gallop forth with thunder, obey!

**Five Thunders’ Decree-Incantation**
Heavenly thunder rises in the sky,
earthly thunder courses through the land.
Divine thunder stirs the Five Peaks,
water thunder surges through the Four Seas.
This year, thunder swiftly arises,
stealthily traversing the Five Gates’ names—
thunderbolts borrow divine might!
Where the spirit talisman arrives,
no evil dares arise.
Hasten as the law decrees!

**Further Incantation**
Western law decrees,
stabilize heaven and earth!
Galloping celestial thunderbolts,
fiery radiance speeds forth.
Bo Wen, descend swiftly—
stabilize heaven and earth!
Qian Luo Da Na,
overawe the ten thousand spirits!
To my left: Heavenly Soldiers,
to my right: Six Jia.
Before me: Vermilion Bird,
behind me: Dark Warrior.
Envoys of the Five Directions,
surround and escort my march.
Three hundred thousand troops,
encircle me ninefold.
Shatter corpses for a thousand miles,
sweep away misfortune without delay!
Heaven’s gates vast and open,
ranks of Heavenly Soldiers arrayed.
Overawe the Ten Directions,
command the Nine Wastes!
Should any demonic ghost dare resist,
reduce it to fine dust!
Divine General Deng Bo Wen of the Western Sudden Fire,
riding a fire dragon with golden eyes and fierce lightning,
bearing burning radiance for ten thousand miles—
should any unrighteous demonic ghost dare oppose,
burn it to ashes at once!
Hasten as the decree commands!

**Thunderbolt Incantation**
Thunderbolts ride dragons, drive black clouds,
Six Ding drive forth from the Thearch’s hall.
Ten thousand horses gallop—thunder shakes heaven and earth,
fire serpents spew flames—demons and ghosts retreat in hiding.
Left Mystery: Sun’s Yang scatters the Jade Calendar,
Right Mystery: Moon’s Yin flies the Golden Register.
Five Lakes’ oars snap like torn silk,
three great quakes surge forth springs!
Thunderbolt Lord Thunder Duke, heed my call—
my summons issues the thunder’s sovereign power!
Heaven’s twelve thunders transform into thunderbolts—
Oṃ black black □□ seize!
Earth’s twelve thunders transform into thunderbolts—
Oṃ fly fly bone bone seize!
Water’s twelve thunders transform into thunderbolts—
Oṃ □□ kun kun seize!

**Nine Heavens’ Striking and Subduing Mighty Incantation**
Thunder’s light fierce and mighty,
essence of wind and rain.
Heaven’s thunder and lightning—
seize and they arrive instantly!
Save the Nine Heavens’ primordial destiny,
flying thunder stabilizes heaven and earth!
East: Boxiang Star Lord,
South: Fiery Wheel Wall,
West: White Hanging Star,
North: Black Quelling Star—
drive the wheels of sun and moon, seize the generals!
Execute as the law decrees!

**Summoning the Ten Supreme Gods Incantation**
Divine qi, numinous and bright,
overawing the ten thousand stars!
Heaven’s gates open to me,
Five Peaks commune with humanity.
To my left: Azure Dragon,
to my right: White Tiger.
Swiftly summon the Ten Supreme Gods—
each heed your names!
Hasten without delay!

**Talisman-Writing Incantation**
Heaven’s brush, numinous and bright,
divine brush unites with the divine.
Write the gods—they arrive,
write the ghosts—their forms vanish!
Upper Clarity’s decree—
transform ghosts to fine dust!
Earthly Host True Executioner,
descend swiftly with your mighty spirit!
Hasten as the law decrees!

**Seizing Evil Incantation**
Envoys of the Five Thunders,
Five Ding Commanders.
Suspended-in-Heaven Great Sage,
thunderbolts roar and crash!
Facing heaven: Five Peaks,
stabilize heaven and earth!
Should any dare disobey,
I order your souls be slain!
Hasten as the law decrees!

**Binding Evil Talisman-Incantation**
Black-faced Thunder Duke,
Black Execution Heavenly Soldiers.
Four Directs drive the Dipper,
Yang spirits pace the steps.
Northern Dipper General,
guard my form!
Disseminate qi eternally,
lightning drives the troops!
Three thousand six hundred,
Five Phases’ honored spirits.
Head crowned with sun and moon,
illuminating and shattering the stars’ encampment.
All heavenly gods and deities—
seize and bind them to my body!
Hasten as the law decrees!

**Great Sun Incantation**
Great Sun Star Marshal,
might shakes Fusang!
Receiving the thunderous celestial decree,
wielding thunder and lightning.
Bearing the flying talisman’s command—
execute swiftly!

**Wood Star Incantation**
Year’s glory, Wood’s virtue,
might shakes thunder and lightning!
Giving rise to the ten thousand things,
stirring the hidden spirits.
Leading troops in flight and seizure—
employ this numinous scripture!

**Fire Star Incantation**
Mars establishes the law,
governing fire’s authority.
Radiance spans ten thousand miles,
burning and extinguishing spirits!
Responding to the talisman’s descent—
seize and bind to the body!

**Metal Star Incantation**
Great White Star Marshal,
authority shakes the West!
Governing the handle of war,
white radiance shines brilliantly.
Receiving the thunderous decree—
seize and eliminate calamities!

**Water Star Incantation**
Water’s virtue awaits dawn,
receiving the thunderous decree!
Abyssal Yin Water Palace,
Nine Rivers and Nine Seas—
obeying the talisman’s proclamation,
execute and diminish calamitous spirits!

**Earth Star Incantation**
Central Earthly Host,
governing and seizing the Four Directions!
Yellow Center regulates qi,
receiving the Thearch’s chamber’s decree.
Descending from heaven—
fly and seize calamities!

**Divine Head Incantation**
Intersecting Primordial Divine Head,
arrayed and shining in the central sky!
Where its mighty radiance reaches,
mountains split and stones pierce!
Divine power vast and great—
hasten to the altar’s front!

**Divine Tail Incantation**

chunks.original_text: 交终神尾，威撼山川。 黑炁飞踊，冲塞九天。 吾今默召，神勇自然。 紫炁咒 道曜紫炁，降福无穷。 轰天正令，制鬼除凶。 神光所照，降格玄穹。 月孛咒 威彗神猛，震断九天。 神剑挥击，鬼灭九泉。 奉承轰令，不得留连。 运斗咒 北斗七星，震定威灵。 北斗七星，正一真人。 北斗七星，贪狼巨门。 北斗七星，文曲星君。 北斗七星，上撼乾坤。 北斗七星，霹雳轰轰。 北斗七星，五雷令行。 北斗七星，天罗地网。 北斗七星，病人长生。 北斗七星，听令施行。 北斗七星，皇天生人。 北斗七星，五星列行。 北斗七星，霹鬼来星。 北斗七星，步斗天门。 北斗七星，摆定乾坤。 急急如律令。 六甲神将咒 六甲雷公，威镇乾坤。 摧海六丁，六丁之尊。 天昏地裂，六合有兵。 乾坤大圣，六甲之神。 黄天奔雷，行天三十六路，变行三十六坤。 神传一令，火急奉行。 急急如律令。 轰天咒 斗牛之星，柳鬼之精。 二十八宿，搅天而下。 破魔断鬼，回光返形。 驱轮日月，摄聚万兵。 诸天帅将，准听令行。 急急如律令。 安神咒 主定帝敕，扫荡乾坤。 二十八宿，横列七星。 乾坤启斗，飞天狼乾。 坎离之主，步列天兵。 左为天契，右为天权。 雷兵将佐，不得久停。 急急如律令。 都令咒 黄神聚将，令出轰天。 十一大曜，纪律明严。 各领号令，冲击照行。 违者刑伶，斩霹行。 星帅咒 太一星帅，名震九天。 轰天受令，运化自然。 斥咤风雨，山石川洪。 横身鼓舞，飞龙走乾。 大华震动，霹雳喧天。 罗计交击，水火漂然。 孛彗鼓勇，金火四腾。 木土造化，令出玄玄。 急急如律令。 太阳星帅，持权扶桑。 曦轮万里，烜赫东乡。 真符飞起，遍撒火光。 木星岁华，主领东方。 震宫惊蛰，运转雷房。 真符飞起，雷威作强。 荧惑执法，严驾驿騑。 持威三界，鬼神心危。 真符飞起，炎火速飞。 太白凌汉，游走八溟。 耀灵散彩，逃起刀兵。 真符飞起，邪魅丧精。 水德伺晨，总司水灵。 三江九河，湖海龙神。 真符飞起，洪波四倾。 中央土宿，总炁黄元。 帝君品命，四象完全。 真符飞起，地动山源。 神首罗喉，五帝推尊。 怒目一视，山岳摧崩。 真符飞起，地炁速腾。 神尾计都，黑炁震天。 昏日闭月，神威莫前。 真符飞起，雷雨随行。 天乙紫炁，道曜之尊。 解冲释恶，变祸移迍。 真符飞起，大法攸行。 孛彗流星，神勇威灵。 威南一叫，声震雷霆。 真符飞起，石裂山倾。 青阳慈悲，勘令之尊。 有敕传符，解释十神。 真符告下，威怒速停。 不得违抗，随敕奉行。 九霄上帝，发令奉行。 我行真符，冲击诸星。 流逆冲改，杀炁纷纷。 有敕传下，各安星扃。 急急如律令。 飞罡神咒 无上太清，玄元帝君。 保生护命，敕摄三魂。 灵符卫魄，立示鬼神。 令我朝阙，度我玄门。 请登玉庭，面侍高真。 往来分明，恭奏臣诚， 玉帝敕命。 急急奉行。 服五神符咒 玉府玄宫，紫气始青。 内炼三魂，台光安宁。 神宝玉室，与我俱生。 不得妄动，监神黄庭。 太灵守卫，若欲飞行。 形诣玉清，饥兮渴兮，吞饮玉晶。 急急如律令。 飞神咒 天朗气清，三光洞明。 金房玉室，五芝荣生。 玄灵紫盖，照映我形。 玉童玉女，为我致灵。 九帝齐景，三，光同軿。 得乘华盖，升入帝庭。 急急如律令。
chunks.translated_text:
**Divine Tail Incantation**
Intersecting Final Divine Tail,
its might shakes mountains and rivers!
Black qi leaps and surges,
thundering through the Nine Heavens.
Now I silently summon—
divine valor arises of itself.

**Purple Qi Incantation**
Dao’s radiance, purple qi,
descends with boundless blessing.
Thunderous celestial decree—
subdues demons and dispels misfortune.
Where its divine light shines,
it descends to the mysterious vault.

**Moon Comet Incantation**
Fierce and swift as a comet,
its shock splits the Nine Heavens.
Divine sword swings and strikes—
ghosts perish in the Nine Springs.
Receiving the thunderous decree,
none dare linger.

**Big Dipper Incantation**
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
their might and numen fixed.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
True One Perfected.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
Greedy Wolf and Great Gate.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
Wenqu Star Lord.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
shaking heaven and earth.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
thunder crashes and roars.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
Five Thunder decrees issue forth.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
heaven’s net and earth’s snare.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
the sick attain long life.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
hear the command and act.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
August Heaven births mankind.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
Five Stars arrayed in ranks.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
comet-star that smites ghosts.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
step the Dipper to Heaven’s Gate.
Northern Dipper’s seven stars,
stabilize heaven and earth.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Six Jia Spirit Generals Incantation**
Six Jia Thunder Lords,
their might rules heaven and earth.
Crushing seas, Six Ding—
Six Ding’s exalted ones.
Heaven darkens, earth splits,
the Six Directions bear arms.
Heaven and Earth’s Great Sages,
Six Jia’s spirits.
Yellow Heaven’s rushing thunder,
traversing thirty-six celestial paths,
transforming into thirty-six earthly domains.
A divine command is transmitted—
hasten to obey!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Thunderous Heaven Incantation**
Stars of Dipper and Ox,
essences of Willow and Ghost.
Twenty-Eight Constellations—
stirring heaven to descend.
Shatter demons, sever ghosts,
reverse light to restore form.
Drive the wheels of sun and moon,
gather the ten thousand hosts.
All heavenly marshals and generals—
obey the decree and act!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Spirit Pacification Incantation**
The Thearch’s decree governs and stabilizes,
sweeping through heaven and earth.
Twenty-Eight Constellations,
arrayed across the Seven Stars.
Heaven and Earth open the Dipper,
Flying Celestial Wolf ascends.
Masters of Kan and Li,
marching in ranks of heavenly soldiers.
Left, the Heavenly Contract;
right, the Heavenly Authority.
Thunder soldiers and generals—
do not tarry long!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Commander’s Decree**
Yellow Spirit gathers the generals,
the decree issues with thunderous might.
Eleven Great Luminaries,
discipline bright and strict.
Each leads their commands,
charging forth in radiant ranks.
Those who disobey—
punished by lightning’s swift blade!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Star Marshal Incantation**
Great One Star Marshal,
his name shakes the Nine Heavens.
Receiving the thunderous decree,
his transformations arise naturally.
Roaring winds and rains,
mountains, stones, rivers, and floods.
His body sways and dances,
flying dragons course through heaven.
Great Hua trembles,
thunder resounds through the skies.
Rahu and Ketu clash,
water and fire surge wildly.
Comets and meteors charge boldly,
metal and fire soar on all sides.
Wood and Earth create and transform—
the decree issues from the mysterious and profound!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Great Yang Star Marshal**
Holding authority, he supports Fusang,
his solar wheel spans ten thousand leagues,
glorious in the eastern quarter.
True talismans take flight,
scattering firelight everywhere.

**Wood Star’s Annual Splendor**
Presiding over the eastern direction,
startled insects stir in the Thunder Chamber.
True talismans take flight—
thunder’s might grows strong.

**Mars Enforces the Law**
Sternly driving his swift steeds,
wielding authority over the Three Realms—
ghosts and spirits tremble in fear.
True talismans take flight—
fiery flames fly swiftly.

**Venus Traverses the Han**
Wandering the Eight Seas,
its radiant spirit scatters brilliance,
awakening the blades of war.
True talismans take flight—
demonic essences perish.

**Water’s Virtue Awaits Dawn**
Governing the spirits of water,
the Three Rivers and Nine Streams,
lakes, seas, and dragon deities.
True talismans take flight—
floodwaves surge in all directions.

**Central Earthly Host**
Governing qi’s Yellow Prime,
the Thearch’s decreed ranks,
the Four Symbols complete.
True talismans take flight—
earth quakes and mountains shift.

**Divine Head, Rahu**
Pushed forward by the Five Thearchs,
one glare of its enraged eyes—
mountains and peaks collapse.
True talismans take flight—
earth’s qi swiftly ascends.

**Divine Tail, Ketu**
Black qi shakes the heavens,
dimming the sun and obscuring the moon—
none dare face its divine might.
True talismans take flight—
thunder and rain follow in its wake.

**Celestial One’s Purple Qi**
Dao’s radiant honor,
dissolving clashes and dispelling evil,
transforming misfortune and averting calamity.
True talismans take flight—
great rites proceed.

**Comet and Meteor**
Divine valor and might,
one roar to the south—
its voice shakes thunder.
True talismans take flight—
stones split and mountains topple.

**Green Yang’s Mercy**
Examiner of decrees,
transmitting talismans to resolve the Ten Spirits.
True talismans descend—
fury swiftly ceases.
None dare defy—
obey the decree and act!
Nine Heavens’ Thearch,
issue the command and act.
I wield the true talisman,
charging through the stars.
Rebellious currents clash and shift—
slaying qi swirls in chaos.
The decree is transmitted—
each star returns to its station.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Flying Dipper Spirit Incantation**
Supreme Great Clarity,
Mysterious Origin Thearch.
Protect life and guard destiny,
decreeing the capture of the Three Hun.
Spirit talismans guard the Po—
ghosts and spirits stand revealed.
Command me to approach the palace,
crossing the mysterious gate.
Ascend the Jade Court,
facing the exalted perfected.
Come and go with clarity,
reverently presenting my sincerity—
the Jade Thearch’s decree!
Swiftly obey!

**Five Spirit Talisman Ingestion Incantation**
Jade Mansion’s Mysterious Palace,
purple qi’s beginning in green.
Within, refine the Three Hun—
the Terrace of Light is peaceful.
Spirit treasures of the Jade Chamber,
born with me.
Do not move recklessly—
the Yellow Court’s supervising spirit.
Great Numen guards and protects.
Should you wish to fly,
your form ascends to Jade Clarity.
Hungry or thirsty—
swallow and drink jade essence!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Flying Spirit Incantation**
Heaven bright, qi clear,
Three Lights perfectly luminous.
Golden chambers, jade rooms—
Five Sacred Fungi flourish.
Mysterious numen, purple canopy,
illuminating my form.
Jade lads and jade maidens,
bring me their numinous power.
Nine Thearchs in shared radiance,
Three Lights in harmonious ranks.
Attaining the flowered canopy,
ascend into the Thearch’s court!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Earth Star Incantation**
Central Earthly Host,
governing and seizing the Four Directions!
Yellow Center regulates qi,
receiving the Thearch’s chamber’s decree.
Descending from heaven—
fly and seize calamities!

**Divine Head Incantation**
Intersecting Primordial Divine Head,

chunks.original_text: 太上三洞神咒卷之二竟 太上三洞神咒卷之三 雷霆祈禳驱役诸咒 阳斗罡咒 斗要妙兮十二辰，乘天罡兮威武陈。 炁仿髴兮如浮云，九变动兮上应天。 知变化兮定言凶，契广大兮有区分。 入斗宿分过天关，合六律兮持甲乙。 履天英兮乘天任，清泠渊兮可陆沉。 傍天柱兮拥天心，从此度兮登天禽。 倚天辅兮临天冲，入天内兮出天蓬。 斗道通兮刚柔济，众福禄兮流后世。 出杳冥兮千万岁。 一歌之后步六时，九歌三步三百载。 急急如律令。 阴斗罡咒 日月明乾坤配，人道兴鬼道废。 吾从天蓬入天内，略过天冲逢辅退。 反归天禽与心对，把天柱兮任英会。 斗步通行按纯神，人道通兮鬼道碍，千邪万秽皆回避。 急急如律令。 召东方雷神咒 东阳震神，雷电真尊。 呼风哑□，咄鸠罗真。 狼牙猛吏，火车火轮。 欻火伯温，霹雳前奔。 威光啖吼，震动乾坤。 元帅大将，破魔伏神。 能晴能雨，伐庙斩精。 升天裂地，威震斗灵。 耀灵太华，圣光妙灵。 四溟洞阳，来降吾坛。 三清敕下，玉枢令行。 五岳之尊，撼山驱雨。 倒海奔云，符召元帅。 元始玉丈，救护群品，来降巽门。 急急如律令。 召南方雷神咒 南荧朗耀，冰鸠罗真。 真精阳神，暖炎寮灵。 五方霹雳，石阿雄声。 雷光变化，九州社令。 圣光威猛，大布火轮。 火云万丈，八车八轮。 霹雳前奔，昊天敕行。 都天震雷，玉晨洞灵。 水部束首，火怪灭形。 淳丘真君，紫虚通神。 伐恶大将，急急施行。 急急如律令。 召西方雷神咒 咄遮飞哑，流金太华。 多伯贞耳，旭执圭耶。 三五铁面，火炬火车。 豁落罡斗，霹雳雷蛇。 虎头威猛，掣电流霞。 斗中使者，雷阵雷车。 吞魔啖妖，伐恶破邪。 急急如律令。 召北方雷神咒 天雷隐隐，龙虎交横。 太华太极，雷电飞奔。 飞砂走石，倒海倾云。 能晴能雨，收魄收魂。 蓬莱之部，风雨上卿。 霹雳大斧，皓翁灵尊。 祛邪伐恶，木郎震云。 电母啖吼，雷公前奔。 风轮雷震，万丈高真。 将军霞雳，破魔伏神。 急急如律令。 召中央雷神咒 圣灵威猛，震动乾坤。 三元七政，九威八灵。 狼牙猛吏，流金火铃。 玉晨大仙，六通灵君。 散飞赫奕，翻海收云。 发罡起斗，伐恶斩精。 五雷铁面，破阵将军。 黑面狼牙，火山火盆。 流金万里，霹雳高奔。 玉枢敕令，火洞将军。 撼山集云，破魔伏神。 上帝有敕，急急施行。 急急如律令。 召蛮雷神咒 □哆啰□□嘙□哩□□□呢□苏咖□□哎定哇时暖吞叨香震卿丽真阐绿英耳多伯言灵争升霸涉摩石阿雄霍闪毗罗震旭罗倚昙冰森石婆元诃。 急急如律令。 祛雷祝

**The Great Highest’s Three Caverns Divine Incantations, Scroll Two Concluded**

**The Great Highest’s Three Caverns Divine Incantations, Scroll Three**
*Incantations for Thunder, Prayers, Exorcisms, and Command*

---

**Yang Dipper Mantra**
Essential and wondrous, the twelve celestial hours—
ride the Heavenly Stem’s martial might arrayed.
Qi drifts and sways like floating clouds,
nine transformations stir, ascending to Heaven’s accord.
Know change and fix fortune’s weal or woe,
contract the vast, discern its bounds.
Pass through the Dipper’s lodges, traverse Heaven’s Gate,
join the Six Pitches, grasp Jia and Yi’s hold.
Tread Heaven’s Glory, mount Heaven’s Task,
clear and deep the abyss—walk the land as though sunk.
Beside Heaven’s Pillar, embrace Heaven’s Heart,
thence cross over to ascend Heaven’s Bird.
Lean on Heaven’s Auxiliary, face Heaven’s Thrust,
enter Heaven’s Inner, exit Heaven’s Vast.
The Dipper’s Dao flows, hard and soft unite,
all blessings and fortunes stream to later ages.
Emerge from the dim and distant—thousands, ten thousands of years!

After one chant, pace the six hours,
nine chants, three steps—three hundred years.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

---

**Yin Dipper Mantra**
Sun and moon bright, Heaven and Earth paired,
the human Dao rises, the ghostly Dao decays.
I enter from Heaven’s Vast into Heaven’s Inner,
briefly pass Heaven’s Thrust, meet Auxiliary’s retreat.
Return to face Heaven’s Bird and the Heart,
grasp Heaven’s Pillar, convene with Glory and Task.
The Dipper’s steps traverse, guided by pure spirit—
the human Dao flows, the ghostly Dao obstructed,
a thousand evils, ten thousand impurities all retreat.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

---

**Summoning the Eastern Thunder Spirit Incantation**
Eastern Yang’s shaking spirit, Thunder and Lightning’s true honored one.
Call the wind, *ya-□*, command *Jiu Luo*’s truth.
Fanged and fierce officers, fire chariots, fire wheels.
Swiftly, Fire Elder Wen, thunderbolts charge ahead.
Mighty radiance roars, shaking Heaven and Earth.
Marshals and great generals, smash demons, subdue spirits.
Master of sun and rain, fell temples, behead spirits.
Ascend to Heaven, split the earth, awe the Dipper’s numen.
Shining spirit of Great Hua, sacred light’s wondrous power.
Four seas’ Yang cavern, descend to my altar.
The Three Clarities’ decree descends, Jade Pivot’s command enacted.
Five Peaks’ honored ones, shake mountains, drive the rain.
Overturn seas, race clouds—summon the marshal by talisman.
Primal Beginning’s Jade Measure, save and protect all beings,
descend at the Xun Gate.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

---

**Summoning the Southern Thunder Spirit Incantation**
Southern brilliance gleams, *Bing Jiu Luo*’s truth.
True essence of Yang spirit, warmth of the fiery lodge’s power.
Five Directions’ thunderbolts, Stone River’s mighty voice.
Thunder’s radiance transforms, the Nine Provinces’ altar commands.
Sacred light’s ferocity, great fire wheels spread.
Fire clouds ten thousand fathoms, eight chariots, eight wheels.
Thunderbolts charge ahead, High Heaven’s decree enacted.
All Heaven’s quaking thunder, Jade Dawn’s cavern power.
Water Department binds heads, fire demons’ forms destroyed.
Chunqiu’s true lord, Purple Void’s spirit communer.
Great general who fells evil, swiftly act!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

---

**Summoning the Western Thunder Spirit Incantation**
Command: *Duo Zhe Fei Ya*, flowing gold of Great Hua.
Many Bo’s steadfast ear, *Xu Zhi Gui Ye*.
Three-Five’s iron faces, fire torches, fire chariots.
Vast and lofty Stem and Dipper, thunderbolts, lightning serpents.
Tiger-headed might, lightning flashes, streaming rosy clouds.
Dipper’s envoys, thunder arrays, thunder chariots.
Devour demons, consume spirits, fell evil, smash the perverse.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

---

**Summoning the Northern Thunder Spirit Incantation**
Heaven’s thunder rumbles, dragons and tigers intertwine.
Great Hua, Great Ultimate—thunder and lightning race.
Flying sands, hurtling stones, overturning seas, toppling clouds.
Master of sun and rain, gather souls, collect spirits.
Penglai’s department, Wind and Rain’s high minister.
Thunderbolt’s great axe, Radiant Elder’s sacred honored one.
Expel evil, fell wickedness, Wood Lad shakes the clouds.
Lightning Mother roars, Thunder Duke charges ahead.
Wind wheels, thunder quakes—ten thousand fathoms’ lofty truth.
General of rosy lightning, smash demons, subdue spirits.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

---

**Summoning the Central Thunder Spirit Incantation**
Sacred spirit’s ferocity, shaking Heaven and Earth.
Three Origins, Seven Governances, Nine Might, Eight Numinous.
Fanged and fierce officers, flowing gold, fire bells.
Jade Dawn’s great immortal, Six Penetrations’ spirit lord.
Scatter flying radiance, overturn seas, gather clouds.
Emit the Stem, raise the Dipper, fell evil, behead spirits.
Five Thunders’ iron faces, breaking array’s general.
Black-faced, fanged, fire mountains, fire basins.
Flowing gold ten thousand miles, thunderbolts soar high.
Jade Pivot’s decree, Fire Cavern’s general.
Shake mountains, gather clouds, smash demons, subdue spirits.
The Highest’s command—swiftly act!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

---

**Summoning the Barbarian Thunder Spirit Incantation**
*□Duo Luo □□Po □Li □□□Ni □Su Ga □□Ai Ding Wa Shi Nuan Dao Xiang Zhen Chan Lü Ying Er Duo Bo Yan Ling Zheng Sheng Ba She Mo Shi A Xiong Huo Shan Pi Luo Zhen Xu Luo Yi Tan Bing Sen Shi Po Yuan He.*

With the Emperor’s Bell shake the celestial palaces.
Driving thunder and lightning in tumultuous haste,
Giant celestial armored soldiers brandish spears and halberds.
The Southern Dipper’s Fire Officials dispel poison and harm;
The Northern Dipper’s Water Spirits eradicate disasters.
Subduing the great vengeful demons of the Nine Heavens,
Sweeping away the epidemics of the Ten Directions.
In wrath, the sun and moon lose their light;
At your breath, mountains and rivers boil.
Purple qi rides the heavens, circling below.
Three hundred thousand troops all stand guard.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Demon-Quelling Mantra**
The Dark Heaven spreads across the celestial expanse,
Weaving the Han with purple clouds.
Mysterious qi illumines the Three Dawns,
Cinnabar radiance shines upon the Purple Tenuity.
All heavens unfurl their numinous splendor,
The flowing clouds how resplendent.
The divine lamp brightens the Long Star,
The Net of Li spills forth its luminous glow.
Four peaks girded with lofty clouds,
Dark essence shades the Eight Directions.
The Three Primes open the high void,
Orchid gates unfold their layered doors.
Golden walls reflect the Jade Clarity,
Clouds’ beauty marks the celestial precincts.
Winds arise in the Eight Convergences,
Fierce beasts gallop through the clouds.
In the Three Caverns’ bustling courts,
Perfected ones intermingle.
Above, the thousand-mile essence,
In dark purity, towering and majestic.
The Great One of the Celestial Plan gathers and binds,
Wielding the divine brush to seize and command.
The Orthodox Unity treads the flourishing years,
Summoning the myriad spirits to return.
The Duke’s son flanks the silent axle,
The Cavern Yang penetrates the mysterious mechanism.
Feeding on the initial union with the Dao’s *gēng*,
The dragon rises, circling in due course.
The Seven Luminaries unite with the divine kings,
The whirlwind turns upon the wondrous steps.
Bodies agile upon the Dark Ford,
Flying immortals ascend the peaks’ ladders.
Donning cassocks, they enter the divine troops,
Resplendent in crystalline robes.
Dark and bright intermingle in cloudy gatherings,
Flying radiance bears divine communion.
The Pure Peak’s grand assembly,
Wondrously conjoined in the absolute void.
Golden splendor girds the empty chariot,
Winged, the lofty immortals.
Ten thousand reins scatter through the void,
Lush and dark, the upper windows.
The Lords of the Gathered Radiance unite,
The Central King named Nurturing Light.
Luminous clarity begins to birth spirits,
The Nine Perfected unite in pairs.
Wondrous radiance reveals the primal plain,
Following abundance, marking the divine source.
The Muddy Pellet’s Cavernous Origin shines,
Linked pearls in the Crimson Palace.
Primal yang joins the Gate of Life.
Three spirits lead the purple youths,
Seizing and binding the upper realms’ beings.
Flanking the gates, awaiting the bright windows,
Veiled and facing, the dawn’s round.
Splendidly illumined, the Three Spirits’ square,
Abundantly drawing in the living.
Returning the old to youthful ignorance.
The whirlwind’s brilliance shakes the Nine Heavens,
Verdant turns penetrate the cinnabar chambers.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

ly, as decreed by statute!

**Talisman Dispatch Incantation**
Heavenly gods enact the talisman—Heaven’s Dao is natural.
Earthly gods enact the talisman—slaying and executing ghosts and spirits.
Those who know they are not true—do not oppose my truth.
Those who know they are not divine—do not oppose my divinity.
Those who retreat remain unharmed; those who resist are annihilated.
Beneath the vast sky, upon the boundless earth,
Follow the talisman forth—reveal your true form, manifest retribution.

chunks.original_text: 萧萧缠霭表，曲映寝华堂。 游冥虚无变，归会神霄王。 仙道乐其生，鬼道乐其凶。 但图贵仙道，不闻鬼道隆。 谣歌参天炁，贾生元正章。 神慧命朱兵，五帝带寒霜。 仗幡摄万魔，含灵度霄峰。 回辈苦迟迟，焕文检北酆。 体解自然道，妖灭作尔功。 泛景鼓长扇，天劫永难终。 妙中生真景，俯盻四射飞。 意合在真景，提携高上琦。 翔翅期妙会，洞观情转悲。 啸吃咄嗟须，倏欻历九闱。 摄炁交返初，并景幽玄微。 九真降停耀，重关百阳开。 雷霆行电雹，五星相奔移。 握节命灵炁，委心共追随。 战罢罗遮道，猛虎赫神威。 魔师斩妖孽，铜头排群非。 镢天啖鬼爽，皛销擢隳。 万神咸稽首，众圣尽皈依。 违吾大道法，馘首立分尸。 天蓬黑煞将，应运阐宏规。 三罡正真炁，与日高巍巍。 山河为之倾倒，两曜为之掩辉。 雪狞音类为之堕摧，凌空金翅为之落飞。 五帝束带於神宇，万灵受封於太微。 高上泛盖於丹崖，八景策驾於霄扉。 观洞元之妙化，皈我道以来仪。 急急如律令。 净天地咒 唵敕吽咤，天地自然。 秽炁分散，洞中玄虚。 晃朗太玄，八方威神。 东方威神，青炁元君。 杨方大将，木德之精。 九万兵马，青龙将军。 青旗为号，徧绕东方。 诛灭青瘟之炁，馘戮腐木之精。 南方威神，赤炁元君。 汪想大将，火德之神。 三万兵马，火龙将军。 赤旗为号，褊绕南方。 扫荡赤瘟之炁，殄灭炎火之精。 西方威神，白炁元君。 周良大将，金德之神。 七万兵马，白龙将军。 白旗为号，徧绕西方。 驱除白瘟之炁，沉断死金之精。 北方威神，炁炁元君。 张罡大将，水德之神。 五万兵马，黑龙将军。 黑旗为号，徧绕北方。 斩断黑殟之炁，焚烧溷池之精。 东北方威神，青黑炁元君。 袁易大将军，青黑旗为号。 青黑众神兵，徧绕东北方，诛减青黑鬼之精。 东南方威神，青赤炁元君。 高光大将军，青赤旗为号，青赤恶神兵。 遍远东南方，诛灭赤青鬼妖精。 西南方威神，白赤炁元君。 萧常大将军，白赤旗为号，白赤诸神兵。 徧绕西南方，诛灭白赤炁鬼妖之精。 西北方威神，白黑炁元君。 何当大将军，白黑旗为号。 遍绕西北方，诛灭白黑炁鬼妖之精。 天上天下，荡散凶妖。 使我自然，威镇八方。 咳咈嚧嚛，脐□哂□。 疾速疾捉疾缚，斩馘不祥。 灵宝符命，普告九天。 乾罗答那，洞罡太玄。 斩妖缚邪，杀鬼万千。 雷霆霹雳，符命降临。 三界四府，岳渎齐并。 星移斗转，运动罡神。 诛灭邪鬼，符到奉行。 中山神咒，太乙玄真。 合象威灵，玄明独运。 呼风震云，冒黎我社，使有雷霆，荡除三界，无道神明。 卢杀利亨，虚剎炎辉。 元始玉文，日月同行。 五炁交腾，车轮淼淼。 速破妖氛，肃清八极。 天朗炁清，星斗交辉。 雷霆震威。 诛戮凶恶。 电掣雷轰，摄唵吽咤哩，不得留停。 吾诵一徧，却鬼延年。 按行五岳，八海如闻。 魔王东首，侍卫我轩。 凶秽消荡，道炁常存。 急急如律令救。 天蓬大咒 大道玄元始，覃恩出上清。 九天排队仗，五岳列斑迎。 万里风云合，千山草木平。 蕾买垂过北海，雨阵激南溟。 黑煞为中禁，天蓬见外营。 灵宫持玉印，太乙捧金晶。 猛将骑朱虎，先锋跨大鲸，电光飞猛火，雷鼓震天廷。 号令传三将，诛伐用六丁。
chunks.translated_text:
The mists weave in silent layers beyond,
Their winding glow illumines the resplendent hall.
Wandering the void where transformations arise,
Returning to unite with the Divine Radiance King.
The Dao of immortals delights in life,
The ghostly path delights in misfortune.
Yet who seeks the noble immortal Dao,
Hears not of the ghostly path’s ascendancy.
Chants and songs harmonize with celestial qi,
Guests sing the primal true hymn.
Divine wisdom commands the Crimson Host,
The Five Emperors bear the frost’s chill.
Wielding banners to subdue the myriad demons,
All beings ascend the cloud-capped peaks.
Those who lag behind suffer bitter delay,
While resplendent scriptures inspect the Northern Feng.
Embodiment dissolves into the natural Dao,
Demons vanish—such is your merit.
Sailing the radiant winds with long fans,
Heaven’s tribulations shall never end.
Within the wondrous arises true vision,
Gazing below, the four directions take flight.
The mind unites with true vision,
Lifting high the supreme jade.
Soaring wings await the wondrous union,
Yet profound insight turns sorrowful.
Whistling, gasping, sighing in haste,
Swiftly traversing the nine gates.
Drawing qi to return to the origin,
Merging radiance with the subtle and mysterious.
The Nine Perfected descend in steady brilliance,
Double gates open to a hundred yang.
Thunder and lightning race with hail and lightning,
The five stars rush in shifting motion.
Grasping the tally to command numinous qi,
Surrendering the heart to follow as one.
The battle ends on the demon-sealing path,
Fierce tigers manifest divine might.
Demon masters slay the iniquitous,
Bronze-headed warriors rout the rebellious.
Heaven’s reapers devour ghostly souls,
Bright flames consume the corrupt.
All spirits bow in reverence,
Every sage submits in devotion.
Those who defy our great Dao’s law
Shall be beheaded, their bodies sundered.

The Heavenly Marshal of Black Might,
Emerges in accord with destiny’s grand design.
The Three Barriers of true qi,
Stand lofty as the sun.
Mountains and rivers bow in awe,
The twin luminaries veil their light.
Fierce roars shatter the air,
Golden wings plummet from the sky.
The Five Emperors gird themselves in the divine court,
Myriad spirits receive investiture in the Grand Tenuity.
The Supreme sails the canopy above cinnabar cliffs,
The Eight Radiant Ones spur their chariots at the clouded gates.
Behold the wondrous transformations of the Primordial Cavern,
Return to our Dao in proper ritual.

Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute!

**Purification of Heaven and Earth Incantation**
Om, chih, hum, ch’a!
Heaven and earth are naturally so.
Impure qi disperses,
Within the cavernous void.
Resplendent and bright, the Great Mystery,
The mighty deities of the eight directions.
**Eastern Mighty Deity, Azure Qi Sovereign,**
General Yang Fang, essence of Wood’s virtue.
Ninety thousand troops,
Azure Dragon General.
Azure banners as their standard,
Encircling the eastern quarter.
Exterminating the qi of green pestilence,
Beheading the spirits of rotten wood.
**Southern Mighty Deity, Vermilion Qi Sovereign,**
General Wang Xiang, spirit of Fire’s virtue.
Thirty thousand troops,
Fire Dragon General.
Crimson banners as their standard,
Encircling the southern quarter.
Sweeping away the qi of red pestilence,
Annihilating the spirits of scorching flame.
**Western Mighty Deity, White Qi Sovereign,**
General Zhou Liang, spirit of Metal’s virtue.
Seventy thousand troops,
White Dragon General.
White banners as their standard,
Encircling the western quarter.
Driving out the qi of white pestilence,
Severing the spirits of dead metal.
**Northern Mighty Deity, Black Qi Sovereign,**
General Zhang Gang, spirit of Water’s virtue.
Fifty thousand troops,
Black Dragon General.
Black banners as their standard,
Encircling the northern quarter.
Cutting off the qi of black affliction,
Burning the spirits of filth’s pool.
**Northeastern Mighty Deity, Azure-Black Qi Sovereign,**
General Yuan Yi, azure-black banners as standard.
Azure-black divine soldiers,
Encircling the northeastern quarter,
Exterminating the spirits of azure-black ghosts.
**Southeastern Mighty Deity, Azure-Red Qi Sovereign,**
General Gao Guang, azure-red banners as standard.
Azure-red divine soldiers,
Patrolling the southeastern quarter,
Exterminating the spirits of red-azure demons.
**Southwestern Mighty Deity, White-Red Qi Sovereign,**
General Xiao Chang, white-red banners as standard.
White-red divine soldiers,
Encircling the southwestern quarter,
Exterminating the spirits of white-red demons.
**Northwestern Mighty Deity, White-Black Qi Sovereign,**
General He Dang, white-black banners as standard.
White-black divine soldiers,
Encircling the northwestern quarter,
Exterminating the spirits of white-black demons.

Above heaven and below,
Banishing malevolent demons.
Let me be naturally so,
Mighty across the eight directions.
Hiss, spit, mumble, sigh!
Swiftly seize, swiftly bind,
Sever and behead the inauspicious.
By the Numinous Treasure’s talismanic command,
Proclaimed to the Nine Heavens.
Qianluo Danna, Cavernous Barrier of the Great Mystery,
Slay demons, bind evil,
Annihilate a myriad ghosts.
Thunder and lightning,
Talismanic command descends.
The Three Realms and Four Palaces,
Mountains and rivers unite.
Stars shift, the Dipper turns,
Moving the Barrier Deities.
Exterminate evil ghosts,
Upon talisman’s arrival, comply.
**Central Mountain Incantation, Supreme Unity of the Mysterious True,**
Uniting the numinous might,
The Mysterious Brightness moves alone.
Summoning winds, shaking clouds,
Enveloping our community,
Let there be thunder,
Sweeping the Three Realms,
Of lawless spirits.
Lu Sha Li Heng, Xu Cha Yan Hui.
The Jade Writ of the Primal Beginning,
Sun and moon traverse together.
The five qi surge and intertwine,
Chariot wheels roll boundlessly.
Swiftly shatter demonic miasma,
Purify the eight extremities.
Heaven brightens, qi clears,
Stars and constellations gleam.
Thunder’s might shakes,
Slaying the malevolent.
Lightning flashes, thunder roars,
Om, chih, hum, ch’a, li—
No delay permitted.
Reciting once,
Demons retreat, years extend.
Marching across the Five Peaks,
The Eight Seas hear as one.
Demon kings bow to the east,
Guarding my chariot.
Malevolence and filth dissolve,
The Dao’s qi ever abides.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command!

**Heavenly Marshal Incantation**
The Great Dao, Mysterious Primal Beginning,
Extends grace from the Supreme Clarity.
The Nine Heavens array their ranks,
The Five Peaks stand in solemn welcome.
Winds and clouds gather for ten thousand miles,
A thousand mountains’ grasses and trees lie flat.
Thunder rumbles past the Northern Sea,
Rainstorms lash the Southern Abyss.
Black Might serves as the central guard,
The Heavenly Marshal appears in the outer camp.
Divine palaces hold jade seals,
The Supreme Unity bears golden crystals.
Fierce generals ride crimson tigers,
Vanguard commanders mount great whales.
Lightning flies with fierce fire,
Thunder drums shake the celestial court.
Orders transmitted to the three generals,
For punitive expeditions, employ the Six Dings.

chunks.original_text: 四向神豁落，童子尽开明。 地网周围布，天罗匼匝行。 火轮红焰起，雨盖碧烟生。 摆撼乾坤动，翻腾宇宙惊。 渴吞沧海竭，力压泰山倾。 虎应庚辛白，龙乘甲乙青。 斩馘颠狂祟，消除凶毒精。 下鬼兴妖怪，何敢共战争。 群邪皆荡尽，人道永安宁。 急急如律令敕。 天蓬馘魔咒#1 溃自鬼万，下一刀神。 类灭猷天，骸破明四。 骨然斗北，血烈帝炎。 形五鬼斩，斧大天镢。 状见来欲，鬼小有敢。 祥不却袪，里千尸劈。 重九我卫，兵万十三。 锋衔北威，戾激胜天。 凶御南威，士力丁天。 访老目四，齿绿舌苍。 风饮身横，鬼食魔吞。 冲赫霞丹，天乘炁紫。 踪灭邪斩，王神剑威。 龙夔驾严，神三枭素。 锺帝把手，兽巨颅长。 凶皓上太，灵八政七。 翁北刁高，司都丁五。 童杀元九，蓬天蓬天。 急急如律令敕。 玄坛启请咒 仰启正一玄坛将，金轮元帅赵将军。 三十六员大神王，五雷大洞无量兵。 驱雷役电耀乾坤，飞符破庙捉鬼祟。 急捉急缚妖魔精，蒙魂附体传事意。 移山拔树动宇宙，执鞭提索惊鬼神。 捉贼呈形散讼刑，赏善罚恶禁冤魂。 人遭百病告则痊，我有万愿随心伸。 八王猛将当先锋，四方大力如云屯。 天师有旨速遵依，发兵布阵列旌旗。 闻吾呼召急报应，功成行满升天墀。 急急如律令。 元始密咒 亶罗蔚罗，无须流陀。 太冲太极，阴阳抱和。 出有入无，鬼神莫测。 出死入生，变化自然。 元始混炁，玄中之玄。 上干有禁，下洞太渊。 诵之一遍，沉痾自痊。 炼魂育魄，真阳自全。 齐戒礼诵，万过飞仙。 无上密咒，万神绵绵。 心中心咒，重复宣传。 贪罗洞盟，与道合真。 玉清上极，梵炁氤氲。 分灵布炁，降注臣身。 形神俱妙，变化飞升。 上朝玄都，统摄万灵。 急急如律令。 天蓬敕咒 天蓬天蓬，万神之宗。 威严大道，游行太空。 坐南斗内，立北斗中。 紫微大帅，天皇赐功。 璇玑玉衡，二十八宿。 一炁包含，天地混同。 五方五斗，三界魔王。 天蓬为主，神炁无双。 金阙玉房，大有神功。 怒动天地，日月失光。 炁吞五岳，倾摧四方。 顺吾咒者，速来伏降。 违吾咒者，倾死灭亡。 急急如律令。 召大仙咒 谨请天蓬，门下主法。 大仙神通莫测，威赫无边。 声闻八极，名振九天。 掌北帝令，行北帝权。 驱妖斩祟，鹰犬当先。 不问远近，诛斩无镯。 巡绕天下，震动山川。 黑云蓬勃，朱顶盘旋。 吏兵逐役，鹰大效前。 敢有小鬼，造恶为愆。 鹰吞犬食，剑斩枪穿。 臣今召请，愿降三天。 蓬星都帅，威赫无边。 三十万兵，大正吾权。 治病除祸，灭恶去凶。 大仙一降，病者安宁。 急急如律令。 八卦罡咒
chunks.translated_text:
**Four Directions’ Divine Huoluo,**
Youthful attendants all radiant and bright.
Earth’s net is cast in encompassing weave,
Heaven’s snare moves in encircling flight.
Fire-wheels rise in crimson flame,
Rain-canopies birth sapphire mist.
Shaking, they stir the cosmos’ sway,
Surging, they startle the universe’s sight.
Thirsting, they drain the Eastern Sea dry,
Mightily pressing Mount Tai to its plight.
Tigers respond to white Geng-Xin,
Dragons ride upon azure Jia-Yi’s light.
Sever the heads of raving specters,
Dispel all baleful, venomous sprites.
Lesser ghosts and malevolent wraiths—
How dare they wage war in our sight?
All demonic hordes are swept away,
The human realm rests in eternal night.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Heavenly Marshal’s Demon-Slaying Incantation #1**
Dissolved from ghostly legions, one blade’s divine might.
Species annihilated, skies in ruin lie,
Bones shattered, the Four Brightnesses die.
Skeletons blaze beneath the Northern Dipper’s light,
Blood sears in the Emperor Yan’s flame.
Five ghosts’ forms are hewn,
The great celestial axe falls in might.
Should any specter dare approach,
No demon dares resist this sight.
No omen retreats, no curse is cast,
A thousand corpses split in twain.
Ninefold my guard, thirteen legions vast,
Blades gnash with Northern might,
Fury spurs victory o’er heaven’s height.
Southern might subdues the fiendish horde,
Soldiers’ strength in Ding-Tian’s accord.
Four elders’ eyes survey the land,
Teeth green, tongues ashen gray.
Winds drink their flesh, bodies lie slant,
Ghosts devour, demons prey.
Fierce radiance in crimson haze,
Heaven rides the purple qi’s array.
Traces of evil are slain,
The King of Spirits wields his blade’s sway.
Dragons and *kui* drive the solemn chariot,
Three gods in white, their forms display.
The Celestial Bell Emperor grasps my hand,
Beasts vast, their skulls long in fray.
Fiends pale ascend the Supreme,
Eight numina govern, seven powers hold sway.
The Old One of the North, Gao Diao’s might,
Controller of the Capital, Ding’s fifth array.
Youths slay the Primordial Nine,
Heavenly Marshal, Heavenly Marshal, hear my cry!
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Invocation of the Altar of the Primordial Unity**
I humbly invoke the Generals of the Altar of the Primordial Unity,
Marshal Zhao, Commander of the Golden Wheel.
Thirty-six mighty Divine Kings,
Innumerable soldiers of the Five Thunders and Great Cavern.
Commanding thunder, dispatching lightning to illumine heaven and earth,
Flying talismans shatter temples to seize demonic sprites.
Swiftly seize, swiftly bind malevolent spirits,
Possessing souls, conveying the will’s intent.
Moving mountains, uprooting trees to shake the cosmos,
Wielding whips and ropes to startle gods and ghosts.
Seizing thieves, manifesting forms to disperse legal strife,
Rewarding good, punishing evil to restrain vengeful souls.
Those afflicted by a hundred illnesses—petition and they shall heal,
I possess ten thousand vows that bend to my will’s appeal.
Eight Valiant Kings lead the vanguard,
Four Directions’ mighty forces gather like clouds.
The Celestial Master’s decree—swiftly obey,
Dispatch troops, array formations, unfurl banners high.
Hear my summons and hasten to respond,
Upon achieving merit, ascend to heaven’s hall.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Incantation of the Primordial Beginning**
Danluo, Weiluo, Wuxu, Liutuo.
Supreme Harmony, Supreme Ultimate,
Yin and Yang embrace in accord.
Emerging from being, entering non-being,
Even spirits cannot fathom their course.
Exiting death, entering life,
Transformations arise naturally.
Primordial qi of the undifferentiated,
Mystery within mystery.
Above, it penetrates the celestial taboo,
Below, it pervades the Great Abyss.
Recite once, and chronic ailments heal of their own.
Refining the hun, nurturing the po,
True yang is made whole.
Purify, fast, recite with reverence,
Ten thousand repetitions—ascend as an immortal.
Supreme secret incantation,
Myriad spirits in endless array.
Heart-centered incantation,
Proclaimed again and again.
Greedy Luo’s cavern pact,
Uniting with the Dao in truth.
Jade Clarity’s Supreme Pole,
Brahma-qi in misty profusion.
Dispersing numinous qi, bestowing it upon this servant’s form,
Body and spirit both wondrous, transforming to soar and ascend.
Ascending to the Mysterious Capital,
Commanding the myriad spirits’ sway.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Heavenly Marshal’s Decree**
Heavenly Marshal, Heavenly Marshal,
Ancestor of the ten thousand spirits.
Majestic and august is the Great Dao,
Roaming the vastness of the Great Void.
Seated within the Southern Dipper,
Standing amid the Northern Dipper.
Great Marshal of the Purple Tenuity,
Heavenly Thearch’s granted merit.
The Jade Armillary and Jade Balancer,
The Twenty-Eight Constellations.
One qi encompasses all,
Heaven and earth blend as one.
The Five Directions’ Five Dippers,
The demon kings of the Three Realms.
The Heavenly Marshal presides,
His divine qi without peer.
Golden Gates and Jade Chambers,
Possessing mighty divine power.
Enraged, he shakes heaven and earth,
Sun and moon lose their light.
Qi devours the Five Peaks,
Overturning the Four Quarters.
Those who heed my incantation,
Swiftly come and submit.
Those who defy my incantation,
Shall perish in ruin and blight.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Summoning the Great Immortal**
Reverently I invoke the Heavenly Marshal,
Master of the Dharma’s gate.
Great Immortal of unfathomable divine might,
Majestic and awe-inspiring without bound.
His fame resounds to the Eight Extremities,
His name shakes the Nine Heavens.
Wielding the Northern Emperor’s decree,
Exercising the Northern Emperor’s authority.
Driving away demons, slaying specters,
Hawks and hounds lead the way.
Regardless of distance,
Slaying without restraint.
Patrolling the world,
Shaking mountains and rivers.
Black clouds surge,
Crimson crests spiral.
Officers and soldiers follow in service,
Hawks and hounds perform their duty.
Should any petty ghost
Dare commit evil and transgress,
Hawks devour, hounds consume,
Swords sever, spears pierce.
I now summon and invite,
Wishing to descend from the Three Heavens.
Marshal of the Dipper’s Star,
Majestic and awe-inspiring without bound.
Three hundred thousand troops,
Greatly amplifying my authority.
Curing illness, dispelling misfortune,
Eradicating evil, banishing calamity.
Once the Great Immortal descends,
The afflicted find peace.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Eight Trigrams’ Vanguard Incantation**

chunks.translated_text:
**Eight Trigrams’ Vanguard Incantation**

I descend as a celestial deity to the Kun Palace,
Patrolling Zhen to stir thunder, Li’s flames burn crimson.
Issuing decrees from Xun’s gate, I summon the myriad spirits,
With Yu’s steps crossing Qian, ascending into radiant Yang.

In Kan’s domain, I hurl rain to scour malevolent forces,
Soaring through heaven and earth to slay demonic essences.
Dui’s metal gleams sharp, the Eight Trigrams’ divine might,
Straight to Gen’s palace, sealing the gates of ghosts.

Heaven darkens, earth blackens,
Sun and moon lose their light.
Evil spirits and ghostly paths,
Nowhere to flee their form.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Summoning the Thunder Deities Incantation**

Reverently I invoke the two marshals, chief and deputy,
The celestial soldiers of the eight palaces.
A thousand thousand warriors of strength,
Ten thousand ten thousand spirit troops.
The Five Thunder Generals,
The Six Jia and Six Ding.
Hearing my call,
Descend with haste.

Rising clouds, spewing mist,
Thunder crashes resoundingly.
Hurling fire for ten thousand leagues,
Ghosts have no escape.
Descending from heaven,
Patrolling the cosmos.
Hunting rebellious specters,
Seizing and capturing demonic beings.
Regardless of distance,
Searching meticulously.
A thousand evils, ten thousand monsters,
Bound and presented here.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Gathering the Spirits Incantation**

Spirits of the Numinous Treasure, myriad deities,
Merging the Three Palaces.
By the Emperor’s decree,
Swiftly descend through the Eight Gates.
Golden light blazes,
Illuminating the skies.
The Five Numinous Ones urgently summoned,
Li’s fire blazes in the void.
Zhen’s wood flourishes,
Dui’s metal gleams sharp.
Qian unfurls the celestial net,
Xun spreads the raging winds.
Kun’s bounds above and below,
Ghostly gates leave no trace.
Great deities of the Eight Trigrams,
Officers, soldiers, and spirit youths.
Wind, clouds, thunder, lightning,
Thunderbolts surge forth.
Seizing and capturing demonic beings,
Dare any disobey?
Hearing my summons,
Descend swiftly to this space.
Should you violate this decree,
Be swiftly sent to the Northern Feng.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Breaking Impurity Incantation**

Primal offering, benefit, and steadfastness,
Vast and flowing divine lord.
Sun and moon in motion,
Radiant with luminous essence.
Shining universally through the Three Realms,
Stars and constellations align.
The true qi of the Celestial Stem,
Disperses and scours demonic miasma.
Nine phoenixes break impurity,
Evil spirits and specters vanish.
[...] revolves the Stem Star,
[...] lapis hums and chants.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Consecrating Water Incantation**

Heaven and earth in motion,
Essence of sun and moon.
Light penetrating the four seas,
Able to sever demonic miasma.
Dissolving impurity, removing misfortune,
Body and home shine brightly.
Once the divine water is made,
Myriad ghosts submit and are pacified.
[...] ma lo mi,
[...] [...]
Geng ji [...] fu,
[...] yi [...]
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Heavenly Peng Ruler Incantation**

Heaven is clear, clear,
Earth is numinous, numinous.
The ten directions of the world,
Vast and boundless.
Within the void,
Above lies the Primal Crystal.
Encompassing the myriad forms,
Governing all spirits.
Its subtle workings shape creation, unfathomable in completion.
Opening heaven, cleaving earth,
Dividing darkness and light.
Once the Great Simplicity scattered,
The myriad kinds flourished.
The Three Powers established their places,
Humanity and justice arose.
Rites and music followed,
Yet wickedness and deceit were born.
The Five Constants confused,
The Four Peoples contended.
Above, no leniency,
Below, no loyalty.
Some became demons, some ghosts,
Some goblins, some spirits.
Rampant and cruel, they poisoned,
Disturbing the lives of the people.
Entire families fell ill,
Kin left solitary.
Below, childbearing ceased,
Above, fathers and brothers perished.
Lives cut short in vain,
Souls and spirits plunged into darkness.
Dao and qi intermingled,
Good and evil obscured.
The Northern Emperor, compassionate,
Took pity on all beings.
Decreed his divine officers,
To sever and decapitate demonic spirits.
Though grievances were many,
The good could be pacified.
The Heavenly Peng Marshal,
Dispersed his traces, divided his forms.
Granted the title "Supreme Emperor,"
Called the Primal Crystal.
Assisting heaven’s transformations,
Manifesting his majestic power.
The Jade Emperor again acted,
Descending from heaven.
Nurturing the multitudes,
Leading them to harmony and peace.
The Great Sage Heavenly Peng,
With three hundred thousand troops.
Returning light, restoring brightness,
Descending to the celestial court.
Patrolling the world,
Hunting and pursuing demonic spirits.
Binding wind and fire,
Ceaselessly capturing.
Slaying all evil,
Boiling every ghost.
Plague officers,
Bound and submissive.
Heaven became clear and refreshing,
Earth became peaceful and tranquil.
People found peace and nourishment,
All things sprouted anew.
Evil was guided to rectitude,
Spirits displayed their power.
The dark city opened for deliverance,
Souls and spirits received new life.
The common folk thrived,
The land was purified.
The Heavenly Peng Marshal,
Decreed the divine ruler,
Bestowing it with fine abilities.
Guarding body and life,
Restraining the myriad spirits.
Within it, the Three Terraces,
Above it, the Seven Stars.
Divine talismans on four sides,
Governing the netherworld.
As the heart directs,
Mountains and peaks crumble.
Thirty-six generals,
Guardian soldiers of the ruler.
Soaring through the skies, inspecting lives,
Moving to stir the Three Clarities.
Delivering people, extending life,
Calming disasters and harm.
Slaying evil, eradicating poison,
Ghosts and specters vanish.
Ascending to immortality, entering sagehood,
Transcending with the ruler.
In harmony with sun and moon,
Dao and qi endure eternally.
Pointing at evil to return to rectitude,
Descending the impure, ascending the pure.
The six heavens’ ghostly thieves,
Upon seeing it, perish and collapse.
The Dao has no high or low,
With the ruler, it prospers.
Climbing mountains, beasts submit,
Entering seas, dragons ascend.
Traveling at dawn, dew scatters,
Traveling at night, the body is light.
Surrounding divine generals,
Bing, Ren, Jia, and Geng.
Summoning clouds and rain,
Thunder crashes and roars.
What spirit does not submit?
What ghost does not tremble?
Those who resist the ruler perish,
Those who honor it live.
Those who defy it are disgraced,
Those who revere it are honored.
Those who venerate it live long,
Those who oppose it perish.
The Marshal’s decree,
The Northern Emperor’s covenant.
Operating the workings of creation,
The Seven Governors align.
Those who violate my decree,
Those who resist my covenant,
Shall be cut into ten thousand pieces,
Forever dead without life.
Swift as statute and command!

---

**Northern Emperor’s Divine Ruler Incantation**

The radiant light of the Great Ultimate,
The ruler’s divine workings in motion.
The true qi of the Five Phases,
Revolving endlessly.
The Azure Ruler Spirit King,
Origin of the Primal One.
The Cinnabar Ruler Spirit King,
Moving the luminous to success.
The White Ruler Spirit King,
Assisting the Dao’s majestic power.
The Qi Ruler Spirit King,
Commanding thunder, driving wind.
The Yellow Ruler Spirit King,
All qi harmoniously united.
With a single flourish of the divine ruler,
The Ten Poles are fully connected.
Guarding the Three Origins,
Soaring through the great void.
Decapitating and destroying evil demons,
Dispelling tigers and dragons.
