Evil thoughts forever severed,
Swiftly perfecting Daoist merit.
Swift as statute and command!

**Seal Incantation**
The Qian trigram embodies Heaven’s numen,
The Kun trigram bears and moves all.
No deviation from the seasons,
Revolving in endless cycles.
Heavenly soldiers receive my command,
The divine seal of the Six Jia spirits.
They guard my bodily form—
What spirit would not obey?
What demon dare stand in the way?
My seal points to Heaven—Heaven topples;
points to Earth—Earth splits;
points to man—man attains longevity;
points to ghosts—ghosts are annihilated;
points to mountains—mountains crumble;
points to water—water dries;
points to clouds—clouds disperse;
points to trees—trees snap;
points to wind—wind stills;
points to rain—rain ceases.
The August Lord bestows upon me this divine seal,
To transform and subdue you all.
Should any defy my command,
Their four limbs shall be broken and subdued.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation to Summon the Divine Officials**
The Pole Star spirits are upright,
The most revered among gods.
Black mist streams from their nostrils,
Enveloping Heaven and Earth.
In hand they wield golden spears,
Their feet tread upon wheels of fire.
At their sight, evil demons
Shatter in terror and dread.
Hearing this summons,
Hasten forth from the Gate of Heaven,
Come before the altar,
Awaiting orders and tasks.

**Prayer to Dispatch the Divine Officials**
We reverently invoke the Marshal,
Essence of the Pole Star’s might.
You command wind and fire,
Lead the heavenly hosts.
Flinging smoke and hurling flame,
Rolling stones and raising dust.
Sealing mountains and breaching caves,
Traversing the sky in defiance.
Your wrath shakes Heaven and Earth,
The Five Peaks crumble and topple.
Thunder roars and lightning flashes,
Racing like thunderbolts.
The Six Heavens’ Fire Division
Hurls fire and rings bells.
Sky-flying malevolence,
Earth-bound spirits—
All deviant mountain imps,
Seized and captured as one.
Pestilence, plague, and evil ghosts,
Eradicated without trace.
By the August Lord’s decree,
Greatly manifest your numinous power.
Swift as statute and command!

**Talisman Incantation for the Divine Officials**
The Three Heavens issue their mandate,
The Jade Emperor’s edict is clear.
The Four Saints exhort with urgency—
What spirit dare resist?
By the August Lord’s decree,
The Divine Officials are summoned.
To sever evil and misfortune,
Temporarily leaving their posts,
They come to the altar,
Commanding ghosts and spirits,
Severing all inauspiciousness.
Where the heavenly talisman arrives,
Evil calamities are forever severed.
Relieving the people’s suffering,
Greatly bestowing numinous radiance.
Swift as statute and command!

**Iron Barrier Enclosure Incantation**
By the law’s numinous power—
Heaven and Earth move,
Stars and constellations shift,
The Celestial Pass turns,
The Earth’s axis revolves,
Rivers and seas are driven,
Ghosts and spirits are enshrouded.
My art is no trifling matter,
The divine and sacred pierce the Three Clarities.
Ghosts of the Yellow Slaves,
Their bodies crushed to pulp.
Mountain imps and specters,
Reduced to fine dust.
I command eight hundred myriad heavenly soldiers,
Along with the Four Generals,
Sealing the Ghost Gate.
Above, the Heavenly Net Spirit;
Below, the Earthly Snare Generals.
What spirit lies beyond my enclosure?
What ghost escapes my net?
Those who oppose me perish,
Those who submit live.
Swift as statute and command!

**Reverent Summons to Fire Marshal Zhao Yuanri, Ancestral Lord of Primordial Fire**

By solemn decree, I command the Fire Department’s Numinous Marshal, Enclosure-General Zhao Yuanri, to forge iron into a net, cast four great seines to the four quarters, and raise flames to the eight directions—above, piercing the Empyrean; below, linking the Earth’s sovereign; eastward, reaching Fusang; westward, joining the Metal Ancestor; southward, extending to the Sea Gate; northward, touching Fengdu. Now I cast the enclosure in full, dispatching Marshal Zhao. No matter how distant or near, regardless of kinship or estrangement, seize and deliver all inauspicious ghosts to the altar precinct. Comply with the decree and swiftly establish the celestial prison!

**Celestial Prison Incantation**
O numinous celestial prison,
By the August Emperor’s command, proceed!
Lord of the All-Heaven Dharma,
Mighty Celestial Ding.
Five-Thunder Divine Generals,
Great Gods who establish the prison—
Manifest the celestial dungeon,
Imprison the ghosts and spirits.
The celestial prison stands,
The earthly prison is complete.
I summon the heavenly generals
To seize and confine the ghosts and spirits.
Great Gods of the Celestial Gaol,
Divine Lords of the Earthly Gaol—
Seize and confine the wayward ghosts,
Show no leniency.
By the August Emperor’s decree,
Consign them to the ghost encampment.
Swift as statute and command!

**Fire God Incantation**
Dark and mysterious, Heaven and Earth,
Radiant, the sun and moon.
The Five Phases move,
Fierce fire blazes in the four quarters.
Fire reddens Heaven and Earth,
Swiftly, Fire Marshal Gong!
True fire of the upper heavens,
Blazing, soaring through the void.
Five-directional thunder-fires,
Raging flames and dense smoke.
Fire Immortal Generals,
Fire Emperor Jin Zhong—
Molten metal hurled as fire,
Transformations without end.
The Great Sage’s command is issued—
What ghost dares defy?
Plague demons and pestilential ghosts,
Flee without a trace!
*Oṃ viṃ □ṇi ghosta-duṣṭa hūṃ svāhā!*

**Dharma Water Incantation**
Five Numinous Sovereigns,
Essences of the Five Fires—
Return fire to water,
Let rivers and seas grow clear.
Fire bells quake,
Sea dragons cower in alarm.
I draw true *qi*,
Hasten to descend!
Pour into the skin,
Transform the five viscera.
Flow to heal illness,
Sweep away perverse essences.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Treating Fright-Illness**
Dark, dark, dark, dark—
Wind and rain rush in torrents.
Ghosts of fright and malice,
I know your names!
Wind-fright is named *Ding*,
Heat-fright is named *Xin*.
Sudden fright, lingering fright,
Essences of *Shilei*—
Primordial August *qi*,
Swiftly descend upon me!
Sweep away the perverse ghosts,
Hasten to bring peace.
Swift as the primordial descent of statute and command!

**The Third Scroll of the *Highest Three Caverns Divine Incantations* Concludes**

*(Note: The verses of this incantation, except for the final line "Swift as statute and command," are to be read in reverse order.)*

chunks.original_text: 祈晴七转咒 一转六神藏，二转四煞没。 三转阴霾收，四转淫雨止。 五转乾坤焕耀，六转日月合明。 七转封潭锁海，收摄阴霾不正之炁，赴五雷之下受死灭形。 急急如律令。 五方蛮雷咒 天道合真，日月合明。 天清地宁，五岳摧倾。 明神辅我，天威辟兵。 威镇驱风，速降如云。 急急如律令。 天火彻光，地火烈光。 神明一召，普遍万方。 光明朗照，追运五方。 身佩列宿，上接天罡。 急急如律令。 太乙元皇，令摄天罡。 元始隐秘，玉帝所藏。 成汝之妙，立示五方。 吾剑一指，云雾高张。 急急如律令。 天雷地雷，声震八方。 摧山倒岳，上彻大仓。 雷火速至，拥云蔽光。 吾今召汝，齐到帝乡。 急急如律令。 八方洞潭，普及万物。 通天应地，灵迹见罡。 大仙一吸，齐到天罡。 急急如律令。 净坛咒 天上地下，大力天丁。 辅助吾法，扫荡妖氛。 秽炁速灭，汤涤妖氛。 坛场速净，道炁长存。 急急如律令。 净身咒 上真玄灵，五斗覆身。 神清气爽，荡秽安宁。 急急如律令。 净心咒 五炁正灵，乾象变化。 翊卫辅佐，心神无差。 急急如律令。 变形咒 三天之令，化吾之形。 青龙白虎，侍卫我身。 邪鬼远遁，真炁速生。 急急如律令。 藏魂入斗咒 吾受天师盟心宝印，佩受自然通幽达冥。 上彻洞天，下达泉扃。 吾行禹步，愿得升仙。 三魂童子，七魄真人。 随吾禹步，愿度灵关。 急急如律令。 妙用咒 先净心，母杂想。 坐建方，向破上。 存三清，虚空仰。 领四圣，万兵将。 存我身，驱邪相。 五斗光，藏形状。 前踏罡，后踢炀。 我身明，三光降。 吸入口，无差妄。 太阳火，自卯降。 太阴水，自酉降。 天罡星，自中降。 紫白赤，三色样。 罩我身，万邪唱。 叩齿九，四大畅。 去一田光，我身壮。 方书符，为法藏。 天心总咒 混溟涬海渥泩湖，焕辉炳焰炜煌烗。 青帝会神，白帝居酉。 赤帝养炁，黑帝通血。 黄帝中主，一五三变。 散之万殊，回风合灵。 寂寞感通，惟真惟应。 恶逆敢萌，靖治而治。 以法召神，以神召炁。 凝之自然，周流天地。 天心有命，万神敬听。 一罗斩煞，二贪狼敕，三计都摄，唵□□哩□咽□娑诃。 所召某将，疾速前来。 急急如律令。 敕四直咒 天灵地灵，三五交并。 吾奉帝敕，紏察邪精。 直日功曹，承行将吏，不得稽停，速去速来，吾当坐待摄。 运雷局咒 天雷隐亿，地雷轰轰。 阴雷速发，阳雷速鸣。 雷威惊动，龙虎交横。 日月罗列，照耀分明。 十二功曹，五雷使者。 六甲六丁，执符而行。 急急如律令。 日魂符咒 赤炉丹炁，玄天育精。 刚以受柔，炎火阴英。 日晨元景，号曰大明。 九阳齐化，二象俱生。 凝魂和魄，五炁之精。 中生五帝，乘光御形。 采飞以灵，掇根得盈。 首中龙和，披朱带青。 辔鸟流玄，霞映上清。 赐书玉柬，金阙刻名。 服食朝华，与道合灵。 飞仙太微，上升紫庭。 急急如律令。 日魂咒 太微丹书，名曰开明。 致日上魂，来化某形。 平日严妆，发自玄玄。 庭飞华水，日根金精。 紫映流光，号曰五灵。 急急如律令。 月魄符咒 黄精玄辉，元阴上炁。 散郁寒飙，修灵敛胃。 虚波澜颖，挺濯停器。 月晶夜景，玄宫上贵。 五宫夫人，各保母位。 赤天飞入，婴女续至。 四阴三合，光芒万方。 和魂制魄，五胎流光。

**Incantation for Praying for Clear Skies (Seven Cycles)**
First cycle: Six spirits conceal,
Second cycle: Four malevolent forces vanish.
Third cycle: Yin haze withdraws,
Fourth cycle: Excessive rains cease.
Fifth cycle: Heaven and Earth gleam resplendent,
Sixth cycle: Sun and Moon unite in brightness.
Seventh cycle: Seal the deep pools, lock the seas,
Gather and capture the perverse *qi* of yin haze,
To the judgment of the Five Thunders—annihilation and dissolution of form.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation of the Five Directions’ Barbarian Thunders**
The Dao of Heaven aligns with the True,
Sun and Moon unite in brightness.
Heaven is clear, Earth is tranquil,
The Five Peaks topple and crumble.
Divine spirits assist me,
Heavenly might repels weapons.
Mightily suppress and drive the winds,
Swiftly descend like clouds.
Swift as statute and command!

**Celestial Fire Radiates Light, Earthly Fire Blazes Bright.**
At the divine summons,
Pervade the ten thousand directions.
Radiant illumination shines,
Pursuing and circulating the Five Directions.
My body bears the constellations,
Above, connecting with the Celestial Stem.
Swift as statute and command!

**The Primordial August One commands, the Celestial Stem is seized.**
The Mysterious Beginning’s hidden secrets,
Treasured by the Jade Emperor.
Perfect your wondrousness,
Manifest in the Five Directions.
With a single point of my sword,
Clouds and mist rise high.
Swift as statute and command!

**Heavenly Thunder, Earthly Thunder,**
Voices shake the Eight Directions.
Shattering mountains, toppling peaks,
Resounding to the Great Granary above.
Thunderfire swiftly arrives,
Enveloping clouds, obscuring light.
I now summon you,
All assemble in the Emperor’s realm.
Swift as statute and command!

**Eight Directions’ Abyssal Pools,**
Pervading the ten thousand things.
Communing with Heaven, responding to Earth,
Divine traces appear in the Celestial Stem.
With a single inhalation by the Great Immortal,
All gather at the Celestial Stem.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Purifying the Altar**
Above in Heaven, below on Earth,
Mighty Heavenly Soldiers.
Assist my rites,
Sweep away demonic miasmas.
Foul *qi* swiftly perishes,
Scouring and cleansing demonic vapors.
The altar swiftly purifies,
The Dao’s *qi* eternally abides.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Purifying the Body**
Supreme Perfected and Mysterious Spirits,
The Five Dipper Stars cover my body.
Spirit clear, *qi* refreshed,
Purifying filth, bringing peace.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Purifying the Heart**
The Five *qi* align with the True,
The Qian trigram transforms and changes.
Assisting and guarding,
Heart and spirit without error.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Transforming Form**
By the command of the Three Heavens,
Transform my form.
Azure Dragon, White Tiger,
Attend and guard my body.
Evil ghosts flee far,
True *qi* swiftly arises.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Concealing the Soul and Entering the Dipper**
I receive the Heavenly Master’s covenant of the Heart-Treasure Seal,
Wearing the natural talisman that communicates with the hidden and reaches the netherworld.
Above, penetrating the Grotto-Heavens,
Below, reaching the springs’ gates.
I perform the Yu Step,
Wishing to ascend as an immortal.
The Three Hun Souls’ Lads,
The Seven Po Souls’ Perfected.
Follow my Yu Step,
Wishing to cross the numinous barrier.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Wondrous Application**
First purify the heart, banish stray thoughts.
Sit facing the established direction, toward the breaking point.
Visualize the Three Clarities, gaze into the void.
Summon the Four Saints, the ten thousand soldiers and generals.
Visualize my body, expelling demonic forms.
The Five Dipper’s light conceals my shape.
Step forward on the Celestial Stem, kick back on the scorching path.
My body brightens, the Three Lights descend.
Inhale into the mouth, without error or delusion.
The Fire of the Great Yang descends from Mao,
The Water of the Great Yin descends from You.
The Celestial Stem Star descends from the center.
Purple, white, red—three colors’ forms.
Envelop my body, ten thousand evils chant.
Knock the teeth nine times, the Four Great [Elements] harmonize.
Expel the light of the One Field, my body strengthens.
Inscribe talismans, as the Dharma’s treasury.
Swift as statute and command!

**Heavenly Heart General Incantation**
*Kun ming xing hai wo seng hu, huan hui bing yan wei huang kai...*
The Azure Emperor convenes the spirits,
The White Emperor resides in You.
The Red Emperor nurtures *qi*,
The Black Emperor circulates blood.
The Yellow Emperor presides at the center,
One, five, three transformations.
Dispersing into the ten thousand differences,
Returning wind unites the numinous.
Silent and profound resonance,
Only the True responds.
Dare any evil arise?
Pacify and govern.
By Dharma summon the spirits,
By spirits summon the *qi*.
Congealing naturally,
Circulating through Heaven and Earth.
The Heavenly Heart issues its command,
The ten thousand spirits respectfully heed.
First, the *Luo* slays the malevolent,
Second, the *Tanlang* commands,
Third, the *Jidu* seizes,
*Om* [ ] *li* [ ] *yan* [ ] *svāhā*.
The summoned [general’s name] swiftly arrives.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Commanding the Four Direct Officers**
Heavenly numen, Earthly numen,
Three and Five intersect.
I receive the Emperor’s command,
To investigate and expose perverse essences.
Officers of the Direct Day,
Attending generals and functionaries,
Do not delay or linger,
Hasten to depart, hasten to arrive,
I shall sit awaiting your capture.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation for Activating the Thunder Bureau**
Heavenly Thunder rumbles in concealment,
Earthly Thunder roars mightily.
Yin Thunder swiftly erupts,
Yang Thunder swiftly resounds.
Thunder’s might startles and shakes,
Dragons and Tigers intertwine.
Sun and Moon arrayed,
Illuminating brightly.
The Twelve Functionaries,
The Five Thunder Envoys.
The Six Jia, Six Ding,
Execute the talismans and proceed.
Swift as statute and command!

**Talisman and Incantation of the Sun’s Essence**
Crimson furnace, cinnabar *qi*,
Mysterious Heaven nurtures essence.
Receiving the firm with the yielding,
Fiery flames, yin’s blossoms.
The Sun’s dawn, primordial radiance,
Named the Great Brightness.
Nine Yangs transform together,
Dual images simultaneously arise.
Congealing the hun and harmonizing the po,
The essence of the Five *qi*.
At the center, the Five Emperors are born,
Riding the light, controlling form.
Gathering and flying with numinosity,
Plucking roots to attain fullness.
At the head’s center, the Dragon harmonizes,
Clad in vermilion, girded in azure.
Reins of birds, flowing mystery,
Rosy clouds reflect the Upper Clarity.
Bestowed the Jade Tablet’s script,
Names engraved in the Golden Watchtower.
Consuming the morning’s blossoms,
Uniting with the Dao in numinosity.
Flying immortals of the Grand Tenuity,
Ascending to the Purple Court.
Swift as statute and command!

**Incantation of the Sun’s Essence**
The Grand Tenuity’s cinnabar script,
Named the Opening Brightness.
Summon the Sun’s upper hun,
To transform [my] form.
At midday, solemnly adorned,
Emerging from the profound.
Courtyard-flying floral waters,
The Sun’s root, golden essence.
Purple reflections, flowing light,
Named the Five Numinosities.
Swift as statute and command!

**Talisman and Incantation of the Moon’s Essence**
Yellow essence, mysterious radiance,
Primordial yin’s upper *qi*.
Dispersing dense cold winds,
Cultivating the numinous, gathering the stomach.
Vacuous waves, rippling glints,
Upright and cleansed, still vessels.
Moon’s crystal, night’s radiance,
The Mysterious Palace’s supreme treasure.
The Five Palace Ladies,
Each safeguarding their maternal positions.
The Red Heaven flies in,
The Infant Girl follows.
Four yins, three unions,
Light shines in the ten thousand directions.
Harmonizing the hun, restraining the po,
The Five Wombs’ flowing light.
Swift as statute and command!

**Upper Terrace of Void Essence,**
Preserve my years and span.
**Middle Terrace of Sixfold Purity,**
Guard my bodily form.
**Lower Terrace of Curved Life,**
I bow in audience to the Three Clarities.

**Incantation of the Dipper’s Might**
Head crowned with heaven’s round,
Feet planted on earth’s square.
Hand grasping *Hekui*,
Body armored with *Tiangang*.
Sun as round image,
Moon as round light.
Body clad in the Northern Dipper,
Six pitch-pipes, nine odes.
Able to drive ten thousand spirits,
Dispel all inauspiciousness.
My single command,
Demons and specters perish.
Swift as statute and command!

**Iron Helmet Talisman of Xin the Heavenly Lord**
Facing heaven, iron helmet—celestial fire blazes.
One cast spans ten thousand leagues,
Earth’s fire gleams resplendent.
Head crowned with the Three Terraces,
Below, the Ninefold Excellence is subdued.
Greatly shroud mountain *xiao*—
Souls scatter, spirits vanish.
Lesser shroud specters and sprites—
Sweep away all misfortune.
First shroud: heaven and earth’s murky *qi*,
Second shroud: sun and moon lose their light,
Third shroud: rivers and streams run dry,
Fourth shroud: grasses and trees wither yellow,
Fifth shroud: lightning flashes ten thousand fathoms,
Sixth shroud: wind and rain in all directions,
Seventh shroud: household gates pure and auspicious,
Eighth shroud: divine killers retreat and hide,
Ninth shroud: ancestral dead are gathered,
Tenth shroud: distant plagues and jaundice are eradicated,
Eleventh shroud: tigers and wolves leave no trace,
Twelfth shroud: the ailing regain health.
I invoke the Jade Emperor’s salvation,
Command the thunder deities Deng and Xin,
Zhang and the Five Directions’ heavenly soldiers,
Raise thunderbolts to shroud the unrighteous spirits of the Three Realms.
Shout to the Cloud Heavenly Marshal,
Lead the Five Directions’ thunder generals,
The earth spirits of Mount Feng,
Above spread the heavenly net,
Below lay the earthly snare.
Hasten to shroud and bind—
Let no demon or ghost escape!
Swift as statute and command!

**Summoning Incantation of Xiao Fanshan Zhang the Worthy**
I bear the Emperor’s decree,
Sever and command ten thousand spirits.
Generals Yuan and Yi,
Swiftly manifest your might.
Follow my talisman,
Pursue and seize ten thousand spirits.
*Wangliang* and the Five *You*—
Seize them and bring them to the altar court.
Mountain *chi* and tree guests—
Crushed by stone, burned by fire.
Dare to disobey,
Punishment matches heaven’s law.
Swift as statute and command!

**Summoning Incantation of the Ten Merit Officers of the Primal Unity**
Primal Unity initiates the teaching,
One *qi* divides into the true.
The Six Heavens hold mandate,
Grasping and wielding ten thousand spirits.
Three Terraces cover the body,
Five Dippers conceal the form.
Heavenly axes and halberds,
Guard and protect my true self.
Thunder marshals come and go,
Know my name.
Ten Great Merit Officers,
Hear my command and act!
**Directing Yin and Yang,**
Each has its appointed office.
**Purifying Merit Officer,**
Break filth, dispel miasma.
**Exorcising Merit Officer,**
Bind ghosts, slay spirits.
**Reporting Merit Officer,**
Convey mortal affairs.
**Deliverance Merit Officer,**
Augment destiny, prolong life.
**Guardian Merit Officer,**
Stabilize the *po*, pacify the *hun*.
**Rescue Merit Officer,**
Protect childbirth, hasten delivery.
**Possession Merit Officer,**
Seize the *po*, raise the *hun*.
**Celestial Physician Merit Officer,**
Dispense medicine, fly needles.
**Healing Merit Officer,**
Circulate *qi*, nurture the true.
**Qi-Directing Merit Officer,**
Act as I will, attack and proceed.
Drive out demonic factions,
Assault and refine the afflicted body.
Five viscera, six bowels—
Dare not remain turbid!
Hundred passages flow freely,
Triple Burner harmonized.
One divine talisman,
*Qi* and pulse at peace.
Swift as statute and command!

**Primal Unity Healing Incantation**
Primal Unity’s single *qi*,
Remnant of Gaoxin’s reign.
Entrusted to my disciple,
Swiftly seize, swiftly dispel.
Five Directions’ upright *qi*,
Fill my bodily frame.
All Great Merit Officers,
Act as I will, attack and proceed.
Solemnly summon the Ten Great
Merit Officers to needle and lance.
Lesser officers spread *qi*,
Divine healers attend illness.
Celestial Physician Great Sage,
At my call, instantly arrive,
At my summons, instantly attend.
Ten thousand incantations, ten thousand spirits—
Dare not disobey my command!
Dare to disobey,
Punishment lies in thunder’s wrath.
Swift as statute and command!

Before Heaven, before Earth,
Primal Ancestral *Qi*.
Sever death, ascend to life,
Eternal life in the world.
Jade Emperor’s Heart Seal—
Ghosts and spirits all retreat.
Upholding the Three Realms,
Commanding the ten thousand spirits.
Primal Origin’s Master Seal,
Myriad gods obey its decree.

**White Serpent General’s Exorcism of Evil**
White Serpent’s might and flame,
Transforming without bound.
Gaze upward to the heavens,
Sun and moon lose their light.
Gaze downward to the earth,
A hundred grasses wither yellow.
Evil demons that behold it,
Crushed to death, flee in mourning.
In my grasp I wield its power,
Slaying monsters, dispelling misfortune.
No matter far or near,
Seize them and bring to the altar.
By my command,
Swiftly obey without delay.
Swift as statute and command!

**Summoning Wind Wheel Zhou General**
Chaos vast and surging,
*Qi* first divided.
In the North there is a general,
Named Wind Wheel.
A thousand *zhang* tall,
Iron-faced general.
Raising clouds, spewing mist,
Born in an instant.
With a host of ten thousand,
Scouring malevolent spirits.
Whether demons or ghosts,
Whether goblins or spirits,
Whether far or near,
Whether kin or neighbor—
Wind Wheel’s single sweep,
No ghost escapes its form.
By imperial decree I command,
Dare you not comply?
Hasten to stir and move,
Show yourself clearly.
Swiftly come, swiftly come, swiftly come!

**Yu Step to Ward Off Tigers and Wolves**
Four verticals, five horizontals,
Six Jia, Six Ding.
Chiyou governs the path,
Meng Tian’s marching soldiers.
Traversing all under heaven,
Twisting halberds in reverse.
All tigers and wolves,
Bandits and thieves,
All vicious and evil—
Gather beneath my *kuigang*,
Motionless, inactive.
Swift as statute and command!

**Offering to the Six Ding**
Six Ding, celestial warriors,
Hear my prayer and attend.
By the power of the Jade Emperor’s decree,
Descend to my altar this day.
Swift as statute and command!

chunks.original_text: 天之所育，地之所生。 上受神符，可以长生。 仙人辅已，玉女佐形。 二十八宿，记列星名。 五方五色，黑白赤青。 中央黄帝，与我俱并。 受符之后，所愿如意。 破灭群精，自知不真。 勿当吾真，自知不神。 莫当吾神，前去封侯，后出斩首。 急急如律令。 六丁护身咒 仁高护我，丁丑保我。 仁和度我，丁酉保全。 仁灿管魂，丁巳养神。 太阴华盖，地户天门。 吾行禹步，玄女真人。 明堂坐卧，隐伏藏身。 急急如律令。 召朱将军咒 唵吽吽，玉帝敕朱彦速降临，流铃急召驰风云。 双目如环耀日月，黑面威猛摧昆仑。 闻令翻身离帝阙，准敕飞步下坛庭。 助吾大道兴正教，敕汝考打不信人。 敢有邪巫为不道，金槌一下摄其魂。 摄捉生魂来驸体，自迷自附考生身。 六洞冤魔偕粉碎，十方 疫疠化为尘。 唵吽吽，玉帝敕朱彦速降临，吾今召汝得力将，吾今召汝得力神。 唵吽吽敕速降临，千里报应在只今，速降速降疾速绛。 急急如律令。 遣朱将军咒 玄雷阴君，天令之尊。 玉皇赤帜， 统领雷兵。 飞风骤雨，侮沸云腾。 涌身鼓舞，遏天横行。 山崩石裂，威镇乾坤。 生人不信，急附其身。 金槌乱舞，铁棒交横。 飞天魔王，活捉横吞。 飞空霹雳，馘灭凶群。 邪巫七祖，胆碎心倾。 飞索六合，剪缚阳魂。 掷火万里，破秽除氛。 千邪不干，万恶潜形。 上帝有敕，火急奉行。 急急如律令。 敕符水咒 北斗五雷主，黑暗呜天鼓。 风伯扫瘟黄，电母除病苦。 霹雳伐妖精，雨师行法雨。 灌溉入三焦，清凉通脏腑。 重处即时轻，损处即时补。 热处即时凉，积处即时去。 危处即时安，痛处即时住。 急急如律令。 雷剑咒 罡神巽风，雷电溟蒙。 五龙雷震，北海龟崇。 力重无边，众将捧迎。 请雷声发，风随雷奔。 急疾。 雷令咒

What Heaven nurtures,
What Earth brings forth.
Above, receive the divine talisman—
Thus may you attain long life.
Immortal sages assist the self,
Jade maidens sustain the form.
The twenty-eight constellations,
Record the names of the starry ranks.
Five directions, five colors:
Black, white, red, azure.
The Yellow Emperor of the Center,
Stands beside me as one.
After receiving the talisman,
May all wishes be fulfilled.
Crush and scatter the myriad spirits,
For they know themselves untrue.
Do not oppose my truth,
For they know themselves not divine.
Do not defy my divinity—
Advance, and be enfeoffed;
Retreat, and be beheaded.
Swift as statute and command!

**Six Ding Protection Mantra**
Ren Gao guards me,
Ding Chou preserves me.
Ren He delivers me,
Ding You keeps me whole.
Ren Can governs the soul,
Ding Si nurtures the spirit.
The canopy of Great Yin,
Earth’s gate and Heaven’s door.
I tread the Yu Step,
True Person of the Dark Maiden.
In the Hall of Light, I sit and lie,
Concealed, hidden, my form obscured.
Swift as statute and command!

**Summoning Marshal Zhu**
Om hum hum!
By the Jade Emperor’s decree, Zhu Yan swiftly descends,
The ringing bells urgently summon him on wind and cloud.
His eyes like rings radiate sun and moon,
His black face, fierce and mighty, shatters Kunlun.
Hearing the command, he turns from the imperial palace,
By edict, he flies in haste to the altar court.
Aid my great Dao in reviving the true teaching,
I charge you to interrogate and strike the faithless.
Should any wicked sorcerer act against the Dao,
A single blow of the golden hammer seizes their soul.
Seize and bind the living soul to the deputy’s body,
Let them delude themselves, attach themselves, and be interrogated in life.
The six caves’ vengeful demons are shattered to dust,
The ten directions’ plagues and pestilences turn to ash.
Om hum hum!
By the Jade Emperor’s decree, Zhu Yan swiftly descends,
I now summon you, my stalwart general,
I now summon you, my stalwart spirit.
Om hum hum! By edict, swiftly descend!
A thousand leagues’ response is here and now—
Swiftly descend, swiftly descend, hasten to descend!
Swift as statute and command!

**Dispatching Marshal Zhu**
Mysterious Thunder’s Dark Lord,
Exalted by Heaven’s command.
The Jade Emperor’s crimson banner,
Commands the thunder hosts.
Whirlwinds and sudden rains,
Seething clouds surge and boil.
His form swells, drums and dances,
Traversing the sky in defiance.
Mountains crumble, stones split,
His might subdues Heaven and Earth.
Should any living person resist,
Swiftly possess their body.
Golden hammers wildly swing,
Iron rods cross and clash.
Flying Heaven’s demon kings,
Seized alive and devoured whole.
Thunderbolts streak through the void,
Decapitating the wicked hordes.
The sorcerer’s seven generations,
Their gall shatters, their hearts topple.
Flying lariats bind the six directions,
Severing and binding the yang souls.
Hurl fire a thousand miles,
Break filth, dispel miasma.
A thousand evils dare not approach,
Ten thousand wickednesses hide their forms.
By the Supreme Emperor’s edict,
Act with utmost haste!
Swift as statute and command!

**Talisman Water Mantra**
The Five Thunders of the Northern Dipper,
Darkness resounds with Heaven’s drums.
Wind Earl sweeps away pestilence,
Lightning Mother dispels suffering.
Thunderclaps strike down demonic spirits,
Rain Master sends forth dharma rain.
It washes into the Triple Burner,
Clearing and cooling the organs and viscera.
Where heavy, instantly lighten;
Where damaged, instantly mend.
Where hot, instantly cool;
Where congested, instantly disperse.
Where endangered, instantly secure;
Where pained, instantly cease.
Swift as statute and command!

**Thunder Sword Mantra**
The *gang* spirit and the *xun* wind,
Thunder and lightning, vast and obscure.
The Five Dragons’ thunderous quake,
The tortoise’s majesty from the Northern Sea.
Power boundless and weighty,
All generals bear and welcome.
Summon the thunder’s roar,
Let wind follow thunder’s charge.
Hasten!

**Thunder Command Mantra**

**Commander of All Thunder**
The Commander of All Thunder executes decrees by mandate.
Marshal Bo Wen, fierce officer and Han subject,
Crushes mountains and overturns peaks,
Exhales mist and summons clouds.
The Three Bureau’s mighty generals,
The Eight Gates’ venomous thunder.
Strike the celestial drum at once,
To hunt and seize demonic spirits.
Subdue demons and suppress evil,
Bringing great peace to the earth.
Swift as statute and command!

**Thunder Talisman Mantra**
The Great One in obscurity,
Obeys the decree and moves swiftly.
Thunder’s generals and officers,
Thunder’s celestial soldiers, arise!
Let thunder erupt without delay,
By imperial command fulfilled.
Who dares defy this order,
Offends the celestial perfected.
To violate the Emperor’s decree,
Is to rebel against the Highest Clarity.
Swift as statute and command!

**Heaven-Splitting Mantra**
Red horns bear the script,
Northern Emperor of Kunlun.
Soaring through heaven, overturning earth,
Slaying and vanquishing demonic spirits.
The Supreme Emperor decrees,
Summoning all spirits at once.
Swift as statute and command!

**Invoking Thunder to Bring Rain Mantra**
Essence of the Northern *Ren* and *Gui*,
Great Fire Bell of the South.
Roaring with thunder and lightning,
Breathing forth wind and clouds.
Seizing wind, hurling water and fire,
In the palm, thunderbolts arise.
Shaking the pillars of Kunlun,
Rivers and seas surge in turmoil.
Guan Bo smashes mountains and peaks,
A hundred streams pour like torrents.
Mists of water and fire congeal,
A deluge fills the land.
None may defy my command,
Report to the Four Spirits on high.
Whoever violates my decree,
Rebels against the Highest Clarity.
The Heavenly Emperor shall destroy your body,
Fengdu shall execute your form.
Swift as statute and command!

**Subduing Earth Spirit Mantra**
Stellar smoke responds in kind,
Spirits of the Five Lands and Earth Altar.
Unleash numinous power, scatter evil,
Black records take thunderous form.
Hearing this, their courage shatters,
Answering the summons, they hide their forms.
Those who oppose me shall die,
Those who resist shall be punished.
At the first sign of divine might,
Move swiftly as a decree!
Let thunder erupt without delay,
Let celestial stars arise at once.
Swift as statute and command!

**Breaking the Xun Mantra**
Thunderbolts shake and quake,
Lightning and fire burst forth in radiance.
Crossing *Qian*, treading the Dipper,
Striding the *Kui*, stepping the *Gang*.
The Five Thunders erupt in haste,
Inner lightning flashes in brilliance.
Illuminating the four seas to a boil,
Shining through Fusang to its core.
Thunder gods and all generals,
Arise swiftly from the *Xun* direction.
Swift as statute and command!

**Opening the Qian Mantra**
Commander of Heaven’s Thunder,
Resplendent through heaven and earth.
Divine dragons lend their guard,
Mountains and peaks crumble and fall.
Demonic spirits and spectral fiends,
Dare not bare their scales.
Thunder Lord strikes with force,
Shattering their forms to nothing.
Ghosts and monsters swept away,
The human realm rests in peace.
Swift as statute and command!

**Concealment Mantra**

chunks.original_text: 那那驿驿，左带南斗，右带北极，以江为宅。 天翻地覆，九道昏塞。 以东为西，以南为北。 使其邪鬼，心地迷惑。 来追我者，路不可得。 乘车逐我，必折其轴。 乘马追我，盲其两月。 飞行寻我，秃其两翼。 步行追我，肿其两足。 天翻地覆，玉道皆塞。 来也无踪，去也无迹。 天地真机，鬼神难测。 明星北斗，万里却敌。 黄神越章，诛鬼除殃。 憎我者死，背我者亡。 牵牛识女，隔断两江。 急急如律令。 开地脉咒 救召五雷公，风火急相通。 划开巽户裂，阴炁上腾空。 太乙飞光耀，光映火雷冲。 九天降真炁，雷发震巽宫。 吾今行符咒，摄罡乘九龙。 绿波天有敕，致雨顷刻中。 雷公火急起，雷令斩不容。 邪妖碎沉泥，霹雳伐恶宗。 稍违太乙令，摄汝送北酆。 急急如律令。 神螚咒 太玄皓帝，伯京玄真。 飞天鼓从，致雨兴云。 丹天妙虚，甲乙神君。 飞雷迅电，致雨如倾。 雷车雷队，邵阳神君。 木神太乙，三山雄明。 神符一下，急赶神螚。 大降猛雨，不得稍停。 一切妖蜃，押赴蓬刑。 天狱主令，准符奉行。 欻火风咒 飞天欻火，腋首呼风。 太虚鼓荡，威雄遍中。 摧山倒岳，飞石腾空。 真王诰命，速出巽宫。 急急如律令。 欻火雷咒 飞天欻火，神极威雷。 上下太极，周遍四维。 翻天倒岳，海沸山摧。 六龙鼓震，令下速追。 急急如律令。 欻火电咒 飞天欻火，迸眼流星。 奔飞火电，照败魔形。 灵光四照，玉符回明。 灵姬恊佑，天地萧清。 急急如律令。 欻火云祝 飞天欻火，驾景云龙。 海岳稽首，万神敬从。 雨师风伯，来往其中。 如违上令，破身火镕。 黑云速起，应运无穷。 急急如律令。 欻火雨咒 飞天欻火，斡运神雷。 东升旸谷，西运龙台。 南旋火府，北转河魁。 驱龙致雨，符到速追。 急急如律令。 欻火开睛咒 水官弛禁，不锁雷城。 轮脱其车，鬼盗其瓶。 飞天欻火，大布阳晶。 赫日杲炽，山谷藏云。 急急如律令。 欻火祈雪咒 飞天欻火，斡运东灵。 上相仙师，瑞光聚凝。 罡风剪水，变化瑶英。 威光正纪，天地肃清。 真王敷化，神变玉经。 急急如律令。 信符心咒 玉清信令，降下雷霆。 三司六府，左右灵君。 何君急吏，尊转魁罡。 昆仑入煞，撼动天轮。 五帝鼓笔，书篆天章。 九天三界，朗耀辉光。 总录名籍，电光飞扬。 霹雳迅发，轰灭邪殃。 符命到处，疾速奉行。 急急如律令。 法水咒 日华流晶，月华流光。 扫荡凶恶，万祸灭亡。 真官将吏，威布雷罡。 法水四布，万福来祥。 搏搦风云咒 天帝承风，有令穹窿。 以汝名字，在吾掌中。 把握天地，皆护我躬。 雷师往来，知汝姓名。 吾意某事，所有皆从。 如违口敕，化汝作虹。 雷公将军，吾知汝姓，吾知汝名。 急急如律令。 灵官召役咒 紫微敕令，元帅齐临。 敢有不顺，风火灭形。 神威到处，不得久停。 辄敢抗拒，骨碎微尘。 急急如律令。 天灵地灵，正一灵光附我身，三五将军从我行。 代天行化，辅国救民。 阐扬道法，速降真灵。 急急如律令。 灵官遣邪咒 玉皇降敕，朱祈显灵。 太上太真，中界灵神。 诛斩妖精，逢天斩鬼，逢地斩精。 收摄众邪，万死千生。 太真保箓，太甲易形。 速依吾命，剿馘魔群。 急急如律令。 火府邓君咒 三炁威精，总领雷兵。 摄伏鬼祟，变化通灵。 飞火万里，起雾驱云。

**Swift Concealment Mantra**
Nana Yiyi,
Left girded by the Southern Dipper,
Right girded by the Northern Culmen,
Dwelling in the river as my abode.
Heaven overturns, earth inverts,
Nine paths plunged into darkness.
East becomes West,
South becomes North.
Let the demonic spirits,
Their minds bewildered in confusion.
Those who pursue me,
Find no path to tread.
Chasing me by chariot,
Break their axles asunder.
Pursuing me on horseback,
Blind their two eyes.
Seeking me in flight,
Rend their two wings.
Chasing me on foot,
Swollen be their two feet.
Heaven overturns, earth inverts,
Jade pathways all obstructed.
Coming, no trace;
Going, no track.
The true mechanism of heaven and earth,
Beyond the ken of ghosts and spirits.
Bright stars and Northern Dipper,
Repel foes a myriad leagues away.
Yellow Spirit, Yue Chapter,
Slay demons and dispel misfortune.
Those who hate me perish,
Those who betray me die.
Oxherd and Weaver,
Sever the two rivers apart.
Swift as statute and command!

**Opening the Earth’s Veins Mantra**
Summoning the Five Thunder Lords,
Wind and fire swiftly interflow.
Splitting open the *Xun* gate asunder,
Yin *qi* ascends to the empty sky.
Grand Unity’s flying radiance,
Light mirrors the fire-thunder’s surge.
True *qi* descends from the nine heavens,
Thunder erupts, shaking the *Xun* palace.
I now enact this talisman and incantation,
Grasping the *Gang*, riding the nine dragons.
Green Waves Heaven issues its decree,
Rain falls in an instant.
Thunder Lords, arise with haste,
Thunder’s command brooks no delay.
Demons and fiends shattered into mud,
Thunderbolts strike the root of evil.
Should you but slight the Grand Unity’s command,
I shall seize you and dispatch you to Northern Feng.
Swift as statute and command!

**Divine Gnat Mantra**
Supreme Mysterious Radiant Emperor,
Eminent Capital of the Dark Truth.
Flying Heaven’s drum follows,
Summoning rain and stirring clouds.
Cinnabar Heaven’s wondrous void,
Jia-Yi Divine Lords.
Swift thunder, flashing lightning,
Rain falls in torrents.
Thunder chariots, thunder hosts,
Shaoyang Divine Lords.
Wood Spirit, Grand Unity,
Three Mountains’ mighty luminaries.
One divine talisman descends,
Swiftly drive away the divine gnats.
Mighty rains descend without cease,
All demonic miasmas,
Banished to Peng’s punishment.
Heaven’s prison master commands,
Execute the talisman’s decree.
Swift as statute and command!

**Swift Fire Wind Mantra**
Flying Heaven’s swift fire,
Underarm’s head calls forth the wind.
Great Void’s drum resounds,
Mighty power pervades all.
Shattering mountains, toppling peaks,
Flying stones soar through the sky.
True King’s edict,
Swiftly emerge from the *Xun* palace.
Swift as statute and command!

**Swift Fire Thunder Mantra**
Flying Heaven’s swift fire,
Divine Ultimate’s mighty thunder.
Above and below, the Great Ultimate,
Pervading the four directions.
Heaven overturns, peaks invert,
Seas boil, mountains crumble.
Six dragons drum and shake,
Commands issue, swiftly pursue.
Swift as statute and command!

**Swift Fire Lightning Mantra**
Flying Heaven’s swift fire,
Shooting stars stream from the eyes.
Rushing, flying fire and lightning,
Illuminating the defeated demonic forms.
Divine light shines in four directions,
Jade talisman reflects its brilliance.
Divine maidens lend their aid,
Heaven and earth grow serene and clear.
Swift as statute and command!

**Swift Fire Cloud Invocation**
Flying Heaven’s swift fire,
Riding the luminous cloud-dragons.
Seas and peaks bow in reverence,
Myriad spirits pay homage.
Rain Masters and Wind Earls,
Come and go within.
Should you defy the supreme command,
Your bodies shall melt in fire.
Black clouds arise with haste,
Responding to the mandate without end.
Swift as statute and command!

**Swift Fire Rain Mantra**
Flying Heaven’s swift fire,
Turning the mechanism of divine thunder.
Rising in the east at Yang Valley,
Revolving west to Dragon Terrace.
Southward circling Fire Palace,
Northward turning River Chariot.
Drive the dragons to bring rain,
Upon talisman’s arrival, swiftly pursue.
Swift as statute and command!

**Swift Fire Opening the Eyes Mantra**
Water Officials lift the ban,
Unlocking the Thunder City.
Wheels torn from their chariots,
Ghosts steal their vases.
Flying Heaven’s swift fire,
Spreading great solar brilliance.
Resplendent sun blazes fiercely,
Mountains and valleys conceal the clouds.
Swift as statute and command!

**Swift Fire Praying for Snow Mantra**
Flying Heaven’s swift fire,
Turning the mechanism of the Eastern Spirit.
High Minister, Immortal Master,
Auspicious light gathers and congeals.
*Gang* winds shear the waters,
Transforming them into jade blossoms.
Mighty radiance, true order,
Heaven and earth grow solemn and clear.
True King unfolds his transformation,
Divine metamorphosis in the Jade Scripture.
Swift as statute and command!

**Faith Talisman Heart Mantra**
Jade Clarity’s true command,
Descends with thunder and lightning.
Three Offices and Six Bureaus,
Left and right spirit lords.
He Lords and swift officials,
Revolve the *Kui* and *Gang*.
Kunlun enters the killing,
Shaking the celestial wheel.
Five Emperors wield their brushes,
Inscribing talismanic celestial chapters.
Nine Heavens and Three Realms,
Brightly illuminate with radiance.
Registering all names,
Lightning flashes and flies.
Thunderbolts swiftly erupt,
Crashing to annihilate demonic misfortune.
Wherever the talismanic command arrives,
Execute with haste.
Swift as statute and command!

**Dharma Water Mantra**
Sun’s radiance flows like crystal,
Moon’s radiance flows like light.
Sweeping away all evil,
Myriad calamities perish.
True officials and generals,
Mighty *Gang* thunder spreads.
Dharma water flows in four directions,
Myriad blessings bring auspiciousness.
Swift as statute and command!

**Seizing Wind and Cloud Mantra**
Heavenly Emperor rides the wind,
Issuing commands to the vault of heaven.
By your name,
Within my palm.
Grasping heaven and earth,
All protect my person.
Thunder Masters come and go,
Knowing your name.
My will in this matter,
All shall comply.
Should you defy this oral decree,
I shall transform you into a rainbow.
Thunder Lord General,
I know your surname, I know your name.
Swift as statute and command!

**Divine Officials’ Summoning and Dispatch Mantra**
Purple Tenuity issues its decree,
Marshals assemble in unison.
Dare any disobey,
Wind and fire annihilate their forms.
Where divine might arrives,
No delay is permitted.
Should any dare resist,
Their bones shall crumble to fine dust.
Swift as statute and command!

Heaven’s spirit, earth’s spirit,
Orthodox Unity’s divine light attends my body,
Three and Five Generals follow my march.
Acting on heaven’s behalf to transform,
Aiding the state and saving the people.
Propagating the Dao’s teachings,
Swiftly descend, true spirits.
Swift as statute and command!

**Divine Officials’ Banishing Evil Mantra**
Jade Emperor descends his decree,
Vermilion Prayers manifest their power.
Supreme Lord, Supreme Truth,
Middle Realm’s spirit deities.
Slay and behead demonic spirits,
Encountering heaven, slay ghosts;
Encountering earth, slay spirits.
Seizing and capturing all evil,
A thousand deaths, myriad rebirths.
Supreme Truth protects the register,
Grand Monad transforms their forms.
Swiftly obey my command,
Exterminate the demonic hordes.
Swift as statute and command!

**Fire Palace Lord Deng’s Mantra**
Three *qi*’s mighty essence,
Commanding the thunder hosts.
Subduing and vanquishing demonic specters,
Transforming and communicating with spirits.
Flying fire a myriad leagues,
Rising mists and driving clouds.

chunks.original_text: 上帝敕命，斩灭鬼神。 急急如律令。 移星遮日咒 三天颁降，掌握雷霆。 日光帝子，列汉星辰，闻吾令下，急急灭形。 雷电风雨，火急来临。 急急如律令。 火府辛君咒 天冥地冥，三五交并。 雷云风电，扫剪妖精。 如有违令，霹雳斩形。 急急如律令。 运雷心咒 青帝之巾，赤帝之帧。 白帝之衣，黑帝之勒。 黄帝之孙，太昊之职。 来自无夷，去向无域。 出为风雷，动为霹雳。 火急奔驰，雷火烜赫。 兴云驾雾，摧山挫石。 日月交蚀，阴阳返责。 社令推车，岳灵捉摄。 鬼哭神愁，天昏地黑。 五方真炁，聚而为一。 自已真炁，昼夜往来。 曰大都皈，元宫中住。 金木水火，土星为极。 阴阳之神，生杀万物。 吾奉玉帝，敕召雷神。 召汝变化，汝急运动。 飞砂走石，万里急急。 会雷神咒 青帝雷公肝裹出，赤帝雷公心裹出。 白帝雷公肺裹出，黑帝雷公肾裹出。 黄帝雷公顶中出，押雷大将胆中生。 闪电雷公眼裹出，九天齆雷公鼻裹出。 四季雷公口中发，霹雳雷公台上行。 五方蛮雷耳中出，雨师风伯两唇生。 三百六十骨节裹，雷家眷属一齐行。 八万四千毛孔裹，神雷天将驾云行。 一千二百形影子，雷公电母破衰营。 直入灵坛社庙去，打破邪魔瘟鬼营。 开口呵炁为天火，二呵地气满城生。 阴火阳火一齐发，烧破邪魔下鬼营。 急若伐坛破庙了，事须吸炁便收丘。 想块五方雷部众，乘分来合我身形。 急急如律令。 立雩坛咒 五方五土，五神五煞。 化坛三层，制立雷法。 天雷在头，地雷在足。 水雷在左，龙雷在右。 呼阴召阳，五雷缠腹。 吹炁成风，呵炁成火。 雷火电光，常在两目。 十二功曹，听吾驱逐。 天火雷神，地火雷神。 五雷降临，锁鬼关精。 一转六神藏，二转四煞没，三转动魁罡，四转雷火腾，五转霹雳发，六转山鬼死，七转收摄下界一十五种断头截足之鬼，赴吾魁罡之下，无动无作。 雷势轰轰，坛案三层。 随剑指划，煞神速出。 急急如律令。 展旗咒 五雷猛将，火车将军。 腾天倒地，部领雷兵。 队仗千万，搜捉邪精。 闻吾立召，不得久停。 卓剑咒 青华大帝敕，赐剑召雷神。 上按九天炁，后灿七星明。 卓剑天地动，雷火电光生。 急急如律令。 下令咒 火令奉行，威震十方。 雷霆浩溥，径彻天罡。 雷火号令，帝律急彰。 梵符咒 吾奉帝敕，速召五雷。 雷奔电掣，助吾行威。 荡妖吞孽，摧魔伐非。 神光急照，万恶俱摧。 流铃急召，雷火轰飞。 娑吽咭哩咤，四目老丑。 准令急至，不得违律。 急急如律令。 遣直符咒 直符使者，变现威灵。 五方降炁，驱雷伏神。 上帝有敕，传奉雷霆。 承牒前去，不得久停。 吾在坛右，卓剑相待疾。 布斗藏魂咒 七星灵光，□□愶阳。 □□赞位，□□□禳。 辅灵应彻，侍帝之傍。 统摄魔王，臣行蹑罡。 名标雷霆，密辅大道。 天真降临，上台一黄。 斩怪除殃，中台二张。 雷电惊荒，下台三素。 威剑神王，角亢氏房。 心尾箕在，左斗牛女。 虚危室壁，在后奎娄。 胃昴毕觜，参在右井。 鬼柳星张，翼轸在前。 吾左按三魂，右定七魄。 六神定命，遮魂盖魄。 急急如律令。 南斗罡咒 巽方雷居，乾天火成。 坤离之位，诛斩不停。 破地召雷，霹雳乃惊。 炎炎烧空，速速应明。 召龙咒 五方五帝，海渎河源，诸天龙王，闻吾符命，火急奉行。

**Divine Mandate of the Supreme Emperor**
Slay and exterminate ghosts and spirits.
Swift as statute and command!

**Moving Stars to Veil the Sun Mantra**
From the Three Heavens’ decree,
Grasping thunder’s might.
Sons of the Solar Emperor,
Celestial stars arrayed in the Han,
At my command’s descent,
Swiftly annihilate their forms.
Thunder, lightning, wind, and rain,
Hasten to arrive.
Swift as statute and command!

**Fire Palace Lord Xin’s Mantra**
Heaven dark, earth dark,
Triple and Quintuple *qi* converge.
Thunderclouds, wind, and lightning,
Sweep and sever demonic spirits.
Should any defy this command,
Be struck by thunderbolt and slain.
Swift as statute and command!

**Mobilizing Thunder Mantra**
Green Emperor’s kerchief,
Crimson Emperor’s banner.
White Emperor’s robe,
Black Emperor’s bridle.
Yellow Emperor’s scion,
Taihao’s office.
Coming from the boundless,
Departing to the limitless.
Emerging as wind and thunder,
Stirring as thunderclaps.
Hastening in swift flight,
Thunderfire blazing bright.
Rising clouds, driving mists,
Shattering mountains, crushing stones.
Sun and moon in eclipse,
Yin and Yang in reversal.
Earth deities push the chariot,
Mountain spirits seize and capture.
Ghosts wail, spirits grieve,
Heaven darkens, earth blackens.
Five Directions’ true *qi*,
Gathered into one.
My own true *qi*,
Day and night in motion.
Called the Great Capital Return,
Dwelling in the Primordial Palace.
Metal, Wood, Water, Fire,
Earth Star supreme.
Spirits of Yin and Yang,
Giving life and death to the myriad things.
I, by the Jade Emperor’s decree,
Summon the Thunder Gods.
Commanding your transformation,
Hasten to move at once.
Flying sand, rolling stones,

chunks.original_text: 急急如律令。 致雨咒 六丁六甲，雷电振阴。 缚龙神将，扶桑帝君。 铁符到处，万神咸听。 急急如律令。 发罡咒 北斗皇皇，统制五方。 雷公电母，霹雳施张。 浩浩大煞，凛凛天权。 随吾罡步，呼阴召阳。 急急如律令。 召雷公神咒 唵咛咤呖，唵咭□咤。 嚤摄馘哪，唵咽气和。 中养三魂，内育七魄。 雷公电母，随鼓而击。 铜爪唵飞，毛羽咤摄。 唵充南北，摄至东西。 临空色仄，馘逐飞空。 黄中理炁，黑暗荡荡。 震起斗牛，神奔鬼愁。 三令闭塞，五神徘徊。 金神腾驾，木郎大神。 水充玄女，火降离朋。 土安五宫，日月朗变。 龙虎交横，风雨应至。 江河倒逆，山岳摧崩。 充天破地，万丈并行。 天帝雷公，阴阳雷公，四令雷公，六甲雷公，霹雳雷公，发水雷公，八风雷公，十雨雷公，闪电雷公，天道雷公，兴云雷公，行雨雷公，五岳雷公，四读雷公，八节雷公，六候雷公，大川雷公，溪谷雷公，五湖雷公，四海雷公，呜鼓雷公，轰轮雷公，火车雷公，火渎雷公，移山雷公，走石雷公，撒火雷公，洒雨雷公，降雪雷公，布霜雷公，破阵雷公，驱邪雷公，光朋雷公，降瘟雷公，黑暗雷公，火印雷公，雷公掣电，所往无虞。 龙宫海藏，宝贝龙珠。 世间之宝，是吾所聚。

chunks.original_text: 天下鬼神，受吾所袪。 有一不伏，雷斧劈诛。 唵敕雷帅，五雷主宰，欻火伯温，铁笔大仙，猛吏汉臣，阏伯大神。 邵阳将军，谢仙将军。 火铃将军，火轮将军，五雷将军，左右将军，木郎大神，雷师皓翁，天丁力士，雷公电母，风伯雨师，行雨龙王，苍牙大神，都水使者，五雷使者，察善使者，莫赚使者，斩勘使者，掌龙使者，罚恶使者，掌令上吏，青丝娘子，紫光童子，驱雷使神，驱邪灭精。 救助群品，家国安宁。 九天有命，秘光敕煞。 南宫雷部，元帅雷兵，准令奉行。 唵敕欻火都元帅，九天敕命，明离精神。 唵敕煞摄，横天巨霸速起。 急急如律令。 召社令雷咒 乾天流霞玉池风，耀光仙师火震空。 玄应大帝袪天恶，坤辰土巽速皓公。 翻江复神妖神灭，复金啖吼洞怯神。 摧山倒岳蛮雷至，提灵阏伯动幽灵。 呼风哑□摄幽台，履坤蹑斗霹烟云。 万神禀奉千妖死，具那摄神镇妖神。 蛮雷震霹威雪降，黑烟火盖逆巽精。 霹形列魄飞天恶，社令雷神速降灵。 急急如律令。 召神雷咒 天地徘徊，运动风雷。 量买雨随行，电影去来。 阴阳助力，后合前开。 仰惟天神，火急相催。 风伯雨师，立造龙台。 玉皇有敕，不得违时。 急急如律令。 破地召雷罡咒 九凤灵官破秽除，点台入斗退中居。 金光遥晃指罡上，罩我金形去玉虚。 先罩吾身变浊形，神霄雷使即吾身。 神灵吾将相随逐，神逐吾灵将逐神。 召摄雷兵前后迎，凤腾云布起雷轰。 天昏地黑皆掌握，便存电掣起雷声。 左足先登踏巽位，水升火降妙阴阳。 雷从地发皆阴翳，离火腾空应起罡。 坤单震兑双丁起，鬼艮单从去坎方。 坎单速至乾宫上，心朝心拜奏名章。 回身入斗至□步，击起风云撼雨场。 黑云天地皆遮蔽，三台列宿护身藏。 指定鬼门入南斗，离行至胜起神光。 从此行符开地脉，风雷雨致万民康。 更加辰戌斗临处，上应开天不可当。 天雷龙雷神水社，五龙雷电助威扬。 要知破地召雷诀，口传心秘达穹苍。 五龙咒 五帝五龙，降光行风。 广布润泽，辅佐雷公。 五湖四海，水聚朝宗。 神霄符命，汝当听从。 敢有违者，雷斧不容。 急急如律令。 雷车咒 雷光电光，太一伏藏。 帝君起水，社令前当。 雨令何闭，风火何平。 神威月华，金仙发程。 水火同流，韩伯负舟。 三官开明，五帝信幽。 起复海水，浩瀚无休。 急急如律令。 收雨咒 金转玉回，天云散开。 荧惑降瑞，雨尘静埃。 持运加时，乌兔相催。 流火烜赫，止水除灾。 急急如律令。 金真空洞咒 罗天毒兽，备卫四门。 吞魔割胆，凶丑万群。 大斧镢天，猛马高奔。 猛龙奋爪，金头横吞。 威兵巨万，受符拔山。 六天不拘，合凶成群。 妖魔鬼魅，秽炁氛氛。 谣歌空洞，乱出障宸。 小鬼鼓形，当人生门。 神王所告，无凶不闻。 上摄六天，下统河源。 五岳四渎，善恶速分。 千千万万，来至我前。 五帝按箓，有功者宣。 凶魔干试，束形帝君。 敢不从命，所诛无存。 屠肝剖腹，斩首灭根。 北府清荡，南陵火焚。 金真扫迹，流铃捕魂。 妖爽无道，极尽形原。 身披天书，遵行玉文。 涤荡九炁，清明三元。 玄灵降真，上合自然。 敢有干试，威动上闻。 急急如律令。 制魔咒 吾是帝君之臣，名书上清，下统六天。 普及幽冥，北帝鬼部，悉是我营，我之所御，何鬼敢生。

Radiant Li’s spirit.
Om! Command the execution’s swift seizure,
Towering sky-tyrant, arise at once.

**Summoning the Community Thunder Spell**
Heaven’s azure flows with rosy jade-pool winds,
Luminous immortal masters fire-shake the void.
Mysterious Responding Great Emperor dispels celestial evil,
Earth’s Chen and Xun swiftly summon Hoary Lord.
Overturning rivers, the divine spirits vanquish demons,
Reverting metal, roaring lions daunt the timid.
Crushing mountains, toppling peaks, the savage thunder arrives,
Raising spirits, Yanbo stirs the hidden.
Summoning winds, silencing the mute to seize the dark terrace,
Treading Earth, treading the Dipper, thunderbolts split the clouds.
Ten thousand spirits obey, a thousand demons perish,
All spirits subdued, all demons quelled.
Savage thunder’s crashing might descends like snow,
Black smoke and fire shroud the rebellious Xun spirits.
Thunder’s form arrays spectral souls to scatter celestial evil,
Community Thunder Spirit, descend swiftly!
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Summoning the Divine Thunder Spell**
Heaven and Earth wander,
Moving wind and thunder.
Measuring the purchased rain’s procession,
Lightning’s comings and goings.
Yin and Yang lend their strength,
Opening behind, closing before.
I beseech the heavenly spirits,
To hasten and press forward.
Wind Earls and Rain Masters,
Instantly construct the Dragon Terrace.
The Jade Emperor’s decree brooks no delay.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Earth-Breaking Summoning Thunder Rite Spell**
Nine Phoenix Divine Officers purge filth and expel,
Marking the platform, entering the Dipper, retreating to the center.
Golden light gleams afar, pointing to the Rite’s peak,
Enveloping my golden form to ascend Jade Void.
First enshroud my body, transforming impure form,
Divine Empyrean Thunder Envoys become my very self.
Spirits follow me, I follow spirits,
Spirits pursue my numen, my numen pursues spirits.
Summoning and seizing Thunder Soldiers advance and welcome,
Phoenixes soar, clouds spread, thunder crashes.
Heaven darkens, Earth blackens—all within my grasp,
Then summon lightning’s flash and thunder’s roar.
Left foot first steps upon Xun’s position,
Water ascends, fire descends—marvelous Yin and Yang.
Thunder erupts from Earth, all shrouded in darkness,
Li’s fire soars skyward, responding to the Rite’s rise.
Kun single, Zhen double, Dui’s Ding arises,
Ghosts from Gen single depart toward Kan’s direction.

Heart faces heart in homage, presenting the name-scroll.
Turning back, entering the Dipper for □ steps,
Striking forth wind and clouds to shake the rain’s field.
Black clouds veil Heaven and Earth,
The Three Terraces’ asterisms shield and conceal.
Pointing to the Ghost Gate, enter the Southern Dipper,
Li’s march to victory ignites divine light.
Henceforth, inscribing talismans opens Earth’s veins,
Wind, thunder, and rain bring well-being to all people.
Moreover, when Chen and Xu’s Dipper aligns,
Corresponding to Heaven’s opening—unassailable.
Heavenly Thunder, Dragon Thunder, Spirit Water’s Community,
Five Dragon Thunderbolts lend their mighty aid.
To know the Earth-Breaking Summoning Thunder’s secret,
Transmit it orally, guard it in the heart, reach the vault of Heaven.

**Five Dragons Spell**
Five Emperors’ Five Dragons,
Descend with light, ride the wind.
Widely spread moisture and nourishment,
Assisting the Thunder Lords.
Five Lakes and Four Seas,
Waters gather to pay homage.
Divine Empyrean’s talismanic command,
You must obey.
Dare any disobey,
The thunder-axe shall not spare.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

Thunder’s light, lightning’s glow,
Taiyi lies concealed.
The Lord Emperor stirs the waters,
Community’s command leads the way.
Why is the Rain’s command closed?
Why are wind and fire pacified?
Divine might, moon’s splendor,
Golden Immortal sets forth.
Water and fire flow as one,
Han Bo carries the boat.
The Three Officials open the light,
The Five Emperors trust the hidden.
Raising and reversing the sea’s waters,
Vast and boundless.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Rain-Ceasing Spell**
Gold turns, jade returns,
Heaven’s clouds disperse and part.
Mars descends with auspiciousness,
Rain’s dust settles to stillness.
Holding the movement, adding the hour,
Crow and Hare hasten each other.
Flowing fire’s brilliance,
Stilled waters remove calamity.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Golden True Void Spell**
Heaven’s net’s poisonous beasts,
Guard the four gates.
Devouring demons, severing galls,
Myriad hordes of fierce and hideous.
Great axes cleave the sky,
Fierce horses gallop high.
Mighty dragons brandish claws,
Golden heads devour horizontally.
Mighty soldiers by the tens of thousands,
Receive the talisman to uproot mountains.
The Six Heavens unrestrained,
Gather the fierce into bands.
Demons, ghosts, and specters,
Filthy qi’s miasma.
Hollow songs resound,
Disorderly emerging to obstruct the celestial court.
Lesser ghosts drum their forms,
Facing the human life-gate.
The Divine King’s proclamation,
No evil goes unheard.
Above, seizing the Six Heavens,
Below, governing the river’s source.
Five Peaks and Four Waterways,
Good and evil swiftly distinguished.
Thousands upon thousands,
Come before me.
The Five Emperors review the registers,
Those with merit are proclaimed.
Should evil demons dare to test,
Bind their forms to the Emperor Lord.
Dare disobey the command,
None shall survive the execution.
Sever livers, split bellies,
Behead and extirpate roots.
Northern Bureau’s cleansing,
Southern Mound’s fiery immolation.
Golden True sweeps away traces,
Flowing bells capture souls.
Demons’ souls without principle,
Exhausted to their original forms.
Bodies clad in Heaven’s script,
Following Jade’s texts.
Purifying the Nine Qi,
Clarifying the Three Origins.
Mysterious numen descends in truth,
Accordant with Nature’s spontaneity.
Dare any test,
The threat shall rise to Heaven’s hearing.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Demon-Quelling Spell**
I am the Emperor Lord’s minister,
My name inscribed in the Upper Clarity,
Below governing the Six Heavens.
Pervading the hidden and dark,
The Northern Emperor’s ghostly hosts,
All are my encampment,
All I command.
What ghost dare arise?

chunks.original_text: 左佩豁落，右带火铃，掷火万里，威制万灵。 有犯者戮，有干者刑。 帝君有命，收捕无停。 天罡骇动，群魔束形。 鬼妖灭种，我得长生。 急急如律令。 护身敕符咒 太上老君，教我杀鬼，赐我神方，上呼玉女，收摄不祥。 登仙左契，足蹑魁罡。 左袪六丁，右役六甲。 前有黄神，后有越章。 吾今行法，不避群凶。 先煞恶鬼，后煞夜光。 何神不伏，何鬼敢当。 当吾者死，背吾者亡。 所求称遂，所履荣昌。 万事和合，万邪灭踪。 急急如律令。 召敕□神咒 魁神罡神，疾速通灵。 上帝敕差，北帝檄行。 飞符急速，不得停留。 三天有命，玉帝金章。 四圣叮咛，何鬼敢当。 吾奉帝敕，敕召灵官。 暂离午位，速赴坛场。 统领火兵，断却不祥。 救民疾苦，大赐威光。 天箓到处，永断邪殃。 急急如律令。 召□神副帅咒 八威吐毒，身现白鳞。 两目闪电，口张火盆。 头如山岳，哨动风雷。 洋波沧海，冲倒昆仑。 搜寻魔鬼，荡涤妖氛。 蛊毒山魈，搜倒横吞。 遵吾号令，火速现形。 唵迦□吽哩摄。 □神摄邪咒 飞龙骑，飞水云，飞虎骑哮吼奔。 神将吏，兵飞捉，飞腾聻，墨侵凌。 摄南阳，□□□□星压，凶神□，摄自然。 消□□，捉邪祟，辅弼看鬼招。 吾呼灵官将，火急撼身摇。 天水圣，地水灵，疾速与颤邪。 谨请九天云雷使者，速降天雷霹雳，助吾行坛。 天关地轴，入吾水中。 天也昏，沉，墨黑负风。 猛吏飞砂走石，撼天天崩，撼地地裂。 撼落鬼魂，撼鬼鬼灭。 谨召韩、高、姚三大将，赴吾水中。 天地颤，地也颤，二十八宿走似箭。 邪也颤，鬼也颤，摄赴坛前疾速颤。 唵吽吽聚魂，摄唵哆啖咦婆诃。 天崩地裂，人生鬼灭。 开其聋哑，立便通说。 衮天天崩，衮地地裂。 衮人人生，衮鬼鬼减。 急急如律令。 欻火符咒 雷霆号令，天地清宁。 雷霆猛吏，欻火大神。 驱雷社令，馘戮邪精。 通传报应，考究姓名。 雷伯大仙，急降真灵。 急急如律令。 欻火遣咒 乾曜太乙，欻火之精。 驱雷掣电，削伐魔精。 飞腾五岳，万总云并。 斩神灭鬼，火部中灵。 急急如律令。 敕五雷咒 天雷帝火，地雷风火。 阳雷神火，阴雷金火。 土雷真火，流金火铃。 破洞伐庙，馘妖灭精。 安镇家宅，匡济生灵。 雷符所告，万神咸听。 急急如律令。 治祟咒 吾与天公除万殃，化体人间作鬼王。 身长十丈口齿方，铜牙铁爪飞电光。 前驱霹雳后镬汤，迅雷掣电走天罡。 草木焦枯尽摧伤，崩岩裂石断桥梁。 两目闪烁耀天地，一怒海沸五岳倾。 斩妖吞孽灭凶强，摄捉寸斩断灾殃。 兴云致雨顷刻间，五方雷电起龙章。 吾持神咒莫敢当，魍魉妖精尽灭亡。 急急如律令。 太上三洞神咒卷之四竟 太上三洞神咒卷之五 祈禳驱治诸咒 召玄坛祝玄坛元帅，提索摇鞭。 指挥八将，勇猛当先。 持戈仗剑，金鼓轰天。 闻吾呼召，立降坛前。 金轮都总管，龙虎赵将军，神霄急捉将，降伏驱力神。 上承恭帝命，下界察凡情。 铁索摄天响，铁鞭掣地鸣。 乘龙游海岛，驾虎遍乾坤。 左有天蓬将，右有四季神。 前有元伯使，后有文业君。 八极八王将，四方四集兵。 堂堂持法力，赫赫显神灵。 九吽□喉哩，敕咤缚鬼神。 牢缚曰牢缚，喉□唵嘟□。 飞符邪神庙，擒捉妖魔精。 赤火焚邪疫，飞烟逐鬼瘟。

Left hip bears the *huoluo* blade,
Right side hangs the fire-bell,
Hurl fire ten thousand leagues,
Might to command the myriad spirits.
Whoever offends shall be slain,
Whoever resists shall be punished.
The Emperor Lord commands,
Seize and capture without cease.
The Celestial Stem trembles,
All demons bind their forms.
Ghosts and fiends exterminated to their kind,
I attain long life.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Body-Protecting Talisman Spell**
The Most High Lord Lao,
Teaches me to slay ghosts,
Bestows upon me divine methods,
Above I summon the Jade Maidens,
To gather and restrain inauspicious forces.
Left holds the Left Contract of Ascension,
Feet tread the *Kuigang*.
Left dispatches the Six Dings,
Right commands the Six Jias.
Before stands the Yellow Spirit,
Behind stands the *Yuezhang*.
Now I perform the rites,
Unflinching before the host of evils.
First slay the malevolent ghosts,
Then slay the night-shining ones.
What spirit does not submit?
What ghost dares stand before me?
Those who face me die,
Those who turn from me perish.
All sought shall be fulfilled,
All tread shall flourish.
Ten thousand affairs harmonize,
Ten thousand evils vanish without trace.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Summoning and Commanding □ Spirit Spell**
Stem Spirit, Stem of Power,
Swiftly communicate the numen.
The Supreme Emperor decrees,
The Northern Emperor’s edict executes.
Flying talismans hasten,
No delay permitted.
The Three Heavens command,
Jade Emperor’s golden seal.
The Four Saints exhort,
What ghost dares stand before?
I bear the Emperor’s decree,
Decree and summon the spirit officials.
Temporarily leave the Noon Position,
Hasten to the altar ground.
Command the fire soldiers,
Sever all inauspicious forces.
Relieve the people’s suffering,
Greatly bestow majestic radiance.
Where the Heavenly Register arrives,
Forever sever evil calamities.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Summoning □ Spirit Vice-Commander Spell**
Eight Mighties spew poison,
Bodies manifest white scales.
Eyes flash lightning,
Mouths gape like fire basins.
Heads like mountain peaks,
Whistles stir wind and thunder.
Ocean waves surge,
Overturning Kunlun.
Search out demon ghosts,
Sweep away miasmic vapors.
Mountain goblins and venomous toxins,
Overturn and devour transversely.
Follow my orders,
Swiftly manifest your forms.
*Om ka □ hūṃ hrīḥ svāhā.*

**□ Spirit Seizing Evil Spell**
Flying dragons ride,
Flying water clouds,
Flying tigers ride roaring and charging.
Divine generals and officers,
Soldiers fly to seize,
Soaring and ascending,
Ink invades and overruns.
Seize Nanyang,
□□□□ stars press,
Malevolent spirits □,
Seize the spontaneous.
Dissolve □□,
Seize evil sprites,
Assistants observe ghosts summoned.
I call the spirit officials,
Hastily shake their bodies.
Heavenly Water Sage,
Earthly Water Numen,
Swiftly tremble with the evil.
Solemnly invite the Nine Heavens’ Cloud-Thunder Envoys,
Swiftly descend with heavenly thunder and lightning,
Assist my altar rites.
Heavenly Pass and Earthly Axis,
Enter my water.
Heaven darkens,
Sinks,
Ink-black bears the wind.
Fierce officers fly sand and roll stones,
Shake heaven till it collapses,
Shake earth till it splits.
Shake and cast down ghostly souls,
Shake ghosts till they perish.
Solemnly summon the Three Great Generals—Han, Gao, and Yao,
Attend my water.
Heaven trembles,
Earth trembles,
Twenty-Eight Constellations flee like arrows.
Evil trembles,
Ghosts tremble,
Seized and brought before the altar, swiftly tremble.
*Om hūṃ hūṃ gather souls, seize om dhāṃ dāṃ yī svāhā.*
Heaven collapses, earth splits,
Humans live, ghosts perish.
Open their deafness and muteness,
Instantly enable speech.
*Gǔn* heaven collapses,
*Gǔn* earth splits.
*Gǔn* humans live,
*Gǔn* ghosts diminish.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Sudden Fire Talisman Spell**
Thunder’s commands,
Heaven and earth purified.
Thunder’s fierce officers,
Sudden Fire Great Spirit.
Drive thunder, execute orders,
Behead and slay evil essences.
Transmit responses,
Examine and verify names.
Thunder Earl Great Immortal,
Swiftly descend with true numen.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Sudden Fire Dispatching Spell**
Qian’s radiance, Great Unity,
Essence of Sudden Fire.
Drive thunder, wield lightning,
Cut down and subdue demonic essences.
Soar over the Five Peaks,
Ten thousand converge in clouds.
Slay spirits, extirpate ghosts,
Fire Department’s numen.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Commanding the Five Thunders Spell**
Heavenly Thunder, Emperor Fire,
Earthly Thunder, Wind Fire.
Yang Thunder, Spirit Fire,
Yin Thunder, Metal Fire.
Earth Thunder, True Fire,
Flowing Metal Fire Bell.
Break through caves, subdue temples,
Behead demons, extirpate essences.
Pacify and secure homes,
Assist and relieve living spirits.
Where the thunder talisman proclaims,
All spirits heed.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**Treating Malevolent Influences Spell**
I with Heaven’s Lord eliminate ten thousand calamities,
Transform my body in the human realm to become Ghost King.
Body ten *zhang* tall, square teeth,
Bronze fangs, iron claws, flying lightning.
Before drives thunderclap, behind cauldrons of boiling water,
Swift thunder, wielding lightning, tread the Celestial Stem.
Grass and trees wither and shrivel, utterly destroyed,
Collapse cliffs, split rocks, sever bridges.
Eyes flash and illuminate heaven and earth,
One rage boils the seas, topples the Five Peaks.
Slay demons, devour iniquities, extirpate fierce and strong,
Seize and capture, sever inch by inch, cut off disasters.
Summon clouds, bring rain in an instant,
Five Directions’ thunder and lightning arise with dragon patterns.
I wield the divine spell—none dare stand before,
*Wangliang* and demonic essences all perish.
Hasten! Hasten! As the law commands.

**The Fourth Scroll of the Most High Three Caverns Divine Spells Concludes**

**The Fifth Scroll of the Most High Three Caverns Divine Spells**
**Prayers, Exorcisms, and Treatments: Various Spells**

**Summoning the Dark Altar**
Pray to the Dark Altar Marshal,
Wielding the rope, brandishing the whip.
Commanding the Eight Generals,
Bravely charging ahead.
Holding halberds, wielding swords,
Golden drums shake heaven.
Hearing my summons,
Instantly descend before the altar.
Golden Wheel Commander-in-Chief,
Dragon-Tiger General Zhao,
Divine Empyrean Swift-Seizing General,
Subduing and Driving Might Spirit.
Above receives the Reverent Emperor’s command,
Below examines mortal affairs.
Iron chains clatter in the heavens,
Iron whips crack upon the earth.
Riding dragons, roaming sea isles,
Mounting tigers, traversing the cosmos.
Left has the Heavenly River General,
Right has the Four Seasons Spirits.
Before has the Yuanbo Envoy,
Behind has the Wenye Lord.
Eight Extremes’ Eight Kingly Generals,
Four Directions’ Four Assembled Soldiers.
Majestically wielding dharma power,
Illustriously manifesting divine numen.
*Nine hūṃ □ hóu lī, decree and bind ghosts and spirits.*
Firmly bind, say firmly bind,
*Hóu □ om du □.*
Flying talismans to evil spirits’ temples,
Seize and capture demonic essences.
Red fire burns away pestilential evils,
Flying smoke pursues ghostly plagues.

chunks.original_text: 埋名诸恶盗，处断不平人。 检察不善者，持逆救生灵。 令下风云合，法行星斗昏。 提兵下尘世，救度诸众生。 万神同禀令，里社列班迎。 吾今处召汝，疾速现真形。 急急如律令。 召猖兵咒 猖兵猛吏，烜赫威灵。 持戈仗剑，生杀无精。 忿怒凶恶，猖獗狂狞。 斩头滴血，食鬼吞精。 张睛努目，破寨烧营。 纵横显现，徧地峥嵘。 正一敕下，报应分明。 闻吾呼召，火速来临。 急急如律令。 召和合二圣咒， 仰启和合二圣者，语言和顺救众生。 玉佩玎珰霞叆叇，乌云现处见双身。 貌赛西施眉垂柳，体挂朱衣瑞气喷。 香风吹异香，馥郁香喷地。 脚踏金莲步步生，手把帝锺降障得。 常生惧喜大慈悲，速速五方和合利市。 堵头象鼻亲引至，若人讽诵和合咒。 唵吽咤哩吽咤哩。 二圣者速和合摄。 召八王咒 上帝有救，急召诸神。 那咤吴宛，尽命唐开。 生煞谭超，烜赫王宾。 掣电雷轰，徧天龚狠。 淮海张彪，捷疾何伍员、白起，十大蛮王。 八王猛魁。 将六毒大神。 闻吾急召，有令立从。 天师有旨，遇恶擒收。 急急如律令。 敕玄坛符咒 金轮元帅，禀令奉行。 符命到处，杀灭邪凶。 铁索牢缚，莫令西东。 铁鞭施处，鬼神灭踪。 唵俱轮咤，俱轮咤娑诃。 急急如律令。 役猖兵咒 正一天伤，元首从良。 天师有旨，速捉祸殃。 徧通九地，杀鬼擒伤。 善者降福，恶者降殃。 恶人憎我，尽死报伤。 吾令使汝，大逞猖狂。 急急如律令。 归将咒 天地神灵，三五天丁。 吾令指使，所业已成。 各归本部，受吾叮咛。 如有再召，复逞前灵。 急急如律令。 收是咒 星斗还罡，还步清堂。 神兽辅我，百神扶将。 吾身所指，日月同光。 急急如律令。 祭印咒 天辅丙木，雷光化生。 斗枢降灵，变化用之。 八卦通神，九州皆惊。 水部束首一火怪灭形。 愿降妙炁，流布九清。 急急如律令。 玉枢神罡咒 玉枢神罡，奉救真王。 破地召雷，诛伐凶殃。 五雷使者，速赴坛场。 随吾咒敕，起遣不祥。 关告五部，大降神光。 注我笔砚，书篆天章。 水怪消灭，邪道奔亡。 急急如律令。 祈雨咒 太元浩师雷火精，结阴聚阳守雷城。 关伯风火登渊庭，作风兴电起幽灵。 飘诸太华命公宾，上帝有敕急速行。 收阳降雨顷刻生，驱龙掣电出玄泓。 我今奉咒急急行，此乃玉帝命君名，敢有拒者罪不轻。 急急如律令。 发遣咒 吾奉帝命掌握印符，专都司号令之权，领鬼神不典之事。 令行则速如星火，法布则病胜风霆。 三界不许稽延顷刻，尔须神应遵承关命。 母辄迟 留，速往速来。 吾当坐待，天雷隐隐，龙虎交横，日月罗列，昭一我分明。 今日功曹使者，执符而行。 急急如律令。 覆斗咒 乾尊耀灵，坤顺内荣。 二仪交泰，六合利贞。 背天向地，永宁肃清。 应感元皇，上衣下裳。 震离坎兑，翊赞扶桑。 乾坤艮巽，虎步龙罡。 天门地户，人门鬼路。 卫我者谁？ 昊天旻苍。 今日禹步，上应天罡。 鬼神宾伏，下辟不祥。 所求如愿，应时灵光。 叱咄鬼贼，与道不顺，收付魁罡。 急急如律令。 誓雷咒 天地乘风，有命丰隆。 威振东南，敬佐西北。 霍处中央，敕摄九宫。 投汝名字，在吾掌中。 把揽天地，皆护我躬。 雷师往来，显现神通。 吾意某事，所指皆从。 如违口敕，化汝作虫。 雷公将军，吾知汝名，吾知汝姓。
chunks.translated_text:
Those who conceal their names among evil thieves,
Those who punish the unjust—
Examine the unvirtuous,
Hold fast to the rebellious to save living beings.
At the command’s descent, winds and clouds converge;
As the dharma moves, stars and constellations dim.
Leading troops down to the mortal realm,
To deliver all sentient beings.
Myriad spirits uniformly receive the decree,
Village altars array ranks in welcome.
I now summon you—
Swiftly manifest your true form.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning the Fierce Soldier Spell**
Fierce soldiers, mighty officers,
Radiant and majestic in numinous power.
Wielding halberds and brandishing swords,
They grant life or kill without mercy.
Furious and ferocious,
Rampant and savage.
Severing heads, blood dripping,
Devouring ghosts and consuming essences.
Eyes bulging, glaring fiercely,
Breaking camps and burning encampments.
Roaming freely, manifesting everywhere,
Dominating the land with towering might.
By the Orthodox Unity’s decree,
Retribution is clear and distinct.
Hearing my call,
Hasten here at once.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning the Two Harmonious Saints Spell**
I invoke the Two Harmonious Saints,
Whose words are gentle and conciliatory, saving sentient beings.
Jade pendants tinkling, radiant with rosy clouds,
From dark clouds emerge their twin forms.
Their beauty rivals Xi Shi, brows like drooping willows,
Bodies draped in crimson robes, auspicious qi billowing.
Fragrant winds carry rare perfumes,
Rich and lush, scenting the earth.
Feet treading golden lotuses, each step blooming,
Hands grasping the Emperor’s seal, dispelling obstacles.
Ever compassionate, bringing joy and fear,
Swiftly harmonizing the five directions for prosperous trade.
With trunks like elephants’ and noses like tusks, they lead the way—
Whoever chants the Harmonious Saints’ spell,
*Oṃ hūṃ □ hóu lī hūṃ □ hóu lī.*
Let the Two Saints swiftly harmonize and gather.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning the Eight Kings Spell**
The Supreme Lord grants salvation,
Urgent summons to all spirits:
Nezha and Wu Wan,
Jinming and Tang Kai.
Life-slaying Tan Chao,
Radiant and majestic Wang Bin.
Wielding lightning, thunder roaring,
Dominating the heavens with ferocity.
Zhang Biao of Huai and Hai,
Swift as He Wu’yuan and Bai Qi,
The Ten Great Barbarian Kings—
The Eight Kings, fierce and stalwart.
Commanding the Six Poison Great Spirits.
Hearing my urgent summons,
Obey the decree at once.
The Heavenly Master’s edict:
Encounter evil, seize and capture.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Commanding the Dark Altar Talisman Spell**
Golden Wheel Marshal,
Receiving the decree to act.
Where the talismanic command arrives,
Slay and extinguish evil and malevolence.
Iron chains firmly bind,
Allowing no escape east or west.
Where the iron whip strikes,
Ghosts and spirits vanish without trace.
*Oṃ kuru □ hūṃ, kuru □ hūṃ svāhā.*
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Deploying the Fierce Soldiers Spell**
By the Orthodox Unity’s wound,
The chief obeys the virtuous.
The Heavenly Master’s edict:
Swiftly seize calamities.
Traversing the nine earths,
Slaying ghosts and capturing harm.
Bestowing blessings upon the good,
Inflicting misfortune upon the wicked.
Those who hate me shall die,
Repaying harm in full.
I command you—
Unleash your ferocity.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Returning the Generals Spell**
Spirits of heaven and earth,
Heavenly soldiers of the Three and Five.
I command and dispatch you;
Your tasks are now complete.
Return each to your original post,
Receive my final instructions.
Should I summon you again,
Reprise your former numen.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Concluding Spell**
The Dipper returns to its path,
Steps retrace the pure hall.
Divine beasts assist me,
A hundred spirits support the generals.
Wherever I point,
Sun and moon shine together.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Sealing the Seal Spell**
Heaven aids the *bing*-wood,
Thunder’s light transforms and gives life.
The Dipper’s pivot descends in numen,
Transforming and employing it.
The Eight Trigrams communicate with spirits,
The Nine Provinces tremble in awe.
The Water Department binds the head, a fire demon’s form extinguished.
May wondrous qi descend,
Flowing through the Nine Heavens.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Jade Pivot Divine Might Spell**
Jade Pivot Divine Might,
Serving the True Saving King.
Breaking the earth to summon thunder,
Punishing and eliminating misfortune.
Five Thunder Messengers,
Hasten to the altar.
Following my incantation and decree,
Dispatch and expel inauspiciousness.
Notify the Five Departments,
Greatly descend divine radiance.
Infuse my brush and inkstone,
Inscribe celestial talismans.
Water demons vanish,
Evil paths flee in terror.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Prayer for Rain Spell**
Great Primordial Vast Master, essence of thunder and fire,
Gathering yin and assembling yang, guarding the Thunder City.
Guan Bo, wind and fire, ascends the abyssal court,
Stirring winds and arousing lightning, awakening hidden spirits.
Commanding the drifting to Mount Taihua, summoning Gong Bin—
The Supreme Lord decrees, act with haste!
Withdraw yang, descend rain in an instant,
Drive dragons, wrench lightning from the dark abyss.
I now chant the spell, act with urgency—
This is the Jade Emperor’s command in your name.
Dare any resist? Their punishment shall be severe.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Dispatching Spell**
I, by the Emperor’s mandate, grasp the seal and talismans,
Holding sole authority over commands and decrees,
Overseeing the uncategorized affairs of ghosts and spirits.
When my orders issue, swift as shooting stars and wildfire;
When my dharma spreads, its force surpasses wind and thunder.
The Three Realms must not delay even a moment—
You spirits must respond and obey the edict.
Do not tarry,
Go swiftly, return swiftly.
I shall sit in wait—
Heavenly thunder rumbles faintly,
Dragons and tigers intertwine,
Sun and moon array in order,
Illuminating my clarity.
Today, the Merit-Officer Messenger,
Bearing the talisman, departs.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Inverting the Dipper Spell**
Qian’s honor shines with numen,
Kun’s compliance flourishes within.
The Two Modes harmonize,
The Six Directions prosper in virtue.
Back to heaven, face the earth,
Eternal peace and solemn purity.
Responding to the Primordial Sovereign,
Above, the robe; below, the skirt.
Zhen, Li, Kan, Dui,
Assisting and aiding Fusang.
Qian, Kun, Gen, Xun,
Tiger steps, Dragon Might.
Heaven’s Gate, Earth’s Door,
Human Gate, Ghost Road.
Who guards me?
The August Heaven, vast and blue.
Today, my Yu Steps
Align with the celestial pivot.
Ghosts and spirits submit,
Below, expelling inauspiciousness.
All requests fulfilled,
Manifesting timely numinous radiance.
*Chastise and seize demonic thieves—*
Those who oppose the Dao,
Consigned to the Demon’s Might.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Oath of Thunder Spell**
Heaven and earth ride the wind,
Feng Long receives the command.
Might shakes the southeast,
Reverently aiding the northwest.
Huò resides at the center,
Decreeing and seizing the Nine Palaces.
I cast your name,
Into my palm.
Grasping heaven and earth,
All protect my person.
Thunder masters come and go,
Manifesting divine power.
Whatever I intend,
All obey my direction.
Should you violate my oral decree,
I shall transform you into insects.
Thunder Duke General,
I know your name,
I know your surname.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

Eight Extremes’ Eight Kingly Generals,

chunks.original_text: 急急如律令。 遣将咒三 雷声震十方，妖恶自消亡。 万祟随符灭，千妖逐咒亡。 将吏千千万，凶妖不敢当。 三阳雷火将，摄祟付魁罡。 急急如律令。 欻火大神，火光正真，掷火万里 照耀雷霆。 统领大将，部辖吏兵。 古木恶庙，血食之宾。 泉源土石，倚草精灵。 狼牙猛吏，流金火铃。 天威震怒，粉碎其形。 救民疾苦，以用安宁。 急急如律令。 神霄猛将，洞渊之神，飞捷使者，吾召汝名。 五雷使者，不得久停。 吾吸炁汝来，吾吹炁汝去。 明承教令，火急奉行。 急急如律令。 催生神咒 日月灵光，遍照十方。 婴孩合附，上合太阳。 变女为男，即令还强。 百神安稳，寿命延长。 监生在前，司命在后。 手执符出，速生速生。 急急如律令。 敕红线治咒 天地五行火龙索，日月光华真炁烁。 北极四圣真炁降，缚定鬼神手和足。 应是凶顽寒疟鬼，尽把灵官金索缚。 疾速追来疾速缚，违吾令者头须落。 急急如律令。 起土煞咒 天有九星，地有九良。 时有三煞，岁有金神。 人有五行，生老病死，苦造作犯殃。 闻吾咒者，万鬼伏藏。 土府禁忌，远离他方。 神符到处，土鬼灭亡。 急急如律令。 召辛天君咒 雷霆猛吏辛汉臣，牙如剑树烟焰喷。 翻江倒海倾天地，拔山破石泉源通。 狞神恶鬼敢有犯，吾目一视山岳崩。 火车霹雳常炎炎，腾云驾雾遍虚空。 急急如律令。 太一神咒
chunks.translated_text:
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Third Dispatching Generals Spell**
Thunder’s roar shakes the ten directions,
Evil and malevolence vanish of themselves.
Ten thousand afflictions perish with the talisman,
A thousand demons die with the incantation.
Generals and officers by the thousands and tens of thousands—
No malevolent spirit dares stand before them.
Three Yangs’ Thunder-Fire Generals,
Seize the afflictions and consign them to the Demon’s Might.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Xū Fire Great Spirit**
True and upright is the Fire’s radiance,
Hurling flame ten thousand leagues,
Illuminating with thunder’s brilliance.
Commanding the Great General,
Governing the officers and soldiers.
Ancient trees and malevolent shrines,
Spirits that feast on blood offerings,
Spring sources and earthen stones,
Those who cling to grasses as numinous beings—
Fierce officials with wolf’s fangs,
Flowing metal and fire bells.
Heaven’s wrath shakes with fury,
Crushing their forms to dust.
Rescuing the people’s suffering,
Bringing peace and tranquility.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Divine Shining Fierce General**
Spirit of the Abyssal Depths,
Swift-Flying Messenger,
I summon you by name.
Five Thunder Messengers,
Do not tarry long.
I inhale qi and you come,
I exhale qi and you depart.
Clearly receive my command,
Execute it with haste.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Hastening Birth Spell**
Sun and moon’s numinous radiance,
Shines throughout the ten directions.
The infant conjoins and attaches,
Aligning with the Great Yang.
Transforming female to male,
Swiftly restoring strength.
A hundred spirits at peace,
Lifespan extended.
The Birth-Monitoring Spirit before,
The Life-Controller behind.
Hold the talisman aloft—
Hasten the birth, hasten the birth!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Red Thread for Binding Malaria Spell**
Heaven and earth’s Five Phases Fire Dragon Lasso,
Sun and moon’s radiant essence, true qi blazing.
The Four Saints of the Northern Culmen send down true qi,
Binding the hands and feet of ghosts and spirits.
If you are a stubborn, malevolent malaria demon,
The Divine Officials will bind you with golden ropes.
Swiftly pursue, swiftly bind—
Those who violate my decree shall lose their heads!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Earth-Disturbing Malevolence Spell**
Heaven has nine stars,
Earth has nine virtues.
Time has three malevolences,
The year has the Metal Spirit.
Humans have the Five Phases,
Birth, aging, sickness, death—
Suffering from transgressions and calamities.
Those who hear my incantation,
Ten thousand ghosts hide in submission.
Earth’s taboos and prohibitions,
Banished far away.
Where the divine talisman arrives,
Earth spirits perish.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning Celestial Lord Xin Spell**
Thunder’s fierce officer, Xin Hanchen,
Teeth like sword trees, smoke and flames spewing.
Overturning rivers and seas, toppling heaven and earth,
Uprooting mountains, shattering stones, opening spring sources.
If fierce spirits or malevolent ghosts dare offend,
My single glance will make mountains collapse.
Fire chariots and thunderbolts ever blazing,
Riding clouds and mist through the empty void.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Great One Spirit Spell**

chunks.original_text: 社令激发斩妖凶，离阳旱魃皆灭踪。 水涌火炽风雨从，流铃掷火飞太空。 桃宾阳光役丰隆，九州社令屯云浓。 上帝敕下命汝躬，雷霆火铃母迟容。 急急如律令。 催召符檄咒 桃宾阳光，柳星之精。 赫奕万变，天辅丙丁。 日月合华，玉泉散辉。 赤天大魔，示我神威。 太上皓伯，关吾龙圭。 太一任使，九魔消摧。 急急如律令。 九州杜令咒 吾从中宫出，雍州号曰乾。 移过梁兑立，衮州居艮门。 南阳真火位，冀州居坎村。 坤位荆州上，震位青龙根。 徐州居巽户，豫州中宫存。 吾行大洞法，摄鬼入吾权。 急急如律令。 役遣咒 四圣游奕，七煞后随。 五帝大魔，八洞皈依。 天关地轴，上下交飞。 天兵地兵，上下四围。 威猛敕喝，拖拽枪旗。 在吾左右，不得抛离。 受吾符命，不得有违。 冲天入地，鬼神魄悲，顺法者昌，逆去者斩。 急急如律令。 风雷暗捉符咒 酆都护魂，黑天长存。 酆都猛将，疾速通灵。 奉太上敕，不敢不来。 风雷暗捉，急缚附身。 急急如律令。 三炁流光符咒 元始上帝，虚皇天尊，元极大道，太上老君，玄元始炁，九天真文。 郁仪孕珠，结璘含辉。 三光朗耀，七元流珠。 恩覃泉曲，泽流血湖。 惠光接引，上升天衢。 急急如律令。 炼真神咒 丁甲将军，天蓬尊神，三台仰助，六甲六丁。 前驱九曜，后灭山精。 泉灵通济，上帝敕行。 九州土地，山泽河源。 二十八宿，六神平安。 童子行令，八卦尊乾。 朱雀佐助，玄武当迁。 青龙正主，白虎伏连。 上通金阙，下合乾元。 总管鬼兵，衮同上天。 符到魁罡，万妖速奔。 急急如律令。 大威神咒 太微之祖，名列上清。 真炁守护，传往游行。 诛域凶恶，摄伏邪精。 摧山荡洞，破梦除魂。 周行六合，布炁神灵。 威力奋勇，洞合乾坤。 天地仰，收缚鬼神。 天仗用戟，震动五星。 用之逐恶，犯之绝形。 神布五岳，鬼袪八门。 三十二天，追风疾奔。 万象森列，正体为尊。 八马卫禁，万象皆宁。 当之者死，逆者倾亡。 福长神惠，洞达安行。 神号六甲，将名六丁。 运用助顺，功盖九真。 真符举处，万鬼皆惊。 急急如律令。 收魔咒 六甲大将军，六丁上阳神，太清高上道，敕赐魁罡君。 收擒山泽鬼，下捉土皇神。 若有不正者，乾元亨利贞。 急急如律令。 复神咒 吾佩星罡出巽门，黑风乌云掩乾坤。 电火四合昏复明，九宫无路堪，过奔。 大神猛吏镇雷霆，雷霆命我驱逃精。 妖精受戮天地明，归吾身中五体神。 万神来合吾之心，天灵地灵吾亦灵。 急急如律令。 总召咒 斩勘雷公，盟威青童。 巽官布令，运神归束。 擒龙掣电，威盖九重。 巽宫使者，刚轮运风。 太华典者，壁玑御凶。 山雷文通，拔岳摧锋。 壬癸雷压，斩怪擒龙。 土雷陈石，伐恶御凶。 五方使者，来往如风。 闻吾令召，速出巽宫。 赴吾坛下，大逞神通。 急急如律令。 斩邪咒 北斗昂昂，斗转魁罡。 冲山山裂，冲水水竭。 灾咎豁除，殃愆殄灭。 凶神恶鬼，莫敢前当。 顺罡者生，逆呈者亡。 天符到处，永断不祥。 上帝有敕，敕斩邪妖。 火铃一振，魔魅魂消。 急急如律令。 火铃神咒 太上火铃，炎帝之精。 霞光掣电，朗耀三清。 流火万里，鬼无逃形。 神印一卓，灰灭邪精。 三五将军，豁落吏兵。 平天忧地，诛斩不停。 飞符走印，头戴五星。
chunks.translated_text:
**Earth Spirit Summons for Slaying Demons**
The Earth Decree rouses and strikes down demonic fiends,
Drought demons of Li and Yang vanish without trace.
Waters surge, fires blaze, wind and rain obey,
Flying bells cast fire through the vast heavens.
Peach Marshal and Yang Light command Fenglong,
The Nine Provinces’ Earth Decrees gather thick clouds.
The Supreme Emperor’s edict descends upon your person—
Thunder, fire bells, delay not!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summons Edict Incantation**
Peach Marshal and Yang Light,
Essence of Willow Star.
Resplendent in ten thousand transformations,
Heaven aids bing and ding.
Sun and moon conjoin their radiance,
Jade Springs scatter their brilliance.
Crimson Heaven’s Great Demon,
Reveal to me your divine might.
Supreme Lord Haobo,
Seal my Dragon Jade.
Taiyi commands your service,
Nine demons shatter and crumble.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Nine Provinces’ Earth Decree Incantation**
I emerge from the Central Palace,
Yongzhou named Qian.
Passing through Liang and Dui to stand,
Yunzhou dwells at Gen’s gate.
Nanyang’s true fire position,
Jizhou resides in Kan’s village.
Kun’s place atop Jingzhou,
Zhen’s place at the Green Dragon’s root.
Xuzhou dwells at Xun’s door,
Yuzhou abides in the Central Palace.
I perform the Great Cavern’s rites,
Seizing ghosts under my authority.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Command and Dispatch Incantation**
Four Sages roam and patrol,
Seven Slaughters follow behind.
Five Emperors’ Great Demons,
Eight Caverns submit in reverence.
Heaven’s Barrier and Earth’s Axis,
Above and below intertwine in flight.
Heavenly soldiers, earthly soldiers,
Above, below, and on all four sides.
Fierce commands and thunderous shouts,
Drag banners and spears.
Stay at my left and right,
Never stray or depart.
Receive my talismanic decree,
Dare not disobey.
Soaring into heaven, plunging into earth,
Ghosts and spirits lament in terror.
Those who obey the law prosper,
Those who resist are slain.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Wind-Thunder Stealth Seizure Talisman Incantation**
You who guard souls in Fengdu,
Abide eternally in the Black Heavens.
Fengdu’s fierce generals,
Swiftly manifest your numinous power.
By the Supreme Emperor’s decree,
Dare not fail to come.
Wind and thunder seize in darkness,
Bind and possess the body at once.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Three Qi Flowing Light Talisman Incantation**
Primordial Beginning Supreme Emperor,
Void Sovereign Heavenly Worthy,
Primordial Ultimate Great Dao,
Supreme Lord Lao,
Mysterious Primordial Qi,
Nine Heavens’ True Script.
Yu Yi nurtures the pearl,
Jie Lin contains its radiance.
Three Lights shine brightly,
Seven Primes flow like pearls.
Grace extends to the springs’ depths,
Blessings flow to the Blood Lake.
Merciful light guides and receives,
Ascending to Heaven’s thoroughfare.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Refining the True Spirit Incantation**
Ding-Jia Generals,
Heavenly Pen Honored Spirit,
Three Terraces lend their aid,
Six Jia and Six Ding.
Nine Luminaries lead the vanguard,
Mountain spirits are annihilated in the rear.
Spring spirits facilitate passage,
The Supreme Emperor decrees your march.
Nine Provinces’ earth spirits,
Mountains, marshes, rivers, and springs.
Twenty-Eight Constellations,
Six Spirits at peace.
Divine youths execute commands,
Eight Trigrams honor Qian.
Vermilion Bird lends assistance,
Dark Warrior awaits relocation.
Green Dragon presides as master,
White Tiger submits in chains.
Above, connect with the Golden Portal,
Below, unite with Qian’s origin.
Command ghostly soldiers in unison,
Ascend together to heaven.
When the talisman reaches the Demon Star,
Ten thousand demons flee in haste.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Great Might Spirit Incantation**
Ancestor of the Supreme Subtlety,
Named among the Highest Clarity.
True Qi guards and protects,
Transmitted for wandering and traversing.
Execute the wicked and evil,
Seize and subdue perverse spirits.
Shatter mountains and churn caverns,
Break dreams and dispel souls.
Circulate through the Six Directions,
Disperse Qi and divine spirits.
Might and power surge forth,
Penetrating and uniting heaven and earth.
Heaven bows, earth submits,
Binding and capturing ghosts and spirits.
Heaven’s weapon wields the halberd,
Shaking the Five Stars.
Use it to expel evil,
Those who offend perish utterly.
Spirits array the Five Peaks,
Ghosts are banished from the Eight Gates.
Thirty-Two Heavens,
Pursue the wind in swift flight.
Ten thousand forms stand in solemn ranks,
The true body reigns supreme.
Eight Horses guard the禁,
All phenomena attain peace.
Those who oppose die,
Those who resist perish.
Fortune lengthens, divine grace,
Penetrating and proceeding in safety.
Spirits named Six Jia,
Generals named Six Ding.
Employed to aid compliance,
Merits surpassing the Nine Perfected.
When the true talisman is raised,
Ten thousand ghosts tremble in fear.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Demon-Seizing Incantation**
Six Jia Great Generals,
Six Ding Supreme Yang Spirits,
Supreme Clarity’s Highest Dao,
Decreed to the Demon Star Lord.
Seize and capture mountain and marsh ghosts,
Descend to apprehend Earth Sovereign spirits.
Should any be unrighteous,
Qian’s origin, smoothness, benefit, and perseverance.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Restoring Spirit Incantation**
I bear the Star Demon and emerge from Xun’s gate,
Black winds and dark clouds shroud heaven and earth.
Lightning and fire converge in four directions, dark then bright,
Nine Palaces offer no path to flee.
Great spirits and fierce officers command thunder,
Thunder decrees I drive fleeing spirits.
Demonic spirits suffer execution, heaven and earth brighten,
Return to my body’s fivefold spirits.
Ten thousand spirits converge in my heart,
Heavenly spirits, earthly spirits—I too am numinous.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**General Summons Incantation**
Beheading and interrogating Thunder Duke,
Allied Might Green Youth.
Xun’s palace issues decrees,
Directing spirits to gather and restrain.
Seizing dragons and wrenching lightning,
Might overshadows the Nine Heavens.
Xun’s palace emissaries,
Rigid wheels turn the wind.
Taihua’s record-keepers,
Jade Armillary subdues evil.
Mountain Thunder Wen Tong,
Uproots peaks and shatters blades.
Ren and Gui’s thunder presses,
Slays monsters and seizes dragons.
Earth Thunder Chen Shi,
