Northern messengers,
Guide the water wheel east.
The Yin Palace’s fierce flames,
The Fire Emperor scorches the skies.
The Upper Realm’s true fire,
The Lower Realm’s nether fire.
Eastern solar fire,
Western metal fire.
Southern raging fire,
Northern divine fire.
Central Yellow’s inner fire;
Blazing fire and wind.
Fire immortals, Fire Emperors,
Fire wheels, fire bells.
Fire essence youths,
Fire Division immortal lads.
Fiery celestial qi,
Blanketing the void.
By the Northern Emperor’s own decree,
Commanding Tianpeng.
Summoning the Four Divisions,
To swiftly capture the wicked.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Purple Tenuity’s Decree and Dispatch Incantation**
By the Purple Tenuity’s decree,
Commanding the ten thousand spirits.
Flying to the Xun Gate,
Thunder’s voice resounds in Zhen.
The Kan Palace brings rain,
The Li fire charges forth.
Clouds soar through the skies,
Thunder and lightning follow.
The Four Demon-Quelling Generals,
Commanding and marshaling Thunder Duke.
Dragon and tiger riders,
Vanquishing ghosts without trace.
Piercing cliffs, smashing temples,
Slaying monsters, seizing dragons.
Subduing demons, capturing evil,
Curing illness, eliminating misfortune.
The Three-Five officers and soldiers,
Displaying mighty prowess.
Following my talismanic command,
Swiftly establish divine merit.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Another Incantation**
By the Purple Tenuity’s decree,
Commanding demons to seize the fierce.
Overturning heaven, shaking earth,
Shaking the empty void.
The Jade Culmen Marshal,
Celestial Might, Tianpeng.
Mighty numinous qi and flames,
Ancestors of the ten thousand spirits.
The Luminous Primordial Vice Marshal,
The Heavenly Plan, Heavenly Might.
Self-proclaimed resplendent,
All heavens unite in merit.
The August Saintly Spirit,
The Celestial Numinous, Supreme Impulse.
Secretly named the Beckoning Star,
Slaying evil, eradicating traces.
The Perfected Martial Great Sage,
The Celestial Martial, Celestial Youth.
Secretly named the Dark Warrior,
Sternly subduing the Northern Fengdu.
The Northern Pole’s Four Saints,
Manifesting numinous might.
Below, roaming the mortal world,
Above, ascending the Jade Loftiness.
Seated within the Southern Dipper,
Standing amid the Northern Dipper.
The iron wheel flies west,
The fire chariot drives east.
Driving thunder, seizing lightning,
Racing clouds, chasing winds.
Heaven and earth darken,
Sun and moon dim and obscure.
Heavenly soldiers in ranks,
Heavenly horses in throngs.
Black banners resplendent,
Heavenly drums rumble.
Green Dragon, Jia and Yi,
Four-eyed old men.
Meteors spew fire,
The Emperor’s bell resounds in thunder.
Vermilion Phoenix, Bing and Ding,
The Vermilion Mound’s Fire Palace.
Hurling fire a thousand miles,
Streaming bells in eight directions.
White Tiger, Geng and Xin,
The Radiant Numinous wields the host.
Vanguarded by crows,
Rearmed with venomous wasps.
Dark Warrior, Ren and Gui,
Water and fire clash in assault.
Celestial Pass and Earthly Axis,
Poisonous arrays advance in ranks.
The Encircling Serpent,
Wu and Ji’s earthen seal.
The Celestial August Emperor,
Enthroned to guard the round vault.
The Jade Pivot transforms in form,
The Capital Heaven’s Thunder Duke.
Commanding the thunder generals,
Thunder, water, fire, and wind.
Metal essence fierce beasts,
White择 and Azure 鬷.
Grasping the celestial decree,
Decapitating stars, severing rainbows.
The myriad forms of the forest,
Transforming and spreading through the high vault.
Wind and fire’s laws,
Endlessly changing.
Black surging, black poison,
Purple hooks, purple dissolution.
The heavens blacken universally,
The Dharma Realm glows red throughout,
Crimson light flickers,
Black qi darkens and obscures.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning Marshal Guan Incantation**
By the Northern Emperor’s supreme mandate,
Authority extends over the Nine Heavens.
Down through Fengdu it penetrates,
Commands transmitted through qi.
Reverently obeying the Northern Emperor,
I urgently summon the great general Guan Yu,

chunks.original_text: 阴炁冰冰，阳炁烘烘。 雷仙灵窿，风仙水。 雨仙房英，电仙娄容。 霹雳震黑，飞戈走。 移山拔树，云雾阴浓。 飞砂走石，驱鞭火龙。 欻火大神，正直公忠。 朱发巨翅，双目耀彤。 雷钻雷鈼，雷斧以銮。 破山山崩，覆海海踪。 受命北极，四圣飞躬。 古精恶怪，靡不灭综。 横天火罩，万里通熔。 化为飞灰，以。 东南日火，其神祝融。 西方金火，其神楚澧。 东北雷火，其神宋恭。 西北烈火，其神马。 天上地下，火仙火童。 火龙火马，火犀火踪。 八卦火虎，五方火龙。 飞火掷火，收捕妖丛。 符命告下，火急催堂。 敢有中，吾有玄琮。 急急如律令。 召煞咒 北帝敕召，罗土宿。 煞炁飞空，天地沉暗。 日月失光，邪逢裂碎。 无路迷蒙，急急锁定，山河海风。 急急如律令。 下罩咒 北帝救召，东震西兑，南离北坎。 开天门闭地户，留人门塞鬼路。 上不通风过，下不容水流。 大魔神祟，风刀斩头。 人来无踪，鬼来迷路。 谨请东方甲乙木，十万天丁锁地轴。 南方丙丁火，十万天丁齐降赴。 西方庚辛金，十万天丁尽降临。 北方壬癸水，十万天丁食恶鬼。 中央戊己土，十万天丁齐卫护。 急急如律令。 太灵九宫咒 太灵九宫，太乙守房。 百神森卫，魂魄和同。 长生久视，塞灭邪凶。 与天同祖，变化报穷。 急急如律令。 敕令咒 吾行一令，刀剑如林。 八方罩定，上下，排兵。 敢有张漏，玄律有刑。 急急如律令。 催捉咒 北帝神恶，立坛追捉。 缚邪如电，捉怪应诺。 敢有违令，透腹神戈。 神真立降，　速缚邪魔。 急急如律令。 澶水咒 北帝敕命，天肠地阴。 冰清九炁，四海龙君。 蟾蜂虾，铁面将军。 江敌九江，水祇子洞。 子溟子派，子漍子渊。 子濿子淁，子演子汶。 云雾腾腾，雷光霹雳，馘灭邪精。 风伯雨师，冰雹细大神。 北方神将，澶捉在身。 急急如律令。 召将咒 登阳明召雷神，驱雷电，布风云。 轰霹雳，斩魔群。 五雷将，馘妖精。 □□二圣，□□后明。 □□左右，□星见形。 急急如律令。 敕剑咒 玄剑出施，天丁卫随。 天斗煞神，五斗助威。 指天天昏，指地地裂。 指山山崩，指鬼鬼灭。 神剑一下，万鬼灭绝。 急急如律令。 召降咒 帝敕灵灵，大力天丁。 威剑神王，杀鬼诛神。 山魈五通，无敢当邢。 提头沥血，斩邪恶神。 天符到处，永断邪精。 救民疾苦，大赐威灵。 诛斩凶恶，符到奉行。 急急如律令。 召陈将军咒 谨请北极无面目，手持铁杖伏群 魔。 黑发蓬头威厉现，反睛掣电涉山河。 陈胜急速至娑诃。 急急如律令。 又
chunks.translated_text:
Yin qi chills with icy stillness,
Yang qi blazes with fervent glow.
Thunder Immortals dwell in hollows,
Wind Immortals in water’s flow.
Rain Immortals, Fang and Ying,
Lightning Immortals, Lou and Rong.
Black thunderclaps shake the heavens,
Flying spears and racing blades.
Shifting mountains, uprooting trees,
Clouds and mist thicken in gloom.
Flying sand and hurtling stones,
Driving whips of fire-dragons.
The Great Spirit of Sudden Fire,
Upright, loyal, and true.
Crimson-haired with mighty wings,
Eyes aflame in vermilion hue.
Thunder drills and thunder chisels,
Thunder axes with ringing bells.
Shattering mountains, mountains crumble,
Overturning seas, seas vanish without trace.
Receiving command from the Northern Culmen,
The Four Saints hasten in flight.
Ancient essences and evil specters,
None escape annihilation’s grasp.
The Fire Canopy spans the heavens,
Melting all for ten thousand leagues.
Reduced to flying ash,
Scattered and dispersed.

In the southeast, the Fire of the Sun,
Its spirit, Zhu Rong.
In the west, the Fire of Metal,
Its spirit, Chu Li.
In the northeast, the Fire of Thunder,
Its spirit, Song Gong.
In the northwest, the Fire of Fury,
Its spirit, Ma Xun.
Above the heavens and below the earth,
Fire Immortals and Fire Youths.
Fire dragons and fire horses,
Fire rhinos and fire trails.
The Fire Tigers of the Eight Trigrams,
The Fire Dragons of the Five Directions.
Flinging fire, hurling fire,
Seizing and capturing demonic hordes.
The talismanic command descends,
Urgent summons to the hall.
Should any dare obstruct,
I wield the Dark Jade Seal.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning the Slayer Spell**
By the Northern Emperor’s decree,
Luosha and Earthly Mansions,
Slayer qi soars through the void,
Heaven and earth plunge into darkness.
Sun and moon lose their light,
Evil meets shattering destruction.
No path remains, all is confusion,
Swiftly sealed and bound,
Mountains, rivers, seas, and winds.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Descending Canopy Spell**
By the Northern Emperor’s salvation decree,
East Zhen and West Dui,
South Li and North Kan.
Open the Gate of Heaven, close the Door of Earth,
Leave the Human Gate unbarred, block the Ghost Road.
Above, no wind may pass,
Below, no water may flow.
Great demonic spirits and malevolent specters,
Wind blades sever their heads.
Humans approach without trace,
Ghosts arrive lost in bewilderment.
Reverently summon the Wood of East Jia and Yi,
One hundred thousand Heavenly Soldiers seal the Earthly Axis.
The Fire of South Bing and Ding,
One hundred thousand Heavenly Soldiers descend in unison.
The Metal of West Geng and Xin,
One hundred thousand Heavenly Soldiers arrive in full.
The Water of North Ren and Gui,
One hundred thousand Heavenly Soldiers devour evil ghosts.
The Earth of Central Wu and Ji,
One hundred thousand Heavenly Soldiers guard and protect.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Great Numinous Nine Palaces Spell**
The Great Numinous Nine Palaces,
Taiyi guards the chamber.
A hundred spirits stand in solemn guard,
Soul and spirit in harmony.
Long life and enduring vision,
Sealing and extinguishing evil and misfortune.
Of the same origin as Heaven,
Transforming and exhausting all adversity.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Decree Spell**
I issue a single command,
Blades and swords stand like a forest.
The Eight Directions sealed and fixed,
Above and below, troops arrayed.
Should any dare transgress,
The Dark Law metes out punishment.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Urgent Seizure Spell**
The Northern Emperor’s divine wrath,
Erects an altar to pursue and seize.
Binding evil swift as lightning,
Seizing demons at a word.
Should any dare defy the command,
The Divine Spear pierces their belly.
Divine beings descend at once,
Swiftly binding evil demons.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Abyssal Water Spell**
By the Northern Emperor’s decree,
Heaven’s intestines and Earth’s yin.
Ice-pure ninefold qi,
Dragon Lords of the Four Seas.
Toads, scorpions, and shrimp,
Iron-Faced Generals.
Rivaling the Nine Rivers,
Water Spirits of the Grotto.
Ziming and Zipai,
Ziguo and Ziyuan.
Zili and Zise,
Ziyan and Ziwen.
Clouds and mist billow,
Thunder’s light and claps,
Beheading and extinguishing evil essences.
Wind Earl and Rain Master,
Hail and sleet, mighty spirits.
Northern Direction’s divine generals,
Abyssal waters seize upon the body.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning the Generals Spell**
Ascend Yangming to summon the Thunder Gods,
Drive thunder and lightning, spread wind and clouds.
Roaring thunderclaps,
Slaying demonic hordes.
The Five Thunder Generals,
Beheading demonic essences.
[...] Two Saints,
[...] Houming.
[...] Left and right,
[...] Stars manifest in form.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Decreeing the Sword Spell**
The Dark Sword emerges and strikes,
Heavenly Soldiers follow in guard.
Heavenly Dipper’s Slayer Spirits,
The Five Dippers lend their might.
Point to the heavens, heavens darken,
Point to the earth, earth splits.
Point to the mountains, mountains crumble,
Point to ghosts, ghosts perish.
With one stroke of the divine sword,
Ten thousand ghosts are annihilated.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning and Descending Spell**
By the Emperor’s numinous decree,
Mighty Heavenly Soldiers.
Venerable Sword Spirit Kings,
Slaying ghosts and executing spirits.
Mountain imps and Five Penetrations,
None dare withstand their judgment.
Heads lifted, blood dripping,
Beheading evil spirits.
Where the Heavenly Talisman arrives,
Evil essences are forever severed.
Rescuing the people’s suffering,
Bestowing great majestic power.
Executing and beheading the malevolent,
The talisman’s arrival is obeyed.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning General Chen Spell**
Reverently summon the Faceless One of the Northern Culmen,
Wielding an iron staff to subdue demonic hordes.
Black hair wild and disheveled, awe-inspiring presence,
Eyes flashing lightning, traversing mountains and rivers.
Chen Sheng, hasten swiftly, svāhā!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

chunks.original_text: 黑摩口宣敕，叱咤呼四直。 急令北极将，风火降九质。 含炁契玄真，虚九符实一。 勇烈阐威灵，灭魔断黑雳。 亲传大教令，违命施霹雳。 急急如律令。 敕遗灵官咒 三天大法主，霹雳第一尊。 霄伯灵官将，腾云捉五通。 万天称为主，南昌唤仙翁。 准奉玉帝敕，运雷猛将军。 呼吸山河沸，忿怒日月昏。 敢有逆命者，碎斩如微尘。 急急如律令。 策役咒 天帝内秘，役使万灵。 帝敕所临，如帝亲征。 敢有拒逆，雷斧灭形。 唵吽吽众神稽首，万神奉命。 符到所司，立要来迎。 不得有违，火急应命。 急急如律令。 玉音召咒 唵啊噜叻唵，伽哩驿唵，□鹏哆咤啼，呵檀啼，檀□婆啼，檀□鹏啥□□□婆哆□啼□啼。 敕召横天霸，欻火大神邓燮立至疾。 急急如律令。 敕役雷总咒 啊檀啼檀□婆啼檀，□□啥隶修隶修，啊婆哆哩雷伽婆履□嘙，急召雷大、雷二、雷· 三、雷四、雷五速至，惟阴师六女婆，反黑七里帝、隐帝、咄都大帝婆诃。 三帅起雷秘咒 咤叱妖雷，疾疾急离。 震电命我，雨师召我。 风伯运我，雷车持我。 雷斧一声，人惊二声。 地折三声，万神掩耳。 急急如律令。 催雷咒 震天霹雳，震地霹雳。 小声得得，大声□□。 欢声击击，怒声勒勒。 来声急急，驱声逼逼。 集声黑黑，区声索索。 愿力威力，愿降神力。 腾飞八隅，来听一拍。 急急如律令。 腾魂降附咒 金星金星，速现真水。 水精火精，速现真灵。 人魂附鬼，鬼魂附人。 水火既济，火急降灵。 灵魂灵魂，即便通灵。 收魂摄魄，不得久停。 手提魂袋，巡游乾坤。 生魂入袋，鬼魂附身。 如若有违，考打阳魂。 二将疾速，火急通灵。 急急如律令。 驱邪咒 上清三景，总炁上元。 八景冥合，炁入玄元。 中有二将，辅佐重玄。 黑风霹雳，黑雾昏腾。 为祸下鬼，驱出患身。 急急如律令。 召殷元帅咒 谨召岁君猛将，闻召速临。 急如星火，迅若风雷。 袪云掣电，掷火流星。 黄婶前引，豹尾后随。 七十二候，恶杀当先。 逢妖寸斩，遇鬼灭形。 前袪九丑，后灭山魈。 飞龙土怪，镇伏魁星。 吾今召请，火急降临。 有违帝命，风火灭形。 急急如律令。 出印咒 出自中央祖，戊己化为土。 万神尽皈依，百邪不敢觑。 九曜藏我身，五帝管星数。 黄河水逆流，五岳崩摧去。 大林尽飘扬，三春叶焦黄。 吾寄斗牛口，万万魔精走。 土地保吾正，炎光聚死灰。 若教吾一怒，开眼再观觑。 馈定把中央，须教万物藏。 神印一照，万邪随印灭，尽化为凝血。 急急如律令。 坐炼咒 神默默，炁绵绵。 存赤炁，在丹元。 透泥丸，上冲天。 布金桥，现七元。 魁神降，亦炁旋。 混为一，秘号悬。 恍惚间，自炁缠。 急急吸，款款咽。 纳元宫，真火煎。 再提起，印堂前。 金光现，照无边。 飞剑诀，莫留连。 金光裂，将吏全。 行持处，要在专。 急急如律令。 召刘大神咒 武当山黑虎大神，雷声震动捉妖精。 部领天兵三十万，玄天上帝黑雾冲，威雄操恶现神通。 六丁六甲八煞将，刘文显火急到坛庭。 大神大神急速来。 急急如律令。
chunks.translated_text:
**Black Ma’s Edict Proclamation**
With a roar, he summons the Four Directions.
Swiftly command the Northern Culmen General—
Wind and fire descend upon the Nine Essences.
Inhaling qi to unite with the Mysterious True,
The Void’s Nine Talismans merge into One.
Fierce and valiant, he manifests majestic power,
Annihilating demons and severing dark might.
Personally transmitting the Great Teaching’s decree,
Those who defy the command shall face thunderbolts.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Edict to the Spirit Officials**
Sovereign of the Three Heavens’ Great Dharma,
Foremost among Thunderbolt Deities.
Celestial Marshal Xiaobo,
Riding clouds to seize the Five Penetrations.
Proclaimed Lord of the Myriad Heavens,
Summoned by Nanchang’s Immortal Elder.
By Jade Emperor’s edict, he wields,
The Fierce Thunder General.
His breath sets mountains and rivers ablaze,
His wrath dims sun and moon.
Whoever dares resist his command
Shall be shattered like dust.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning and Dispatching Spell**
The Heavenly Emperor’s secret decree,
Commands and employs the myriad spirits.
Where the imperial edict arrives,
It is as if the Emperor himself marches.
Whoever dares resist or rebel
Shall be obliterated by the thunder-axe.
*Oṃ hūṃ!* All gods bow their heads,
The myriad spirits obey the command.
Where the talisman is sent,
Officials must hasten to receive it.
No disobedience shall be tolerated—
Respond with utmost urgency!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Jade Tone Summoning Spell**
*Oṃ āḷu lē oṃ, qié lǐ yì oṃ, [ ] péng duō zhà tí, hē tán tí, tán [ ] pó tí, tán [ ] péng hē [ ] [ ] pó duō [ ] tí [ ] tí.*
Edict summons the Transcendent Overlord,
Swiftly arrives the Great Fire Spirit Deng Xie.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Edict to Command the Thunder Generals**
*Ā tán tí tán [ ] pó tí tán, [ ] [ ] hē lì xiū lì xiū, ā pó duō lǐ léi qié pó lǚ [ ] pō.*
Swiftly summon Thunder the Great, Thunder the Second, Thunder the Third, Thunder the Fourth, Thunder the Fifth—hasten!
The Yin Master’s Six Maidens,
The Reverse Black Seven Li Emperor, the Hidden Emperor, the Dūtu Great Emperor—*svāhā!*
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Three Marshals’ Secret Thunder Spell**
Roar and rebuke the demonic thunder,
Swiftly, swiftly depart!
The Thunderbolt commands me,
The Rain Master summons me.
The Wind Earl conveys me,
The Thunder Chariot bears me.
At the first strike of the thunder-axe, men tremble;
At the second, the earth splits;
At the third, the myriad spirits cover their ears.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Urging Thunder Spell**
Heaven-shaking thunderbolts,
Earth-shattering thunderbolts.
Soft sounds: *dé-dé*,
Loud sounds: *[ ] [ ]*.
Joyful sounds: *jī-jī*,
Angry sounds: *lè-lè*.
Approaching sounds: *jí-jí*,
Driving sounds: *bī-bī*.
Gathering sounds: *hēi-hēi*,
Dispersing sounds: *suǒ-suǒ*.
By the power of vow and might,
Descend with divine force!
Soaring across the Eight Directions,
Come and heed this single clap.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Rising Soul and Descending Attachment Spell**
Venus, Venus, swiftly manifest true water.
Water essence, fire essence, swiftly reveal true spirits.
Human souls attach to ghosts,
Ghost souls attach to men.
Water and fire in harmony,
Hasten the descent of spirits!
Souls, souls, immediately commune.
Gather souls and seize spirits—
No delay permitted.
Holding the soul bag,
Patrolling the cosmos.
Living souls enter the bag,
Ghost souls attach to the body.
Should there be disobedience,
The yang soul shall be punished.
Two generals, hasten swiftly—
Communicate with utmost urgency!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Expelling Evil Spell**
Supreme Clarity’s Three Luminaries,
Primordial qi of the Upper Origin.
Eight Luminaries merge in darkness,
Qi enters the Mysterious Origin.
Within dwell two generals,
Assisting the Profound Mystery.
Black winds and thunderbolts,
Black mists swirling in gloom.
Malevolent ghosts below—
Expel them from the afflicted body!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning Marshal Yin Spell**
Reverently summon the Fierce General of the Year Star,
Who hastens upon hearing the call—
Urgent as wildfire,
Swift as wind and thunder.
Dispelling clouds and seizing lightning,
Hurling fire and shooting stars.
Yellow-robed attendants lead the way,
Leopard-tailed followers trail behind.
Of the seventy-two seasonal markers,
He wields the fiercest killing force.
Encountering demons, he severs them inch by inch;
Facing ghosts, he obliterates their forms.
Ahead, he dispels the Nine Uglies;
Behind, he annihilates mountain imps.
Flying dragons and earth spirits,
He subdues the Demon Star.
Now I summon and invoke—
Descend with utmost urgency!
Whoever defies the imperial command
Shall be incinerated by wind and fire.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Seal-Activating Spell**
Issuing from the Central Ancestor,
Wu and Ji transform into earth.
All gods submit in reverence,
No evil dares to gaze upon me.
The Nine Luminaries conceal my body,
The Five Emperors govern the stars’ courses.
The Yellow River flows backward,
The Five Peaks crumble and collapse.
Great forests are swept away,
Spring’s leaves wither and yellow.
I lodge within the Dipper’s mouth—
Ten thousand, ten thousand demonic essences flee.
The earth spirits protect my righteousness,
Fiery light gathers dead ashes.
Should I unleash my wrath,
Open my eyes and behold again.
Firmly seize the center,
Commanding all things to withdraw.
The divine seal shines once—
All evil perishes with the seal,
Reduced to congealed blood.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Seated Refinement Spell**
Spirits in silence,
Qi flowing endlessly.
Visualize red qi
Within the Cinnabar Origin.
Pierce the Mud Pill,
Ascend to the heavens.
Unfold the Golden Bridge,
Reveal the Seven Origins.
The Demon-Quelling Spirit descends,
Qi swirling in return.
Merge into one,
The secret name suspended.
In the realm of indistinctness,
Qi naturally entwines.
Swiftly inhale,
Gently swallow.
Receive within the Origin Palace,
Refined by true fire.
Raise once more
Before the Hall of Impressions.
Golden light manifests,
Illuminating boundlessly.
The Flying Sword Formula—
No lingering.
Golden light splits,
All officials assemble.
In practice,
Focus is paramount.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning the Great Spirit Liu Spell**
Great Black Tiger Spirit of Mount Wudang,
Thunder roars to seize demonic essences.
Leading three hundred thousand heavenly soldiers,
The Dark Heavenly Emperor surges with black mist,
Mighty and fierce, displaying divine power.
The Six Dings, Six Jias, and Eight Slaughtering Generals—
Liu Wenxian, hasten to the altar!
Great Spirit, Great Spirit, come swiftly!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

chunks.original_text: 召温元帅咒 主岳有令，左旋右转。 顺跨魁罡，乾坤立现。 太保通灵，赫奕万变。 癸巽丁壬，收精如箭。 准此令行，不得稽缓。 唵灵灵，惨惨息息。 速去摄唵吽吽，唵北帝敕。 急急如律令。 又 一炁合德，水火摄精。 阳动阴应，万神化生。 赤气徘徊，黑烟蕴郁。 令我洞照，彻精达神。 召之立至，受命来迎。 急急如律令。 馘魔咒 馘魔大将，部领神兵。 前有三千，后有成群。 黑云叆叇，诛斩魔灵。 若亲若疏，尽底收擒。 不得违令，火急奉行。 急急如律令。 摄祟咒 天元真将，地甲大将。 酆都猛将，烈勇神灵。 吾令速发，大显威灵。 东至扶桑，南至阎浮。 西至摩尼，北至郁单。 远遍四大神洲，近则不离方寸。 急急收摄，为祸邪鬼。 大阐厥灵，如法报应。 急急如律令。 召雷神咒 五雷神将，化身千真。 驱役雷电，走火行云。 五方降炁，速驱雷霆。 吾今召汝，直至坛庭。 听令施行，疾疾速速。 急急如律令。 役使者咒 六一使者，天喜尊神。 汝等天中神吏，火烈黑煞。 今日召汝，赉持符命。 关文前往巽宫，告召元伯，大逞威灵。 疾疾速速，急急奔云。 急急如律 令。

**Summoning Marshal Wen Spell**
By decree of the Supreme Peak,
Leftward revolve, rightward turn.
Follow the stride of *Kui* and *Gang*—
Heaven and Earth stand revealed.
The Grand Guardian communicates the numinous,
Resplendent in myriad transformations.
*Gui-Xun, Ding-Ren*—
Seizing essences swift as arrows.
Execute this command without delay.
*Om, luminous, luminous—*
Grim and hushed, hushed and still.
Hasten forth to seize: *Om, Hum, Hum!*
*Om, luminous—by the Northern Emperor’s decree!*
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Another [Spell]**
Qi unites with virtue,
Water and fire seize essence.
Yang moves, Yin responds—
Myriad spirits transform and arise.
Crimson qi lingers,
Black mist coils thickly.
Command my penetrating illumination,
Piercing essence to reach the divine.
Summoned, you shall arrive at once,
Receiving the mandate to come forth.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Beheading Demons Spell**
Great General of Demon-Beheading,
Leading divine soldiers in ranks.
Three thousand advance,
Countless follow behind.
Black clouds gather dense—
Slay and sever demonic spirits.
Be they kin or stranger,
All shall be seized and captured.
Disobey not this command—
Execute it with utmost haste!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Seizing Malevolence Spell**
True General of Heaven’s Origin,
Great General of Earth’s *Jia*.
Fierce General of Fengdu,
Valiant and mighty spirits.
I command you to depart swiftly,
Displaying your mighty power.
East to Fusang,
South to Jambudvīpa.
West to Maṇi,
North to Uttarakuru.
Far across the Four Great Continents,
Near, within the span of a square inch.
Seize and capture with haste
The malevolent ghosts that bring calamity.
Manifest your power in full,
As the law decrees, so shall it be.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning Thunder Gods Spell**
Generals of the Five Thunders,
Manifesting in a thousand true forms.
Commanding thunder and lightning,
Driving fire and coursing clouds.
Qi descends from the Five Directions—
Hasten to dispatch thunderbolts!
I now summon you
To come directly before the altar.
Hear the command and act—
Swiftly, swiftly, with speed!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Dispatching Agents Spell**
Messengers of the Six-One,
Venerable spirits of Heaven’s Joy.
You, divine officials of the celestial realm,
Fierce and black with slaughterous might.
Today I summon you,
Bearing talismanic orders.
Proceed with the writ to the *Xun* Palace,
Announce the summons to Yuanbo,
That he may display his mighty power.
Swiftly, swiftly—
*Hasten, hasten, riding the clouds!*
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

chunks.original_text: 治祟敕咒 天灵地灵，上帝敕行。 飞捷使者，直符吏兵，天丁力士，六甲六丁，天地水府，城隍等神，承吾符命，急速奉行。 收捕逆鬼，杵碎邪精。 尽党收捉，无辄容情。 如敢违拒，天有常刑。 急急如律令。 敕召四直符咒 敕召年直、月直、日直、时直四大功曹，□□□□囔叹，摄咤天上天下，八卦阴阳。 功曹符使，神赫开张。 出幽入冥，三界洞乡，乘符亟召，报应玄罡。 急急如律令。 召破秽将军咒 九凤真人，破秽凤凰。 朱衣仗剑，立吾上方。 九头吐火，当吾前行。 炎炎匝地，万丈火光。 九凤破秽，邪精灭亡。 急急如律令。 告斗微音咒 斗魁七星，众灵之精。 辅弼二相，三台明象。 六丁玉女，紫微四将。 天罡天元，坎水人元。 四目神仙，金童传言。 诵满百遍，七真应见。 延寿驱厄，勒毒灭妖。 祈求任意，保真富贵。 身有光明，乾元亨利贞。 急急如律令。 密召咒 阳明阴精，真人玄冥。 丹元北阙，天关之灵。 除臣死籍，注臣长生。 所求皆遂，所愿皆成。 众人钦爱，飞升紫庭。 急急如律令。 斗印咒 香烧心信，志视天真。 斗门开发，明理明通。 七元三台，北极帝君。 三光九曜，万里神兵。 天将符敕，吾令速行。 法令智慧，法道通真。 法合天地，法保吾身。 千和万合，自然成真。 急急如律令。 化形咒 天地大明，万炁混生。 我得真一，内景玉庭。 虚皇救命，令我通真。 上元赤子，三元六府。 百神会并，混合我身。 上朝斗府，出入紫庭。 游宴八冥，三一上景。 太一玄真，奏我所意，上达斗真。 心有所愿，默奉允呈。 所得玄旨，副我心灵。 人间万事，一一开分。 飞神玉坛，分身一形。 急急如律令。 清净身心咒 青阳青阳，属于左方。 上有真精，下结灵光。 道自固真，水妙金光。 灌注身心，法想充当。 吾今敷诵，与道悠扬。 急急如律令。 灵阳速报大绩咒 天上人间，去住不齐。 凡有启请，速降丹梯。 笔墨纸素，早赐灵批。 随愿随感，母惇毋违。 帝敕灵童，速降来临。 急急如律令。 天童咒 天童天童，位正中宫。 姹女神君，明受帝敕。 化身跨虎，救降火龙。 手执宝扇，步武雍容。 人有恳请，无愿不从。 事有紧切，悉告梦中。 急急如律令。 北斗大神咒 北斗七元，神炁统天。 天罡大圣，威光万千。 上天下地，断绝邪源。 乘云而升，来降坛前。 降临真炁，穿水入烟。 传之三界，万魔擎拳。 斩妖灭踪，回死登仙。 急急如律令。 关元帅大誓咒 朗灵朗灵，诚魔将军。 邓都肃杀，黑煞奔凝。 白袍铁马，红额青巾。 提魂拷勘，摄祟附身。 驱魔缚鬼，不问疏亲。 功成岳将，令属幽阴。 九泉号令，煞炁氤氲。 悲风凛凛，百万雄兵。 闻今有召，速现全身。 急急如律令。 召通灵使者咒 吾行太上法，搜捉众邪精。 闻呼立便至，有感立通灵。 若有违迟者，殃及汝等身。 谨召显应通灵急捉使者蒋锐速至。 通灵使者，斗中之仙。 乘云激电，显应无边。 救护群品，功奏上天。 闻吾呼召，火速到前。 急急如律令。 五雷化身咒 神霄玉洞飞玄章，斡运雷霆消万殃。 千真奉命辅真王，祆氛炁魄咸奔藏。 混合三宫归华房，洞映兆身入明堂。 神运兆基合旻苍，嵯峨上拱玉清王。 六雷翻赤道，八曜运河罡。 急疾。 召龙咒 黑云瑞腾，太乙抚朝。 玉霞洞灵，落阴从龙。

**Exorcism Spell for Curing Malevolent Influences**
Spirits of Heaven and Earth,
Empowered by the August Decree.
Swift-flying messengers,
Direct talisman-bearing officers and soldiers,
Heavenly *Ding* warriors and forceful knights,
Six *Jia* and Six *Ding*,
Spirits of Heaven, Earth, and Water Palaces,
City Gods and all such deities—
Receive my talismanic command,
And act with utmost speed.
Seize and capture rebellious ghosts,
Crush and shatter wayward spirits.
Apprehend their entire faction,
Show no leniency.
Should any dare resist,
Heaven’s eternal punishment awaits.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning Spell for the Four Direct Talisman-Officers**
I now summon the Four Great Merit-Officers of the Year, Month, Day, and Hour—
□□□□, roaring and sighing,
Commanding all above and below Heaven,
The Eight Trigrams and Yin-Yang.
Merit-officers and talisman-messengers,
Divine majesty unfurls.
Emerging from darkness into the hidden,
Traversing the Three Realms and all regions,
Riding the talisman, swiftly summoned,
Reporting with the response of Mysterious *Gang*.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning Spell for the Breaker of Filth General**
Ninefold Phoenix Perfected,
Breaker of Filth Phoenix.
Crimson-robed, sword in hand,
Standing above me.
Nine heads spewing fire,
Advancing before me.
Flaming, engulfing the earth,
Ten-thousand-zhang firelight.
Nine Phoenixes break filth,
Wayward spirits perish.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Prayer to the Dipper’s Subtle Tone**
The Dipper’s seven stars,
Essence of all spirits.
Assisting ministers,
Three Terraces’ bright signs.
Six *Ding* Jade Maidens,
Purple Tenuity’s Four Generals.
Heavenly *Gang*, Heavenly Origin,
Kan Water, Human Origin.
Four-Eyed Divine Immortals,
Golden Lads transmit words.
Upon reciting a hundred times,
The Seven Perfected manifest.
Prolonging life, dispelling misfortune,
Restraining poison, vanquishing demons.
Pray as you will,
Preserving truth and prosperity.
Your body radiant with light—
*Qian* Origin, *Kun* Principle, Smooth and Upright.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Secret Summoning Spell**
Yang brightness, Yin essence,
Perfected of Mysterious Darkness.
Cinnabar Origin at the Northern Palace,
Spirit of Heaven’s Gate.
Remove my name from the ledger of death,
Inscribe me in the register of long life.
All I seek shall be fulfilled,
All I wish shall be achieved.
Revered by all,
Ascending to the Purple Court.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Dipper Seal Spell**
Incense burns with sincere faith,
Intent gazes upon Heaven’s truth.
The Dipper’s gate opens,
Illuminating principle, illuminating understanding.
Seven Origins, Three Terraces,
Northern Culmen Emperor Lord.
Three Lights, Nine Luminaries,
Ten-thousand-mile divine soldiers.
Heavenly generals’ talismanic decree—
I command you to act swiftly.
Dharma’s command brings wisdom,
Dharma’s Dao unites with truth.
Dharma harmonizes Heaven and Earth,
Dharma guards my body.
A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions,
Naturally achieving truth.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Transformation Spell**
Heaven and Earth’s great brightness,
Myriad *qi* intermingling at birth.
I attain the True One,
Inner vision of the Jade Court.
Empty Sovereign saves my life,
Commanding me to commune with truth.
Upper Origin’s Red Child,
Three Origins, Six Palaces.
Hundred spirits assemble,
Merging with my body.
Ascending to the Dipper’s palace,
Entering and exiting the Purple Court.
Roaming the Eight Darknesses,
Three Ones’ Upper Radiance.
Grand One, Mysterious Perfected,
Present my intent,
Conveying it to the Dipper’s Perfected.
Whatever my heart desires,
Silently I offer, and it is granted.
Receiving the Mysterious Decree,
It aligns with my heart’s spirit.
All worldly affairs,
Each unfolds clearly.
My spirit flies to the Jade Altar,
My form divides into one.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Purification of Body and Mind Spell**
Green Yang, Green Yang,
Belonging to the left direction.
Above dwells true essence,
Below coalesces numinous light.
The Dao naturally secures truth,
Water’s wondrous golden light.
Pouring into body and mind,
Dharma’s contemplation fills all.
Now I recite and spread,
Harmonizing with the Dao’s far-reaching resonance.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Spirit Yang’s Swift Achievement of Great Merit Spell**
Between Heaven and Earth,
Coming and going are not fixed.
For all petitions made,
Swiftly descend the cinnabar ladder.
Brush, ink, paper, and silk—
Hasten to bestow numinous response.
As wished, as sensed,
Without delay or disobedience.
By imperial decree, the Spirit Lad
Swiftly descends and arrives.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Heavenly Lad Spell**
Heavenly Lad, Heavenly Lad,
Positioned in the Central Palace.
Alchemical Maiden, Divine Lord,
Brightly receiving the imperial decree.
Transforming form, riding a tiger,
Saving and descending the fire dragon.
Holding a precious fan,
Steps measured and dignified.
For all earnest petitions,
No wish remains unfulfilled.
For urgent matters,
All are revealed in dreams.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Great Dipper Divine Spell**
Northern Dipper’s Seven Origins,
Divine *qi* governs Heaven.
Great Sage of Heavenly *Gang*,
Majestic light in myriad forms.
Above Heaven, below Earth,
Severing the roots of waywardness.
Riding clouds to ascend,
Descending before the altar.
Descending true *qi*,
Piercing water, entering mist.
Transmitting through the Three Realms,
Ten thousand demons raise their fists.
Slaying demons, erasing traces,
Turning death into immortal ascent.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Marshal Guan’s Great Oath Spell**
Bright spirit, bright spirit,
Honest Demon General.
Deng Capital’s stern execution,
Black *sha* coalescing in haste.
White-robed, iron horse,
Red forehead, blue headscarf.
Seizing souls for interrogation,
Capturing malevolent influences to possess the body.
Driving out demons, binding ghosts,
No distinction between distant and close.
Upon mission’s completion,
Commanding the netherworld’s generals.
Nine Springs’ decrees,
*Sha* *qi* swirling.
Mournful winds howl,
A million mighty soldiers.
Hearing this summons,
Swiftly manifest in full.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summoning the Communicative Spirit Messenger Spell**
I practice the Supreme One’s Dharma,
Searching and seizing all wayward spirits.
At my call, instantly arrive,
At my sensing, instantly commune.
Should any delay or disobey,
Calamity befalls your bodies.
Solemnly summon the Manifest Responsive Swift-Seizing Messenger Jiang Rui to hasten here.
Communicative Spirit Messenger,
Immortal within the Dipper.
Riding clouds, spurring lightning,
Manifesting boundless response.
Protecting all beings,
Merits reported to Heaven.
Hearing my call,
Swiftly appear before me.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Five Thunders’ Transformation Spell**
Divine *Xiao* Jade Grotto’s Flying Mysterious Chapter,
Revolving thunder to dissolve ten thousand misfortunes.
Thousand Perfected, obeying the command, assist the True King,
Demonic *qi* and spectral souls all flee in hiding.
Merging the Three Palaces into the Flower Chamber,
Illuminating my body to enter the Hall of Light.
Divine destiny unites my foundation with the Vast Azure,
Loftily upholding the Jade Clarity King.
Six Thunders overturn the Red Path,
Eight Luminaries revolve the River *Gang*.
Swiftly, swiftly!

**Dragon-Summoning Spell**
Black clouds auspiciously rising,
Grand One presiding over the court.
Jade rosy clouds’ numinous grotto,
Falling Yin follows the dragon.

**Iron Talisman Cast, Rain Master Attends**
With one strike, the Rain Master bears service.
Summon the dragon to bear water,
Primal essence dispersing in four directions.
Supreme Venerable White Elder,
Yanbo and the Five Dragons.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Stirring-Water Urn Spell**
Om! *Qi* of mountains and rivers,
Essence of the hundred constellations.
Knotted into a flowery canopy,
Stirring earth to form clouds.
Thunder-driving messengers,
*Qi*-binding numinous lords.
Receiving the Emperor’s salvation,
Let no delay be suffered.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Talismanic Summons of the Dragon Spell**
Talismanic command to save—numinous!
Talismanic command to charge—numinous!
Thunder Lord Great Emperor,
Resplendent in majestic voice.
Five Thunders’ Earth Deities,
No lingering permitted.
Advancing to receive the teaching,
A hundred leagues of awe-inspiring power.
Fire-wheel axes and drums,
Swiftly manifest your might!
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Summons of the Earth Deity and Yang Thunder Spell**
I bow to the Earth Deity, Lord of Yang Thunder,
Who divides his form into the Five Directions’ earth spirits.
Driving the divine drums, all respond in unison,
Descending true *qi* to enter my body.
Wherever summoned, immediate resonance,
A hundred leagues of awe-inspiring voice heard by all.
Om! Cha! Hum! Seize and summon General Yang Ji,
General Sun De, Western Vast Cautious Kan General Zhu Xi,
Central Commander-in-Chief Ma Guang,
Ten thousand paths of thunder-light,
Thunder-*qi* swirling in profusion.
Thunder’s great roar,
Thunder-fire flying in haste.
Thirteen auxiliary thunder deities,
Vice-generals of thunder.
Shattering mountains, toppling seas,
Felling trees, crushing forests.
Flying thunder, surging lightning,
Claps of thunder’s majestic voice.
Swift winds rising from the southeast,
Tigers roaring in the northeast.
Thunder’s bellowing roar,
Rainstorms pouring like torrents.
Now my talisman arrives,
Heaven and earth grow solemn and clear.
Great thunder’s quaking might,
Swiftly manifest your response!
Five Directions clash and grapple,
Drums resound in unison.
Five Directions respond in kind,
Sweeping away filth and misfortune.
Yellow thunder, blue *qi*,
Eastward surge, northward surge.
White thunder, black *qi*,
Severing and vanquishing evil traces.
Black thunder, yellow *qi*,
Moving and pressing the Nine Palaces.
Red thunder, white *qi*,
Ascending to roam the highest heavens.
All-Heaven Thunder Duke,
Blazing and roaring in the storm.
Blue thunder, red *qi*,
Thunderclap talisman in accord.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

chunks.original_text: 天苍地黄，我身升阳。 步行魁斗，化身天罡。 水火凶灾，悉离吾傍。 神飞金宫，面朝玉皇。 上对玉穹，金光十方。 急急如律令。 奇门咒 乘天罡，步九玄。 履元斗，行飞仙。 得天仙，万神欢。 。 隐形变，化万端。 敢有干试，收系斗门。 扫除不祥，正真明分。 左焕火铃，右挥金珰。 威光万里，啸命立前。 玉帝所祝，靡不如言。 急急如律令。 七星斗咒 阳明大魁，元极文昌。 阴精太极，太上璇玑。 飞罡一吸，万鬼伏藏。 玄明瑶光，紫微闿阳。 丹元至真，神炁吐威。 北极天□，回通玄神。 天关玉女，荣侍以归。 魂真魄神，举体仙飞。 急急如律令。 集神咒 神光神光，赫赫四方。 救吾真性，在天即还天，在地即还地。 在吾身中，道炁满充，化为真人。 东方界咒 萧仞扶桑，诸方郁霞。 元黄列真，凝结云霞。 明辉九芒，合乘三华。 镢天振剑，神虎辟邪。 安阳大帝，摄御群魔。 上升神霄，濯形无涯。 急急如律令。 南方界咒 炎炁流烟，运升赤明。 长生元圣，高居玉京。 元妙玄罗，散晶光明。 元天大诰，普济群生。 消殄妖魔，奔飞火铃。 保卫正黑，亿劫长存。 急急如律令。 西方界咒 皓景金华，长度洞光。 大梵流布，轮转元刚。 蔚明交变，腾化十方。 七关安镇，回么。 阴阳。 秽炁消荡，我身嘉祥。 玉文敷告，生道延昌。 急急如律令。 北方界咒 太阴朔单，上达帝君。 流炎腾精，化形玉虚。 辅翊三境，简阅元图。 真符焕发，定籍清都。 标名金箓，夙冤咸除。 飞神碧落，超登太虚。 急急如律令。 中宫界咒 元始虚皇，祖居土中。 三槩洞元，肇生太宫。 七转七变，混合回风。 散花万神，天地开通。 吉日行持，亿天所宗。 愿保劫年，享福无穷。 急急如律令。 服符咒 餐服神符，通昭真灵。 百神走使，洞彻中情。 六甲宿卫，渊渊清清。 五行元炁，杳杳冥冥。 万物无逃形，混沌未为清，闻声已知名。 天地神经，号曰开心，服之太平，达知自然，飞升紫庭。 急急如律令。 通神咒 心中神丹元君，长三寸广七分，着朱衣系绛裙。 乘威德，显至灵。 通造化，达至真。 住心中，莫离身。 急有外事，速来告人。 心章上奏，太上圣情。 允与不允，报我知闻。 急急如律令。 熏香咒 天辅无私，乾象通微。 无幽无冥，无感不知。 佩带符图，神兵任呼。 我道上皇，位登仙都。 急急如律令。 积雷霹雳咒 雷霆雷霆，天官立身。 号天日月，昏天斗虚。 天雹日月，风云长清。 搅天日月，雷声分明。 黑黑夺夺，霹雳轰轰。 天摧地裂，威摄万星。 天罡卫我，魁星前行。 左按天丁，右按神灵。 七十二将，捧拥我行。 天门开我，地户通我。 人神有三千，六伯长生在我傍，之身布天，天昏地暗，步地鬼神悲闻。 天上从我一去，乾坤世界都行。 东方金华真人，南方、火轮真人，西方元命使者，北方水灵神君，中天五帝丈人。 玉女崇我，五帝之尊。 散在瑶池，霹雳一声。 一声急转，闪电奔云。 神哭鬼悲，风转斗昏。 折木扬石，统摄万星。 乾神拥护，坎神翊行。 艮神传令，震神部兵。 巽神摆独，离神捉魔。 坤神临世，斩摄妖精。 兑神一去，捉鬼不存。 臣有八将，布炁常存。 一布真炁，五岳相随。 令行一转，诸星再行。 东方坤灵使者，南方火铃使者，西方玄阳使者，北方雕鹏使者，中央摧龙使者。
chunks.translated_text:
Heaven’s vault azure, earth’s soil yellow,
My body ascends in yang.
Treading the steps of the Dipper’s bowl,
I transform into the Celestial Stem.
Water and fire, calamity and disaster,
All depart from my side.
My spirit soars to the Golden Palace,
Facing the Jade Emperor.
Above, I confront the Jade Vault,
Golden light pervades the ten directions.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Qi Men Spell**
Ride the Celestial Stem, tread the Nine Mysteries.
Step the Primordial Dipper, walk as a flying immortal.
Attain the Heavenly Immortals, all spirits rejoice.
Conceal the form, transform in myriad ways.
Should any dare to test me,
Seize and bind them at the Dipper’s Gate.
Sweep away misfortune,
Rectify the true and illuminate the distinct.
Left hand brandishes the Fire Bell,
Right hand wields the Golden Pendants.
Mighty radiance spans ten thousand miles,
A whistle summons them to stand before me.
By the Jade Emperor’s decree,
None shall fail to obey my word.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Seven Stars of the Dipper Spell**
Yang Brightness, Great Chief,
Primordial Ultimate, Literary Prosperity.
Yin Essence, Supreme Ultimate,
Supreme Jade Pivot.
With a single inhalation of the Flying Stem,
Myriad demons prostrate and hide.
Mysterious Brightness, Radiant Light,
Purple Tenuity opens to yang.
Cinnabar Prime, utmost perfection,
Divine *qi* exhales its might.
North Culmen Heavenly □,
Revolving and connecting the Mysterious Spirit.
Heavenly Pass Jade Maiden,
Returns in glory to attend me.
Soul, spirit, and essence,
The entire body soars as an immortal.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Gathering Spirits Spell**
Divine light, divine light,
Resplendent in the four directions.
Rescue my true nature:
In heaven, return to heaven;
On earth, return to earth.
Within my body,
The Dao’s *qi* fills and overflows,
Transforming into a perfected person.

**Eastern Realm Spell**
Xiaoren supports Fusang,
All directions suffused in misty radiance.
Primordial Yellow arrays the perfected,
Congealing into clouds and rosy dawn.
Brilliant splendor of nine rays,
Joined with the Three Flowers.
Heaven’s hoe brandishes the sword,
Divine Tiger dispels evil.
Peaceful Yang Great Emperor,
Subdues and commands the hordes of demons.
Ascend to the Divine Empyrean,
Bathe the form in boundless expanse.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Southern Realm Spell**
Fiery *qi* flows as smoke,
Ascending to the Crimson Clarity.
Perfected Lord of Longevity,
Dwells on high in the Jade Capital.
Primordial Mystery and Mysterious Net,
Scatter crystalline radiance.
Primordial Heaven’s Great Edict,
Universally saves all beings.
Annihilate and extinguish demonic hordes,
Rushing and flying with Fire Bells.
Guard and protect the true and dark,
Enduring through kalpas eternal.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Western Realm Spell**
Luminous scene of golden splendor,
Eternally transmits the cavern’s light.
Great Brahma disseminates,
The wheel revolves with Primordial Firmness.
Luxuriant brightness interchanges,
Soaring and transforming the ten directions.
Seven Passes securely pacified,
Revolving the *me*.
Yin and yang.
Impure *qi* dissolves and disperses,
My body abounds in auspiciousness.
Jade scripture proclaims the decree,
Life’s Dao extends and flourishes.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Northern Realm Spell**
Supreme Yin, Northern Solitude,
Ascends to reach the Imperial Lord.
Flowing flames soar with essence,
Transforming the form in Jade Emptiness.
Assist and uphold the Three Realms,
Review and inspect the Primordial Chart.
True talismans radiate,
Registers fixed in the Pure Capital.
Names inscribed in the Golden Register,
Ancient grievances all eradicated.
Spirits soar to the Azure Vault,
Transcending to ascend the Great Void.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Central Palace Spell**
Primordial Vacuous Sovereign,
Ancestrally dwells in the earth’s center.
Three *qi* pervade the Cavernous Prime,
Initiating the Great Palace.
Seven revolutions, seven transformations,
Merging and harmonizing the revolving winds.
Scattering flowers, myriad spirits,
Heaven and earth open and connect.
On this auspicious day, perform the rites,
Venerated by the billions of heavens.
May it protect through kalpa years,
Bestowing blessings without end.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Ingesting Talisman Spell**
Consume and ingest the divine talisman,
Illuminating and revealing the true numen.
Hundreds of spirits hasten to serve,
Penetrating the innermost feelings.
Six Jia spirits guard and protect,
Profound and limpid.
Five Phases’ primordial *qi*,
Vast and obscure.
No being escapes its form,
Chaos not yet clarified,
Yet at the sound of my voice, its name is known.
Heaven and earth’s divine scripture,
Called "Opening the Heart."
Ingest it to attain great peace,
Attain and know the natural,
Ascend to fly in the Purple Court.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Communing Spirits Spell**
Divine Cinnabar Prime Lord within the heart,
Three inches long and seven-tenths wide,
Clad in vermilion robes and crimson skirts.
Riding virtue and power,
Manifesting utmost numinosity.
Communing with transformations,
Reaching utmost perfection.
Dwelling within the heart,
Never leaving the body.
Should urgent matters arise,
Swiftly come to inform me.
Heart’s missive ascends in report,
To the Supreme Sage’s will.
Whether granted or not,
Report back to me for my knowledge.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Incense Fumigation Spell**
Heaven assists without partiality,
The celestial image penetrates the subtle.
No darkness, no obscurity,
No response goes unperceived.
Bearing talismanic charts,
Divine soldiers answer the call.
My Dao ascends the Supreme Emperor,
Attaining the immortal capital.
*Hasten, hasten, as the law commands!*

**Accumulated Thunder and Thunderclap Spell**
Thunder! Thunder!
Heavenly Officials stand firm.
Proclaiming to heaven the sun and moon,
Dimming heaven and the Dipper’s void.
Heaven’s hail, sun and moon,
Wind and clouds eternally clear.
Stirring heaven’s sun and moon,
Thunder’s voice distinct.
Darkness, darkness, seizing, seizing,
Thunderclaps resounding.
Heaven shatters, earth splits,
Might overawes the myriad stars.
Celestial Stem guards me,
Chief Star advances before me.
Left hand presses Heavenly Soldiers,
Right hand presses divine spirits.
Seventy-two generals,
Surround and escort me.
Heaven’s gates open for me,
Earth’s portals clear for me.
Human spirits number three thousand,
Six hundred long-lived immortals at my side.
My body spreads across heaven,
Heaven darkens, earth dims,
Treading the earth, ghosts and spirits mourn in sorrow.
Ascending to follow me in heaven,
Traversing the world of Qian and Kun.
Eastern Golden Splendor Perfected Person,
Southern Fire Wheel Perfected Person,
Western Primordial Destiny Messenger,
Northern Water Spirit Lord,
Central Heaven’s Five Emperors Venerable.
Jade Maidens honor me,
Venerable among the Five Emperors.
Scattered in the Jasper Pool,
A thunderclap resounds.
A single urgent turn,
Lightning dashes through the clouds.
Spirits wail, ghosts lament,
Wind whirls, the Dipper dims.
Breaking trees, lifting stones,
Commanding the myriad stars.
Qian spirit protects,
Kan spirit assists.
Gen spirit transmits commands,
Zhen spirit deploys troops.
Xun spirit wields the banner,
Li spirit seizes demons.
Kun spirit descends to the world,
Slaying and capturing malevolent spirits.
Dui spirit departs,
No ghosts remain.
I possess eight generals,
Disseminating *qi* eternally.
With one dissemination of true *qi*,
The Five Peaks follow.
With one turn of the command,
All stars proceed again.
Eastern Kun Spirit Messenger,
Southern Fire Bell Messenger,
Western Mysterious Yang Messenger,
Northern Roc Messenger,
Central Dragon-Subduing Messenger.

chunks.original_text: 吾令吾精，日月昏明。 独行五方，震方乾坤。 乾罗答那，威摄万灵。 臣诵一遍，五将即令而行。 在天天行敕，在地鬼神惊，长存布真炁。 东华太一真人，还风风当起，巨水水巨门。 喝风风即住，喝鬼化为尘。 喝神神相随，太一认我身。 谨召东方太一威德真君，南方血竭真君，西方白林标德真君，北方天毒真君，中央黄面大畜真君，五方令之尊，从天而去，摄鬼之精。 前门来，地户行。 遮日月，震乾坤。 谨召诸天游毒使者，天游使者，痴牛使者，碧游使者，五炁之尊，人阳人去，鬼阳化尘。 五炁之游，不可常存。 太一有：一元命真人太一，夺命真人太一，月华真人太一，月阴真人太一，撒风真人太一，猛风真人太一，驱雷真人太一，雷光真人太一，霹雳真人太一，烈火真人太一，月孛真人太一。 灵灵布炁。 我闻太一，助我真炁长存。 魁罡化斗，玄天令行。 令从天起，霹雳轰轰，天摧斗裂，霹雳轰轰，化鬼摧行。 太一去处，鬼神化尘。 乾罗答那，威摄万灵。 臣诵一遍，万鬼伏形。 日月乾清，统领天兵。 天神闻我，任我独行。 天罗大将，天毒大将，天煞大将，天翊大将，天猛大将，天检大将，诸天大将之尊，传我令行。 诸神捧拥，任我游行。 三十二天总御，伏我正炁。 诸神捧位，捉龙万千。 引兵一至，霹雳轰然。 东方轰天震门雷帝，南方赤天火光震煞雷帝，西方大暗坤伏雷帝，北方水德倒天雷帝，中央黄门崩烈雷帝，太玄救命真人，太玄折木灵官，五帝之神，五炁之尊，皇天生我，日月照我，江河长我，五帝常存。 星辰日月，照我身形。 臣行万法，万兵随行。 雷霆一起，雷将之尊步虚神，散花瑶池布天庭。 风伯神荡震乾坤，雨师神搅海摇震天庭。 雷公一起才，则起霹雳轰轰。 南方火轮使者，西方吊明使者，北方水阴使者，中央独游使者，东方烈生使者，五者之尊，五炁布行，日昏月精。 统玄之明，统令捧拥。 我行天摧斗暗，地神即行。 天雷一起，结物已成。 神雷一起，水官令行。 妖雷一起，六畜不生。 五雷使者，霹雳轰轰。 上朝五岳，下至海神。 天地日月，鬼神齐灭。 不从天令，上清停灭。 天地日神，威感万灵。 臣今再请，雷将听行。 皇天致雨，龙海之门。 天地日月，分阴太清。 流沙巨水，日月分清。 感天神令，作太阴、太阳。 轰轰、分分、日日、夺夺、黑青、分分、林林、雨雨、奔星。 大煞、微煞、阳煞、亡神、七杀、九曜、月煞、毒煞、应煞，此等煞神，与我同行。 奉臣一令，随我咒行。 身游大海，五雷震行。 五方风雹大神君，雨雹大神君，雪雹大神君，露雹大神君，风雹使者，震天威灵。 敢有孽龙，即捉来呈。 霹雳坤毒使者，霹雳玄沙使者，霹雳牛王使者，霹雳飞竭使者，霹雳魁罡使者，霹雳天罡使者，天罡之精，霹雳轰轰。 敢有妖龙，即捉来呈。 霹雳翊罡使者，霹雳翅毒使者，霹雳幽门使者，霹雳飞啖使者，霹雳叫啖使者，叫啖元神，霹雳轰轰，崩山倒岳。 五兽之神，敢有畜龙，捉缚来呈。 霹雳吞魔使者，霹雳悬魔使者，霹雳指毒使者，霹雳闪电使者，霹雳擒妖使者，擒妖之神，霹雳轰轰，崩山倒岳，巨定海门。 敢有妖龙，捉缚来呈。 奉天之事，巨海之门。 五湖四海，即当现形。
chunks.translated_text:
I command my essence,
Sun and moon dim and brighten.
Alone I traverse the Five Directions,
Shaking the Qian and Kun of the Zhen realm.
Qianluo Danna,
Might subdues the myriad spirits.
When I recite once,
The five generals immediately obey and march.
In heaven, the celestial decree is executed;
On earth, ghosts and spirits tremble.
Eternally disseminating true *qi*.

Donghua Taiyi Perfected,
When I summon the wind, the wind arises;
When I call forth the waters, the waters surge.
I shout—wind, cease!
I shout—ghosts, turn to dust!
I shout—spirits, follow me!
Taiyi recognizes my form.

Solemnly I summon:
Eastern Taiyi Majestic Virtue Perfected Lord,
Southern Blood-Jade Perfected Lord,
Western White Grove Standard Virtue Perfected Lord,
Northern Celestial Toxin Perfected Lord,
Central Yellow-Faced Great Nurturance Perfected Lord—
Lords supreme of the Five Directions,
Descend from heaven,
Seizing the essence of ghosts.

From the front gate they come,
Through the earth’s passage they move.
Obscuring sun and moon,
Shaking Qian and Kun.

Solemnly I summon:
All Heavenly Wandering Toxin Messengers,
Heavenly Wandering Messengers,
Deluded Ox Messengers,
Azure Wandering Messengers—
Lords supreme of the Five *Qi*,
When yang of humans departs,
Yang of ghosts turns to dust.
The wandering of the Five *Qi*
Cannot long endure.

Taiyi possesses:
Primordial Life Mandate Perfected Taiyi,
Life-Seizing Perfected Taiyi,
Moon Radiance Perfected Taiyi,
Moon Yin Perfected Taiyi,
Wind-Dispersing Perfected Taiyi,
Fierce Wind Perfected Taiyi,
Thunder-Driving Perfected Taiyi,
Thunderlight Perfected Taiyi,
Thunderclap Perfected Taiyi,
Blazing Fire Perfected Taiyi,
Moon Comet Perfected Taiyi.

Spirits, disseminate *qi*!
I have heard: Taiyi aids me,
That my true *qi* may long endure.
The Dipper’s handle transforms,
The Dark Heaven’s decree is executed.
The command arises from heaven,
Thunder crashes resoundingly,
Heaven shatters, the Dipper splits,
Thunder crashes resoundingly,
Transforming ghosts, driving them forth.
Where Taiyi passes,
Ghosts and spirits turn to dust.
Qianluo Danna,
Might subdues the myriad spirits.
When I recite once,
Ten thousand ghosts submit in form.

Sun and moon, Qian and Kun clear,
Commanding the heavenly hosts.
The celestial gods hear me,
Allowing me to act alone.
Heavenly Net Great General,
Heavenly Toxin Great General,
Heavenly Slayer Great General,
Heavenly Wing Great General,
Heavenly Fierce Great General,
Heavenly Inspector Great General—
Lords supreme of all heavenly generals,
Transmit my command.

All spirits bear and surround me,
Allowing me to wander freely.
The thirty-two heavens are wholly governed,
Subdued by my upright *qi*.
All spirits uphold their positions,
Seizing ten thousand dragons.
With one arrival of the troops,
Thunder crashes mightily.

Eastern Thunder Emperor of the Heaven-Shaking Gate,
Southern Crimson Heaven Firelight Thunder-Slaying Emperor,
Western Great Darkness Kun-Subduing Thunder Emperor,
Northern Water Virtue Heaven-Inverting Thunder Emperor,
Central Yellow Gate Heaven-Splitting Thunder Emperor,
Tai Xuan Life-Saving Perfected,
Tai Xuan Tree-Splitting Spirit Official—
Divine Lords of the Five Emperors,
Lords supreme of the Five *Qi*.
August Heaven bore me,
Sun and moon illuminate me,
Rivers and seas nurture me,
The Five Emperors ever endure.

Stars, sun, and moon
Illuminate my form.
As I perform the myriad methods,
Ten thousand troops follow.
At the first stir of thunder,
The Thunder Lords, Lords supreme, step through the void,
Scattering flowers in the Jasper Pool, adorning the celestial court.
The Wind Earl shakes and quakes Qian and Kun,
The Rain Master stirs the seas, shaking the celestial court.
When the Thunder Duke arises,
Thunder crashes resoundingly.

Southern Fire Wheel Messenger,
Western Hanging Light Messenger,
Northern Water Yin Messenger,
Central Solitary Wandering Messenger,
Eastern Fierce Life Messenger—
Lords supreme of the Five,
Disseminating the Five *Qi*,
Sun dims, moon’s essence.
The clarity of the Dark Mystery,
The command upheld and surrounded.

I traverse heaven, shattering the Dipper’s darkness,
Earth spirits immediately act.
When celestial thunder arises,
All formed things are completed.
When divine thunder arises,
The Water Official’s command is executed.
When demonic thunder arises,
The six livestock do not thrive.
The Five Thunder Messengers,
Thunder crashes resoundingly.
Above, they ascend the Five Peaks;
Below, they reach the sea gods.
Heaven and earth, sun and moon,
Ghosts and spirits are all destroyed.
Those who defy the celestial decree
Are extinguished by the Highest Clarity.
Heaven and earth, sun gods,
Might moves the myriad spirits.

Now I again invoke,
Thunder generals, heed my command.
August Heaven sends rain,
Through the Dragon Sea’s gate.
Heaven and earth, sun and moon,
Divide the yin, the Highest Clarity.
Flowing sands, vast waters,
Sun and moon part clearly.
The celestial divine decree moves,
Creating Great Yin and Great Yang.
Crashing, dividing, daily, seizing,
Black and azure, dividing, forest-like, raining,
Shooting stars.

Great Slayer, Minor Slayer,
Yang Slayer, Death Spirit,
Seven Killings, Nine Luminaries,
Moon Slayer, Toxin Slayer, Responsive Slayer—
These slayer spirits
Accompany me in my journey.
By my command,
They follow my incantation.
My body roams the great sea,
The Five Thunders shake and march.

Lords supreme of the Five Directions’ wind and hail,
Great Hail Lord,
Snow Hail Lord,
Dew Hail Lord,
Wind Hail Messenger—
Heaven-shaking might.
If any sinful dragon dares,
Seize and present it!

Thunderclap Kun Toxin Messenger,
Thunderclap Dark Sand Messenger,
Thunderclap Ox King Messenger,
Thunderclap Flying Jade Messenger,
Thunderclap Dipper Handle Messenger,
Thunderclap Celestial Stem Messenger—
Essence of the Celestial Stem,
Thunder crashes resoundingly.
If any demonic dragon dares,
Seize and present it!

Thunderclap Wing Stem Messenger,
Thunderclap Wing Toxin Messenger,
Thunderclap Dark Gate Messenger,
Thunderclap Flying Devourer Messenger,
Thunderclap Howling Devourer Messenger—
Primordial spirit of the Howling Devourer,
Thunder crashes resoundingly,
Shattering mountains, toppling peaks.

Spirits of the Five Beasts,
If any dragon dares,
Seize and bind it, present it!

Thunderclap Demon-Swallowing Messenger,
Thunderclap Demon-Suspending Messenger,
Thunderclap Poison-Pointing Messenger,
Thunderclap Lightning Flash Messenger,
Thunderclap Demon-Seizing Messenger—
Spirit of the Demon-Seizer,
Thunder crashes resoundingly,
Shattering mountains, toppling peaks,
Mightily fixing the sea’s gate.
If any demonic dragon dares,
Seize and bind it, present it!

By the celestial mandate,
Through the vast sea’s gate.
The five lakes and four seas,
Must immediately manifest their forms.

chunks.original_text: 吾今一召，知汝姓名。 东海婆龙使者，南海出火使者，西海白沙搅门使者，北海翻浪巨水使者，中海顺行擒风使者，擒风之神，霹雳轰轰，五湖龙王，火急见形。 捧天大力勾翅大神，摧岳之君，上朝五湖，疾当现形。 南天鄱阳湖、昌阳天白面湖、青草洞庭南蕉摄湖、勾天大野湖、林栗野草摄量湖，五湖之精，五湖之神。 鄱阳、昌阳白面、青草、大野、蕉摄一量，天地之神，五龙之君。 五龙之女，随我令行。 八龙之神，巴齐御刬风毒龙君，风号龙君，牢月抓毒龙君，御毒龙君，划毒龙君，横天大海江，南极统天江，变神顺济江，灵翊临惠江，统浙武宿江，朝天惠济江，一浪大济江，横烈起浪女阳江，流川返惠江。 九江龙君，霹雳轰轰。 溪泉小龙，石泉龙神。 吾今讽咒，布雨奔星。 摧山倒海，翻雨作晴。 雷轰有敕，甘露奉行。 上天天须暗，入地泉神惊。 捧拥行甘露，救济万物生。 皇天生人道，皇天万物生。 朝行三天上，龙神分路行。 雷神通天起，风伯吹布云。 雨师洒甘露，霹雳震天庭。 五龙来降雨，九江奔雨行。 五湖行大雾，八风倒海行。 溪泉龙捧，拥行雷令，击鼓天庭。 潘帝潘啰，结婆啰咭帝，啰□婆啰结帝，婆啰咙结帝。 诸龙行雨至，救济万民生。 加工跻上位，五雷降雨行。 五雷使者，霹雳乾坤。 摧山倒岳，万物齐生。 上清有救，不可久停。 急急如律令。 天章八十六句鬼惊咒 皇天生我，皇地载我。 雷霆佐我，仙宫立身。 号召日月，掌握星辰。 天雹风雹，雷声分明。 黑黑夺夺，霹雳震天。 左按天章，右按玉灵。 七十二将，捧拥我行。 天门开我，地户通我。 七十二将，捧拥令行。 神有三千六百，长在我傍。 金华火轮，元命水灵。 散在瑶池，霹雳一声。 天游地游，碧游五游。 传我令行，捧位捉龙。 江河长我，风伯荡振，雨师搅庭。 天雷一起，万物齐生。 皇天致雨，龙海之门。 流沙巨水，七煞同行。 皇天生人道，皇天绝鬼道。 潘帝结潘罗，结婆罗结罗，结罗婆龙，救济万民。 摧山倒海，令出青城，啴嘻咤嗫，大露八风，懤海行溪。 五方霹雳，摧龙起飞。 东海婆龙，南海出火，西海白沙，北海翻浪，中海巨水，五湖摧岳。 鄱阳蕉湖，十二溪真。 毒龙号龙，牢月巴毒。 灵罡所召，随声随咒。 山川出炁，百灵结形。 北都水府，严君守冰。 月阴月华，金母发程。 三官开扃，五帝合信。 龙飞电走，金虎火令。 浩师太华，流精洞灵。 何神不使，何令不行。 上有太一，十地灵官。 紫虚玄圣，捧令而行。 金箓密号，降自轰庭。 违轰裂灭，顺轰昌荣。 身发金辉，升入帝庭。 急急如律令。 太一三天都咒 稽首中天众曜星，剖开混沌震雷霆。 佐天立定乾坤柱，裂地翻天震巽门。 青帝苍童传号令，上天敕命出雷轰。 我今役使诸星帅，斗转星移相击奔。 九天掌法圣后咒 龟台圣母大慈悲，出法通天普度人。 月阴月华传教旨，十一大曜主雷霆。 箕毕风雨翼雷起，造化万物尽生成。 我今六返玄天纪，飞走神符号撞星。 金木土星并水火，神机妙用震天庭。 交初交终并孛彗，太一之尊握大权。 吾今飞符前路去，听令随号急速行。 北方建斗咒 北方霹雳使者，雷公大神，建斗执旗，灭恶除形。 轰天有敕？ 速下帝庭。 五岳四渎，随我斗行。

Now I summon you—your names are known.
East Sea Crone-Dragon Messenger,
South Sea Fire-Emerging Messenger,
West Sea White-Sand Gate-Churning Messenger,
North Sea Wave-Flipping Great-Water Messenger,
Central Sea Wind-Seizing Flowing Messenger—
Spirit of the Wind-Seizer,
Thunder crashes resoundingly,
Five Lakes Dragon Kings,
Hasten to manifest your forms!

Mighty Hook-Winged Great Power Deity,
Mountain-Crushing Lord,
Ascend to the Five Lakes,
Swiftly manifest your forms!

Southern Heaven’s Poyang Lake,
Changyang Heaven’s White-Face Lake,
Green Grass Dongting’s South Banana-Grasping Lake,
Hooked Heaven’s Great Wild Lake,
Forest Chestnut Wild Grass Measuring Lake—
Essences of the Five Lakes,
Spirits of the Five Lakes.
Poyang, Changyang White-Face, Green Grass, Great Wild, Banana-Grasping Measure—
Heaven and Earth’s spirits,
Five Dragons’ Lords.
Five Dragons’ daughters,
Follow my command.
Eight Dragons’ spirits:
Baqi Yu Chan Wind-Poison Dragon Lord,
Wind-Howling Dragon Lord,
Laoyue Claw-Poison Dragon Lord,
Poison-Guarding Dragon Lord,
Poison-Slashing Dragon Lord,
Crossing Heaven’s Great Sea River,
South Pole Unifying Heaven River,
Transforming Spirit Flowing Aid River,
Numinous Wing Approaching Blessing River,
Unifying Zhejiang Martial Constellation River,
Heaven-Facing Blessing-Aid River,
One-Wave Great Aid River,
Fierce-Wave Rising Yang River,
Flowing Creek Returning Blessing River.
Nine Rivers Dragon Lords,
Thunder crashes resoundingly.
Stream and spring minor dragons,
Stone spring dragon spirits.

Now I chant the incantation,
Scatter rain, hasten stars.
Crush mountains, overturn seas,
Reverse rain to make clear skies.
Thunder roars with decree,
Sweet dew obeys the command.
Heaven above must darken,
Earth below’s spring spirits tremble.
Bearing and escorting sweet dew,
Rescuing and aiding all living things.
August Heaven births the human Dao,
August Heaven births all things.
Ascending to the Three Heavens,
Dragon spirits divide their paths.
Thunder spirits rise to Heaven,
Wind Earls blow and spread clouds.
Rain Masters sprinkle sweet dew,
Thunderclaps shake the celestial court.
Five Dragons descend with rain,
Nine Rivers hasten with rain.
Five Lakes move in great mist,
Eight Winds overturn the seas.
Stream and spring dragons bear,
Escorting the thunder decree,
Striking drums in the celestial court.
Pan Emperor Pan Luo,
Jiepo Luo Ji Emperor,
Luo □ Po Luo Jie Emperor,
Po Luo Long Jie Emperor.
All dragons bring rain,
Rescuing and aiding all people.
Ascend through effort to high rank,
Five Thunders descend with rain.
Five Thunder Messengers,
Thunderclaps shake Heaven and Earth.
Crushing mountains, toppling peaks,
All things flourish together.
Upper Clarity brings salvation,
No delay is permitted.
Hasten as the statute commands!

**Heavenly Chapter Eighty-Six-Sentence Ghost-Terrifying Incantation**
August Heaven births me,
August Earth bears me.
Thunder and lightning assist me,
Immortal Palaces establish my being.
I summon sun and moon,
Grasp and wield the stars.
Heavenly hail and wind hail,
Thunder’s voice is distinct.
Dark and tumultuous,
Thunderclaps shake Heaven.
Left hand presses Heavenly Chapter,
Right hand presses Jade Numinosity.
Seventy-two generals,
Bear and escort me on my way.
Heaven’s gates open for me,
Earth’s doors clear my path.
Seventy-two generals,
Bear and enforce the command.
Three thousand six hundred spirits,
Ever at my side.
Golden Flower Fire Wheel,
Original Life Water Numinosity.
Scattered in Jasper Pool,
At a single thunderclap.
Heavenly wandering, earthly wandering,
Azure wandering, Five Wanderings.
Transmit my command,
Bear the rank, seize the dragon.
Rivers and streams lengthen me,
Wind Earls shake and stir,
Rain Masters churn the court.
Heavenly thunder rises,
All things flourish together.
August Heaven sends rain,
Dragon and sea’s gate.
Flowing sands, great waters,
Seven Slayers move as one.
August Heaven births the human Dao,
August Heaven severs the ghostly Dao.
Pan Emperor Jie Pan Luo,
Jie Po Luo Jie Luo,
Jie Luo Po Long,
Rescuing and aiding all people.
Crushing mountains, overturning seas,
Command issues from Green City.
Chanting, gasping, whispering,
Great Dew, Eight Winds,
Mourning the sea, moving through streams.
Five Directions’ thunderclaps,
Crushing dragons take flight.
East Sea Crone-Dragon,
South Sea Fire-Emerging,
West Sea White Sand,
North Sea Wave-Flipping,
Central Sea Great Water,
Five Lakes crushing peaks.
Poyang, Banana Lake,
Twelve Stream Perfected.
Poison dragons, howling dragons,
Laoyue Ba Poison.
By numinous power summoned,
Follow the voice, follow the incantation.
Mountains and rivers emit qi,
Hundred spirits take form.
Northern Capital’s Water Prefecture,
Yan Lord guards the ice.
Lunar Yin, Lunar Brilliance,
Metal Mother sets forth.
Three Officials open the locks,
Five Emperors unite in trust.
Dragons fly, lightning runs,
Metal Tigers, Fire Decrees.
Vast Masters, Great Flower,
Flowing Essence, Grotto Numinosity.
What spirit does not obey?
What command goes unfulfilled?
Above is the Great One,
Ten Earths’ numinous officials.
Purple Void Mystic Sage,
Bear the command and proceed.
Golden Register’s secret name,
Descends from the thunderous court.
Defy the thunder and be shattered,
Obey the thunder and flourish.
Body emits golden radiance,
Ascend into the imperial court.
Hasten as the statute commands!

**Great One’s Three Heavens Capital Incantation**
I bow to the Central Heaven’s host of luminous stars,
Splitting open primordial chaos with thunderous roars.
Assisting Heaven to erect the pillars of Heaven and Earth,
Rending Earth, overturning Heaven, shaking the Xun Gate.
Azure Emperor’s Blue Youth transmits the command,

chunks.original_text: 独游天地，万神奉行。 昏天斗壁咒 昏天地怯雷闪电，运斗枢分裂乾坤。 有雷将三千六百，随三台列曜而行。 摧日神径下沧海，召太阴倒海归源。 变神通鬼神灭迹，送五台裂魄分形。 五黑咒 天蒙蒙，地蒙蒙，人蒙蒙，鬼蒙蒙。 天黑黑，地黑黑，人黑黑，鬼黑黑。 天断头，地断头，人断头，鬼断头。 天沉沉，地沉沉，人沉沉，鬼沉沉。 大湖沉沉，小湖沉沉，天沉地沉。 万里狂风吹塞鬼眼，万里黑风障断鬼路。 人无寻影，鬼无寻踪。 十道都关，九道都绝。 急急如律令。 玉皇心咒 金木土水火瘟，九泉瘟疫神秦伯温、杨伯温，热神刘伯文，冷神冒文武。 太上有敕，五方使者，六天之上，敕法速去。 急急如律令。 五瘟瘟疫，收付七星。 东斗录鬼，一付天庭。 西斗收魂，知汝姓名。 急消急散，天帝吏兵。 张罗布网，乘驾火轮。 吞魔食鬼，缚汝祟精。 何神不伏，何鬼敢当。 咒神神自减，咒鬼鬼自亡。 千千截首，万万剪形。 急急如律令。 遣瘟咒 咄咤谨敕，东方青瘟之鬼，腐木之精。 南方赤瘟之鬼，炎火之精。 西方白瘟之鬼，死金之精。 北方黑瘟之鬼，溷池之精。 中央黄瘟之鬼，粪土之精。 四时八节，因旺化生。 神不内养，外作邪精。 吾今知汝姓名，识汝形影。 五方行瘟之鬼，黄奴七子百桑兄弟，一切杂俗，窜迹除形。 准此符命，火急奉行。 急急如律令。

**Dusk and Heaven Dipper-Wall Incantation**

People dim dim,
Ghosts dim dim.
Heaven blackens black,
Earth blackens black,

Ghosts’ heads are severed.

Earth sinks deep,

Lesser lakes sink deep,

Nine roads all cut off.

Metal, Wood, Earth, Water, Fire—pestilence,

Five Pestilences and plagues,
Consigned to the Seven Stars.
Eastern Dipper records ghosts,
One dispatch to the Celestial Court.
Western Dipper gathers souls,

Spirits of rotting wood.
Southern Red Pestilence ghosts,
Spirits of blazing fire.
Western White Pestilence ghosts,
Spirits of dead metal.
Northern Black Pestilence ghosts,
Spirits of filthy pools.
Central Yellow Pestilence ghosts,
Spirits of dung and earth.
Four seasons, eight solar terms,

Pestilence ghosts of the Five Directions,
Yellow Slaves, Seven Sons, Hundred Mulberry Brothers,
All sundry miscreants—
Banish your traces, erase your forms.
By this talismanic command,
Act with utmost urgency.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

chunks.original_text: 扫荡咒 五雷神王袪却不祥，霹雳一发邪祟消亡。 火车万丈烧杀瘟黄，猛风扫荡飘散八方。 急急如律令。 断瘟咒 吾是日光，威震九天。 金火前耀，飞龙绕乾。 黄神敕钺，璇玑玉章。 五星五斗，平调七元。 收摄九丑，馘戮五瘟。 扫除邪凶，去却不祥。 汝应速去，伏吾魁罡。 急急如律令。 天神行瘟、和瘟解释。 地神行瘟，天赦在前。 邪魔行瘟，灭迹除烟。 太上有敕，保人长生。 急急如律令。 驱遣咒 太上玄都，四盟飞符。 九真前驾，天丁后驱。 五雷八将，六甲直符。 腾天掷地，收捉凶妖。 擒邪伐恶，逆‘者速诛。 天瘟岁吏，明受帝书。 仰遵符命，不得停居。 速收病毒，放散病躯。 解厄消灾，勾落死书。 敢有违命，速送酆都。 急急如律令。 斩瘟咒 神霄玉清，十方天丁。 青玉介冑，龙涤虎巾。 擒制万魔，搜捉鬼神。 随咒所敕，道反潜臻。 报应报应，寿命无倾。 急急如律令。 云纲咒 云纲落天纪，神华灿紫微。 七真还帝座，九斗翠玉虚。 紫盖重霄岭，玄精朗八隅。 上有九晨宾，吟咏隐羽书。 飞步遨北漠，长龄天地居。 按辔玄羽台，飞行九天所。 洞虚深幽邃，云纲乘空举。 下有采真士，仰招玉晨侣。 三周阳明上，九回入洞野。 高步登帝庭，长歌龙飞语。 玉晨映北朔，琼条翠隐阿。 空生九灵台，焕彰耀太遐。 天关运重明，劫会屡网罗。 乘我羽行驾，飞步织女河。 保灵空常化，永忘天地多。 急急如律令。 灭毒咒 中央土宿太星君，合自持剑镇天门。 下方群生有灾祸，祈求符至鬼神惊。 敢有顽生拒逆者，罗天火光烧鬼魂。 应犯土皇凶煞者，立教福祸难久存。 稍有瘟广不伏者，大开天目发天嗔。 龙头使者捧符行，报应彰扬显帝君。 急急如律令。 解厄咒 帧，軿。 ，。

**Sweeping Incantation**
Five-Thunder Divine Kings dispel misfortune,
A single thunderclap—perverse spirits vanish.
Fiery chariots ten thousand fathoms high burn and slay the Yellow Pestilence,
Fierce winds sweep and scatter them to the eight directions.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

**Severing Pestilence Incantation**
I am the Sun’s radiance, my might shakes the Nine Heavens.
Golden fire blazes ahead, flying dragons coil around Qian.
The Yellow Spirit wields the executioner’s axe, the jade celestial chart in hand.
Five Stars and Five Dipper Lords harmonize the Seven Primes.
Gather and seize the Nine Uglies, behead and slaughter the Five Pestilences.
Sweep away evil and malice, banish misfortune.
You must depart at once, submit to my Northern Dipper’s might.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

**Heavenly and Earthly Pestilence, Harmonizing Pestilence Explained**
When earthly spirits spread pestilence, Heaven’s pardon precedes them.
When demonic forces spread pestilence, their traces and smoke are obliterated.
The Most High issues this decree to preserve human longevity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

**Expulsion Incantation**
The Most High of the Mystic Capital, four covenants with flying talismans.
Nine Perfected lead the vanguard, Heavenly Soldiers drive from behind.
Five Thunders and Eight Generals, Six Jia True Talismans.
Soaring through heaven and hurling to earth, they capture and seize malevolent spirits.
Seize the perverse, punish the wicked—rebels are swiftly executed.
Heavenly Pestilence Year-Officers, receive the Emperor’s writ.
Look up and obey the talismanic command—you may not linger.
Quickly gather the disease toxins, release the afflicted bodies.
Dispel calamity, dissolve disaster, strike their names from the ledger of death.
Should any dare defy this command, swiftly dispatch them to Fengdu.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

**Beheading Pestilence Incantation**
Divine Empyrean Jade Clarity, Heavenly Soldiers of the Ten Directions.
Clad in azure jade armor, dragon-washed tiger-sashed.
They capture and restrain the myriad demons, hunt down and seize the spirits.
As the incantation decrees, the Dao reverses and they stealthily draw near.
Retribution, retribution—lifespans remain unshaken.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

**Cloud Net Incantation**
The Cloud Net descends from Heaven’s Record,
Divine radiance gleams in the Purple Tenuity.
Seven Perfected return to the Emperor’s throne,
Nine Dipper Lords inhabit the Jade Void.
The Purple Canopy crowns the Empyrean Ridge,
Mysterious essence illumines the eight corners.
Above dwell the Nine Morning Guests,
Chanting and reciting hidden feather-script.
They soar and roam the northern wastes,
Dwelling long between heaven and earth.
Reining in at the Dark Feather Terrace,
They traverse the Nine Heavens’ domains.
The cavernous depths stretch far and profound,
The Cloud Net ascends through empty space.
Below, the Perfected Adepts gather,
Gazing upward to summon the Jade Morning Companions.
Three cycles ascend to the Yang Brightness,
Nine revolutions enter the cavernous wilds.
With lofty steps they mount the Emperor’s court,
Singing long the Dragon-Flight Song.
The Jade Morning reflects the northern wastes,
Jasper branches and kingfisher hues hide in the hills.
The Ninefold Numinous Terrace arises in emptiness,
Resplendent and shining to the farthest reaches.
The Heavenly Pass revolves with doubled brightness,
The kalpa’s assembly is repeatedly enmeshed.
Mounting my feathered chariot,
I stride across the Weaving Maid’s River.
Preserving the numinous in empty transformation,
Forever forgetting the world’s abundance.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

**Eradicating Toxins Incantation**
Central Earth Mansion, Great Star Lord,
Wielding your sword, you guard Heaven’s Gate.
Below, the multitudes suffer calamity and disaster—
Pray, let the talisman arrive and terrify the ghosts and spirits.
Should any stubbornly resist and defy,
The net of heaven’s fire shall burn their souls.
Those who offend the Earth Sovereign’s baleful stars,
Shall find fortune and misfortune fleeting.
Should any pestilence persist in defiance,
I shall open the Heavenly Eye and unleash Heaven’s wrath.
Dragon-Headed Envoys bear the talisman forth,
Retribution manifests, the Emperor’s glory revealed.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

chunks.original_text: 昊天承三炁，玉皇付右天。 辗，辅轴轩辕。 軴，轨轨。 正一元天位，三皇軓。 ，朝上清篇。 南福及五斗，三元降界仙。 拘凡施济苦，輁。 辅弼，三境法门员。 隐唱高天，。 辂大丑，堕罪更无原。 急急如律令。 敕编符咒 至哉大道，元始符命。 神风静默，山岳藏云。 混元微妙，体合自然。 一炁流行，育养群生。 顺我者昌，逆我者殃。 太上有敕，如诰奉行。 召雷总咒 敕吽咤嘟□雷咒，敕召雷神吽通天入地，咤□雷霆晖，奉帝敕摄，速现真形。 唵嗔□摄，唻他娑婆摄，木狼神□，火铃神□，霹雳神□，欻火神□，猛吏神□，捷疾神□，玉英神□，兴云神□，呼风神□，唵唵敕速现现，帝牧速现现，帝帝敕速现。 唵三满咚哪，摄哑□呼风神，速离巽宫，敕敕三天，敕臣某奉命召汝，速降速降。 急急如律令。 炼纸笔咒 俱知帝赊苏咤，呵喏嘧咤，乌都咤，俱耆咤，彼赖帝咤，耶微若咤，乌耆咤，俱啰帝咤，老贝摩咤煞词。 急急如律令。 神霄玉清，揉玉炼金。 金童结篆，玉女绣文。 光明洞照，鬼哭神惊。 大魔降伏，恶魅分形。 乾坤安镇，正道兴行。 吾今书篆，物物长生。 敢有拒逆，霹雳一声。 急急如律令。 结空成梵，真炁自生。 赤书玉字，八威龙文。 保制劫运，使天长存。 治病斩邪，万生安宁。 北斗咒 北斗九辰，中天大神。 上朝金阙，下履昆仑。 调理纲纪，统制乾坤。 大魁贪狼，巨门禄存。 文曲廉贞，武曲破军。 高上玉皇，紫微帝君。 大周天界，细入微尘。 何灾不灭，何福不臻。 元皇正炁，来合我身。 天罡所指，昼夜常轮。 俗居小人，好道求灵。 愿见尊仪，永保长生。 三台虚精，六淳曲生。 生我养我，护我身形。 □□□□□□□尊帝。 急急如律令。 总敕咒 上帝符命，北斗枢机。 神光灿烂，烨耀云衢。 潜降真炁，万邪灭诛。 保身富贵，福禄相随。 消灾度厄，有怪立除。 魁罡正炁，扫荡无余。 降临符命，上登玉虚。 急急如律令。 玄都敕符咒 太上玄都，黑律真符。 五方真炁，变化八区。 魁星拱手，□宿扶车。 □辅佐，□□持书。 □星所指，万恶消除。 除邪辅正，煞没祟诛。 凶神煞曜令回吉，祥杀鬼妖赴北一。 咒诅，冤巫难即消，太岁土神凶作吉。 急急如律令。 敕五土咒 三梁九柱，速归本主。 九柱三梁，还着本方。 五土土精，土炁消亡。 六甲六乙，散土速出。 六丙六丁，散土不行。 六戊六己，敕土速起。 六庚六辛，压土不嗔。 六壬六癸，解土自藏。 土公土母，百魅千精。 吾知汝名，今日告戒。 万神咸听，旷旷堂堂。 天圆地方，天有九柱，地有九梁。 厌散一切，各属四方。 护佑门户，永获吉昌。 急急如律令。 延生度厄咒 延生度厄，役使神灵。 益等消灾，度籍我名。 散祸扶衰，曲映我形。 洞监书符，与神符并。 古御七元，役使八冥。 上专守神，下保魂精。 同天长明，普地无倾。 急急如律令。 召斗真咒 召仙仙至，召圣圣灵。 巨化此符，合明天心。 九皇下降，元亨利贞。 北斗瑶光，中天元皇。 内有一星，化生朱章。 吾今召请，速降坛前。 北斗太乙，灵童大圣。 一呼一召，百灵百灵。 急急如律令。 梵炁灵君，万神玉章。 明道熙夷，幽夜开光。

*Oṃ oṃ*, by edict, swiftly appear!
By imperial decree, swiftly appear!
*Oṃ sān mǎn dōng nǎ*! Seize!
*Yǎ*! □ Wind-Calling Spirit,
Hasten from the Xun Palace!
By the edict of the Three Heavens,
Your servant, so-and-so, by command summons you—descend swiftly, descend swiftly!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**Consecrating Paper and Brush Incantation**
*Jūzhī dìshē sū chà*, *hē nuò mì chà*,
*Wūdū chà*, *jūqí chà*,
*Bǐlài dì chà*, *yēwēi ruò chà*,
*Wūqí chà*, *jūluó dì chà*,
*Lǎobèi mó chà*—concluding words.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

The Divine Empyrean and Jade Clarity,
Kneading jade, refining gold.
Golden Lads inscribe the talismanic seals,
Jade Maidens embroider the sacred texts.
Light illumines and penetrates,
Ghosts wail, spirits tremble.
Great demons submit,
Evil specters disperse.
Heaven and Earth stand firm,
The true Dao prevails.
I now inscribe these talismans,
That all things may attain longevity.
Should any dare resist,
A thunderclap shall strike them down.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**Forming the Void into Sanskrit**
True qi arises of itself,
Crimson-scripted jade characters,
The Eight Mighty Dragon Scripts.
Preserving and governing the kalpas,
Ensuring Heaven’s eternal endurance.
Curing illness, severing evil,
All beings dwell in peace.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**Big Dipper Incantation**
The Nine Stars of the Northern Dipper,
Great deities of the Central Heaven.
Above, they attend the Golden Palace,
Below, they tread upon Kunlun.
Regulating the cosmic order,
Governing Heaven and Earth.
Great Pivot, Greedy Wolf,
Giant Gate, Wealth Repository,
Literary Brilliance, Integrity and Chastity,
Martial Brilliance, Breaker of Armies.
Exalted Jade Emperor,
Purple Tenuity Emperor Lord.
Encompassing the great celestial sphere,
Penetrating even the tiniest dust.
What calamity shall not be eradicated?
What fortune shall not be attained?
The Primordial Emperor’s true qi,
Come and merge with my body.
Wherever the Celestial Pivot points,
Day and night it turns without cease.
The common folk, petty and unenlightened,
Seek the Dao and yearn for the numinous.
May they behold your august presence,
And forever safeguard their longevity.
The Three Terraces’ ethereal essence,
The Six Pure Ones’ curved life.
They give me life, they nourish me,
They protect my body and form.
□□□□□□□ Exalted Emperor.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**General Edict Incantation**
The Emperor’s talismanic mandate,
The Northern Dipper’s pivotal mechanism.
Divine light blazes resplendent,
Radiant upon the clouded thoroughfares.
The true qi descends in concealment,
All evil is eradicated and destroyed.
Protecting the body, bestowing wealth and nobility,
Fortune and prosperity follow in its wake.
Dissolving calamities, delivering from distress,
Any anomaly shall be instantly removed.
The Pivot Star’s true qi,
Sweeps away all without remainder.
The descending talismanic mandate,
Ascends to the Jade Clarity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**Mystic Capital Edict Talisman Incantation**
The Supreme’s Mystic Capital,
The Black Statute’s true talisman.
The true qi of the Five Directions,
Transforming the Eight Regions.
The Pivot Star clasps its hands,
□ Constellations support the chariot.
□ Assisting, □□ bearing the scriptures.
Wherever the □ Star points,
All evil is eradicated.
Expelling evil, aiding the upright,
Malevolent forces and specters are destroyed.
Ominous gods and baleful stars—turn their decrees to auspice,
Baneful ghosts and demonic sprites—consign them to the Northern Unity.
Curses and sorcery swiftly dissolve,
The Year Star’s earthly gods turn misfortune to fortune.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**Edict of the Five Earths Incantation**
Three beams, nine pillars,
Return swiftly to your original master.
Nine pillars, three beams,
Return to your original place.
The essence of the Five Earths,
The earth qi dissipates and vanishes.
Six Jia, Six Yi,
Disperse the earth swiftly.
Six Bing, Six Ding,
The earth’s dispersal ceases.
Six Wu, Six Ji,
By edict, the earth swiftly rises.
Six Geng, Six Xin,
Suppress the earth without wrath.
Six Ren, Six Gui,
The earth resolves and conceals itself.
Earth Lords, Earth Mothers,
A hundred specters, a thousand spirits.
I know your names,
Today I admonish you.
All gods heed my words,
Vast and majestic.
Heaven is round, Earth is square,
Heaven has nine pillars, Earth has nine beams.
Suppress and disperse all,
Each belongs to the Four Directions.
Guard and protect the gates and doors,
Forever securing auspicious prosperity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**Prolonging Life and Delivering from Distress Incantation**
Prolonging life, delivering from distress,
Commanding the divine spirits.
Diminishing calamities for our benefit,
Inscribing my name in the register of deliverance.
Dispersing misfortune, supporting the weak,
Illuminating my form in reflection.
The talismans inscribed in penetrating oversight,
Align with the divine talismans.
Anciently governing the Seven Origins,
Commanding the Eight Darknesses.
Above, they guard the spirits,
Below, they protect the soul and essence.
In unison with Heaven’s eternal brightness,
Pervading Earth without collapse.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**Summoning the Dipper’s True Incantation**
Summon the immortals—immortals arrive!
Summon the sages—sages manifest!
Transform this talisman,
Aligning with the luminous heart of Heaven.
The Nine Emperors descend,
Primordial, prosperous, upright, and steadfast.
The Northern Dipper’s Radiant Light,
The Central Heaven’s Primordial Emperor.
Within it, a star
Transforms and gives birth to the Vermilion Seal.
I now summon and invite you,
Swiftly descend before the altar!
Northern Dipper, Great Unity,
Divine Lads, Great Sages.
One call, one summoning,
A hundred spirits, a hundred spirits!
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

---

**Sanskrit Qi Spirit Lord**
The Sanskrit Qi Spirit Lord,
The myriad gods’ jade scriptures.
Illuminating the Dao, pacifying the distant,
Dispelling the darkness of night, revealing light.
